You are always trying to exhibit your wisdom, always in search of a victim to whom you can show your knowledge, just searching, hunting for somebody weaker than you – then you will jump in and you will show your wisdom.A wise man need not be an exhibitionist. Whatsoever is, is. He is not aware of it, he is not in any hurry to show it. If you want to find it, you will have to make efforts. If you have to know whether he is gentle or not, that is going to be your discovery.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: Travel is the dream of travelers.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: Let your only graduation be in the grave.
author: Melody  Lee, Moon Gypsy

quote: There may be human joy in doing good with definite purpose, but they who do good expecting nothing in return know a joy that is divine.
author: St. Francis of assisi

quote: Wisdom : balance between survival, principles and emotions.
author: Barry Schwartz

quote: If you really want to learn, do not be surprised if someone tries to teach you. And do not lightly reject the method.
author: Alexander Chee, Edinburgh

quote: Mungu hatakubali kuwa na mtu katika ufalme wake ambaye hatakubali kutawaliwa naye. Usikubali kutawaliwa na Ibilisi, kubali kutawaliwa na Mungu. Ni jukumu letu kuanza kuishi sasa kama vile tutakavyoishi mbinguni. Shetani anataka uwe na hekima ya duniani ili akupumbaze. Lakini hofu ya Mungu ndiyo msingi wa hekima ya kweli. Ukitaka asikupumbaze, pokea Roho ya Mungu kwa kubatizwa. Ukiipokea Roho ya Mungu utajua mambo ya Mungu, ambayo dunia haiwezi kujua.
author: T.H. White, The Once and Future King

quote: Influence is everything. One wrong influence can single handedly destroy every bit of your innocence and innocence is the root of all wisdom.
author: Mindy McGinnis, Given to the Sea

quote: Never look too far to find a family. Your neighbour is your closest family.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Imagination is a holy impressions.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: You can change your life, one day at a time.
author: Maurice Maeterlinck, Wisdom And Destiny

quote: To live only for pleasure is to die while living.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Battles like that . . .” My voice lowered. “They look like they come down to one person or one action in one big, flashy moment, but they don’t. Major victories come in inches. Each action, each sacrifice, every small act of defiance adds up..
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Humility is the courage to be honest with yourself and those around you.
author: Idries Shah, Learning How to Learn: Psychology and Spirituality in the Sufi Way

quote: He learned that the lives of men are short and filled with pain, yet each one a priceless treasure, whether it be that of a prince or a pig-keeper. And, at the last, the book taught him that while nothing was certain, all was possible. "At the end of knowledge, wisdom begins, Dallben murmured. "And at the end of wisdom there is not grief, but hope.
author: Idries Shah, Learning How to Learn: Psychology and Spirituality in the Sufi Way

quote: We are living in the Selfie Society of Me.
author: King Solomon, The Proverbs of Solomon

quote: Wisdom is the lamp of love, and love is the oil of the lamp. Love, sinking deeper, grows wiser; and wisdom that springs up aloft comes ever the nearer to love. Love is the food of wisdom; wisdom the food of love; a circle of light within which those who love, clasp the hands of those who are wise.
author: Mos Def

quote: You should not judge
author: A.D. Rahman Ahmad

quote: Do your thoughts continue and repeat a cycle Seed, growth, bloom, and seed again
author: Zeno of Citium

quote: We are products of their wisdom or lack of wisdom.
author: John Adrian Robinson

quote: It will never be all that I want it to be…But it is always twice what I expected.
author: James Qualls, A Gathering of Dreams

quote: Be humble: have the courage to speak the truth.
author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

quote: Today it is cheaper to start a business than tomorrow.
author: James Rozoff

quote: I am pain stricken to say that, various “educational” institutions have adopted the medieval doctrine "fear of the lord is the beginning of wisdom" as their motto. Let me tell you this, fear of the Lord, Santa Claus, Krishna, Thor, Hulk or any other imaginary being brings merely the illusion of wisdom, not wisdom. And illusion of wisdom is a billion times more harmful than lack of wisdom.
author: Don Norman, The Design of Everyday Things

quote: Biti dobro upućen u stvari znači lišiti druge mogućnosti da udovolje svojoj taštini, što će pametan čovek uvek nastojati da izbegne.
author: Hazel Gaynor, The Cottingley Secret

quote: El sabio puede cambiar de opinión. El necio, nunca.
author: Robyn Wideman, Son of Soron

quote: It takes wisdom, power and influence to be able to make a positive impact on what goes on in society and in the nation as a whole.
author: Gregory S. Close, In Siege of Daylight

quote: I can arrogantly brag that the doors I choose in life open wide and grant me unobstructed passage. But the widest doors tend to lead to the worst places.
author: Scott Stabile

quote: We ought to, as human beings, have the courage to seek a collective “truth” that benefits our species the most, and to accept that all of our doctrines and beliefs may just be incomplete. That we don’t know it all and that perhaps we never will. That others like us may have something to teach us, and we may have something to contribute to their communities. That communities, types of people, are divisions we’ve created for ourselves. That for all of what we know, the knowledge and wisdom that we have gathered in the few millennia may be a small fraction of what is there to be discovered, understood and applied.
author: Avery Flynn, The Negotiator

quote: To attain the wisdom of every season, you must live all the seasons!
author: Calvin W. Allison

quote: Spread love. Hug the people you care about and make sure they know that you care and appreciate them. Make it known to your friends and family that you love them.
author: Emily Brontë

quote: Stored personal memories along with handed down collective memories of stories, legends, and history allows us to collate our interactions with a physical and social world and develop a personal code of survival. In essence, we all become self-styled sages, creating our own book of wisdom based upon our studied observations and practical knowledge gleaned from living and learning. What we quickly discover is that no textbook exist how to conduct our life, because the world has yet to produce a perfect person – an ideal observer – whom is capable of handing down a concrete exemplar of epistemic virtues. We each draw upon the guiding knowledge, theories, and advice available for us in order to explore the paradoxes, ironies, inconsistencies, and the absurdities encountered while living in a supernatural world. We mold our personal collection of information into a practical practicum how to live and die. Each day we define and redefine who we are, determine how we will react today, and chart our quest into an uncertain future.
author: Tobe Hanson, The Four Seasons Way of Life:: Ancient Wisdom for Healing and Personal Growth

quote: Later that day when I walked down this dried-out riverbed, enjoying the last rays of sunshine on my bare skin, I felt a deep inner peace coming up straight from my heart.
author: Idries Shah, The Dermis Probe

quote: Titles does not make a man. But the grace of thanks.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Is a self help or personal development book ruining your life?
author: Gregory Maguire, Out of Oz

quote: God’s Wisdom is only revealed by His Spirit.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Embrace wisdom and relentlessly pursue joy, and you can live agelessly.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: Suatu mahakarya butuh pengendapan pikiran dan investasi kesabaran.
author: Ken Poirot

quote: Intelligence seeks reasons behind things. Wisdom looks for things behind reasons.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: It’s not that I’ve been invited to the hole I’m standing in. It’s that I accepted the invitation.
author: Don Norman, The Design of Everyday Things

quote: The foundation of wisdom is knowing how to tell when you are totally clueless, lost, and in need of assistance.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: I wrote about the things I discovered along the way and about how whether we believe it or not, everything we need to succeed in life is already present inside us. We just have to find the few.
author: Germany Kent

quote: If you feel anxiety or depression, you are not in the present. You are either anxiously projecting the future or depressed and stuck in the past. The only thing you have any control over is the present moment; simple breathing exercises can make us calm and present instantly.
author: Tobe Hanson, The Four Seasons Way of Life:: Ancient Wisdom for Healing and Personal Growth

quote: Wisdom is the fruit of a balanced development.
author: ANIKOR Daniel

quote: If you want special illumination, look upon the human face:See clearly within laughter the Essence of Ultimate Truth.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: I do not know where to go, but I have been on the road.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Am I still the same Alice? Or have I become a better or worse one?”“Yes,” was the caterpillar’s reply.“Yes, to what?”“It doesn’t matter.
author: Carlos Salinas, The Little Book of Big Quotes: Volume I

quote: It becomes a lot easier to understand people when you realize that not everyone wants or is after the same thing.
author: Carlos Salinas, The Little Book of Big Quotes: Volume I

quote: Die wertvollste Reise ist die Reise zu unserem Selbst.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The right reason and motive for success, while pursued in the right way, will trigger divine support, human celebration and personal fulfillment because the endeavor becomes bigger than oneself.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Once trust is built, distance cannot kill it. Time and space alone cannot destroy authentic connection.
author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

quote: Un país gana más con un año de paz que con diez de guerra.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Human Making is Our Mission: A Treatise on Parenting

quote: Being a fool is a billion times better than being blinded by the illusion of intellect.
author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

quote: Even the wisdom of the wisest depends on the accumulated wisdom of the past!
author: Munia Khan

quote: The question of divine knowledge is so deep that it is really known only to those who have it.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Is man wiser than his Maker?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Wisdom is the best gift you can ever build. It gets you to unimagined heights and knowledge follows it.
author: WISDOM KWASHIE MENSAH (WKM)

quote: No one escape death!
author: Upanishad

quote: Nothing is dark when you embosom your own light within you
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Almost all accidents and injuries happen when an individual is not being present and not paying attention to what they are doing.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: In my experience, it is always worth it to find the love that lives inside you. No matter how deep you have to dig sometimes.
author: Socrates, Apology, Crito and Phaedo of Socrates.

quote: ¿Preguntas cúal es el fundamento de la sabiduría? No gozarte en cosas vanas.
author: otherwise we would all be bored.

quote: Love freelyAsk kindlyLive gentlyLove fiercelyHope infinitelyRage internallyForgive repeatedlySpeak wiselyFeel deeply
author: Idries Shah, Observations

quote: Authentic love must be founded on reciprocal recognition of two freedoms...
author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

quote: A wise person is the one who knows what he knows and what he does not know.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: (God) will always grant us wisdom when we ask. And when we seek Him and obey Him, He works all things out for our good.
author: Alaric Hutchinson, Living Peace

quote: There are paths above the paths, the paths of the birds! There are paths above the paths of the birds, the paths of the clouds! And there are paths above the paths of the clouds, the paths of the planets! When you are travelling on a path, never forget that there are higher paths, there are higher wisdoms over your head!
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The wilderness leads to wonder of the moment.
author: WISDOM KWASHIE MENSAH (WKM)

quote: इतिहास का विश्लेषण, उसकी सामाजिक व्याख्या मनुष्य कि घृणा को तर्क से शमित करती है, पर अतीत तर्क कि पद्धति को स्वीकार नहीं करता, वह केवल आंशिक सत्यो को स्मृति की कहानियो में बदल देता है और उसे सदियों जीवित रखता है .
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Walk while you can.
author: Nora Roberts

quote: You can control the visibility of my name and my popularity, but you cannot control the frequency at which people are quoting me. Truth always rises with time.
author: A.Y.C.C

quote: Practice bravery every day and the self-worth will come.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: When men learn to glimpse the Universe through the eyes of the Spirit, all they see is Love
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Evil is something you need to fight until it ceases trying to control you.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: A man has a hard time feeling fulfilled when he lives a life that does not serve a purpose that is more than himself.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Fire and Ice Legend

quote: ...The world gets blessed every now and then with unique souls who though burdened by their invisible crosses, still have the extraordinary strength to forge ahead in life and give others a helping hand at the same time. Despite their tribulations, most of us think they are fine. Even when the weight of their crosses become unbearable, even when they proceed in a breathless manner, we still have a hard time understanding that they are drowning. In fact, we even condemn them for failing to sacrifice more...
author: Nikolai Gogol, Dead Souls

quote: Every wound is a word.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Me Before Them

quote: The measure of a man is his state of mind.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: You got it all wrong in your way of thinking.
author: Dr. Lucas D. Shallua

quote: Remember it is not you who supports the root, but the root that supports you.
author: Apostle Paul -- Letter to the Romans

quote: knowledge is our enviroment..wisdome, is how we perceive our environment".
author: Ana Claudia Antunes, The Tao of Physical and Spiritual

quote: Those with traditional sense will follow what their heart tells them is right.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

quote: With true love, you can move mountains, make unusual sacrifices, live a life of deprivations and still be happy.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

quote: Most of the truly kind people of this world show some measure of discomfort when offered kindness. Their gratitude stems not only from their understanding of the depth of the force of kindness, but also from their conviction that kindness should not be taken for granted.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

quote: Some honest people think it is better to know the ways of the devil without being evil.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

quote: I think preconceived ideas or prejudgments are meant to give us an edge whenever we are dealing with others we don’t know or haven’t made the effort to understand.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

quote: The writer is the cursed artist of the soul. The expression of his art is a reflection of his quest to understand man by unraveling the mysteries that have been haunting humankind from time immemorial. In the end of his journey to understand man, the writer becomes more human even though his soul ends up finding less peace.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

quote: …the truest feeling of happiness is the security that comes with being loved.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

quote: Singers, actors or artists who touch on sorrow are trying to give comfort to aggrieved souls by giving some meaning to their sorrows.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

quote: why do I want to appear to be drinking more than I am?'Make it a habit. Men in their cups are fools, more often than not. And it can be wise to look the fool at times.
author: Raymond E. Feist, Talon of the Silver Hawk

quote: ...[R]eal wisdom is the property of God, and... human wisdom has little or no value.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Me Before Them

quote: Kindness is a source of relief to the soul of the giver, creating a sense of fortitude that is incomprehensible to those who do not know what kindness is all about.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: The narrow-minded find it convenient to create stereotypes, and then try to fit everybody, everything and every situation into those stereotypes.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: Writers are the most tormented of all the different categories of artists that are out there in the world.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: A writer needs a partner who can act as fuel to his artistic mind, yet has the great ability to sober him up and help him be in sync with the non-artistic part of his soul.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: When somebody you love dies, a phase of life’s innocence dies with that person, and a part of you dies as well.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: …a writer, like most artists, needs a partner who can act as the fuel to his artistic mind and soul, yet has the great ability to sober him up and help him be in sync with the non-artistic part of his soul.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: We, humans, have come up with so many superficialities that are completely unnecessary for our existence and happiness on earth.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: Having a deep sense of understanding is a huge burden for a mind that can’t directly influence things.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

quote: In your selflessness pursuit of things higher than yourself, you appear selfish or inconsiderate to those who truly love you and who have cared deeply about you from the first day you came into their lives.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

quote: Never give up the freeness of your soul. Live your duty to mankind, nurture creatures of this world as a true mother of the earth, but never shut your imagination off from those desires that distinguish you from the ordinary. Never allow yourself to be sapped of that extraordinary energy that is the necessary ingredient for creating something new and progressive.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

quote: The wise shall learn.
author: Fredrik Backman, Beartown

quote: A yesterday missed can never be found even in a fine tomorrow.
author: but most people prefer to identify with an entity for the sake of belonging

quote: My patria vera or true fatherland is the place that enriches my soul.
author: Janvier Chando, The Union Moujik

quote: He learned...never to show his anger or hatred against a stronger adversary, for fear of being crushed.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Flash of the Sun

quote: Only a fool would find happiness from an achievement that is detrimental to those he loves.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Usurper: And Other Stories

quote: One day at a time, one round at a time, one step at time.
author: Jacqueline Winspear, In This Grave Hour

quote: Your passion is your connection to God.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: The art of filmmaking is the most influential form of art that has ever existed throughout the history of human artistic endeavors.
author: Abhijit Naskar, The Film Testament

quote: Make movies my friend – make nice, inspiring and bold movies that will penetrate the darkest corners of the human mind and illuminate the soul.
author: Abhijit Naskar, The Film Testament

quote: The paradise of prayers is like a palace full of precious things.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The only fight should be the fight of faith. Full force of enduring to the end of life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The Truth burns the heart like a hammer breaking a rock.
author: Wayne Chirisa

quote: When You Live Life Too Early, You Learn Life Too Late.
author: Annie Bradshaw

quote: Use filmmaking for a greater purpose, than to just entertain some drowsy minds. Wake the whole world up with your movies. It has been sleeping for long. Its eternal sleep has become its darkest nemesis. Now is the time to wake it up.
author: Abhijit Naskar, The Film Testament

quote: Make friends on your way up since you might need them on your way down.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Joblessness is a time for reflection
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Find solitude and discover ways to add value to yourself
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Time is the source of greatness
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Covert your time for discovery
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Everything depends on the wealth of time
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Wisdom is the ability to see the invisible
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Time can be used to convert anything
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Time is a rare resource and must be invested wisely
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Understand the concept of time and find ways to maximize it effectively
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: In case you’re short on definitions, here’s one. Insanity: ‘Destroying the very things that sustain us.’ And if we’re so short-sighted so as to make such preposterous choices, then it’s not all that preposterous to believe that shortly our end will be in sight.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Getting fired from work is not a tragedy
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The tragedy of life is when you do not know what to do with time
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Life is a totality of time
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Investing in yourself is the best way to utilize time
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Occupy the earth with the multiplication of yourself
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Use your time to gain knowledge
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Use your time to create yourself
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Wisdom is the result of time well spent
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Joblessness gives you the resource through which you can create a new you
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: You can create any product from time
author: Fredrik Backman, Beartown

quote: Our Peter Pan generation is unhappy. All our lives, we want to grow up—to be treated like adults, to have freedom to choose. Then we get here and it turns out being an adult sucks. We pay the bills and taxes, watching others succeed while we are forever waiting for our turn. We believe we are special, but nothing special has come our way.
author: Nnedi Okorafor, Kabu Kabu

quote: ...Never opt for war, no matter how simple it may seem, especially when you know that peace is achievable, even if achieving that peace entails going through a complicated and protracted process,
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Usurper: And Other Stories

quote: … there is no permanence or guarantee in this life.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: ...A canonical leader is someone whose exemplary rule might have appeared to be for the alleviation of the pains and miseries of a particular group, but which in reality is for the advancement of humanism...
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Usurper: And Other Stories

quote: The precious gems are hidden, it is not easy to find them.
author: Brandon Garic Notch

quote: When you build a house You nail down memories Paint and stain the fabric of time
author: Brandon Garic  Notch

quote: If there was one thing I knew, it was that our demons were what shaped who we were. The things we do, the way we act, are all driven by the things we want locked away forever.
author: Marcella Purnama, What I Wish I Had Known

quote: Sometimes it was during the breaks that the real meditation happened - moments when it was obvious that wisdom is not something you have, but a wave-length you tune in to.
author: Brandon Garic  Notch

quote: Money is created from time
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Joblessness gives you unlimited access to wealth
author: Anthea Syrokou

quote: The glory of youth is their strength.
author: he who knows understanding well shall surely know and understand ignorance well

quote: A man who would give advice without understanding is a fool.
author: Munia Khan

quote: When one door closes, a window opens and then zombies pile in and bite you in the ass.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Show the youth the consequences of their actions and why they should choose wisely
author: Jochebed Gwamna

quote: Instead of complaining, discover ways, tactics and tricks on how to reach out to people
author: Daphne du Maurier, My Cousin Rachel

quote: Any society which enjoins its members to adhere to both of these (politeness and truth) is a fraud.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: Most of our brains are out, but it is good what they did for themselves by leaving this country. They are Cameroon’s reserve for development, for the day that this country shall be free. Your late father was an intelligent man. He was even more than that. He was a sage. He once said to me that the intelligent Bamilekés are those who have sought a better future for themselves and for their families in British Cameroons. He was right. They have not been brainwashed as much as their francophone brothers have. If he were alive today, I am sure he would have judged that the intelligent Cameroonians are those who have sought refuge out of Cameroon.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: Ignorance has one virtue: persistence. It will insist through dogged persistence on leading others to follow its vision no matter how misguided. Ignorance will drive the world to the brink of failure and catastrophe and beyond into the abyss with arrogance and anger because wisdom is often too polite to fight. Wisdom doesn’t like to impose its will, but that is all ignorance understands—force over free will and choice. Sooner or later the world comes to its senses, but oh the damage that has been done.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: …what else do we have to ensure our sanity except our love for something beyond ourselves―our love for our families, our love for our fatherland?
author: Efrat Cybulkiewicz

quote: Evil is of the devil.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Life is a mighty joke that is not meant to be funny.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Disciples of Fortune

quote: Remember these, Sons! Truth presented with tenderness enriches the soul of man and enhances humanity in the process. A Franco-Cameroonian relation based on truth and nurtured with tenderness will be to the benefit not only of Kamerun and France, but also of mankind as a whole.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: A woman’s love is all a man should expect from his wife. That love could be translated into so many positive things, especially if it is reciprocated.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: ...political realism is the way forward for any system that is genuinely for humanity or for the interest and advancement of the people of this world.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: The vicissitude of life teaches us about our limitations in a world with no guarantees and permanence.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: Huh! Mankind always comes up with ideas to make up for the follies of the status quo. But what happens if those ideas are inflexible and fail to respond to the changing times. They end up betraying the people who believed in them.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Disciples of Fortune

quote: Lies and partial truths complicate life.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Disciples of Fortune

quote: ...only the dreamers of a dream are capable of translating their dreams into worthy practical endeavors that are devoid of haunting errors. After all, they are the ones who carefully observed the link between their dreams and reality; they are the ones who worked consciously to blend them into one.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Disciples of Fortune

quote: It is better for a realist to bend his will and ethics to accommodate a true friend than it is for him to stick to his principles that may turn the friend into an adversary.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Disciples of Fortune

quote: ...History is the key to the unity of a people. Its nostalgia pulls them together. Its gloom separates them further. Its successes make them stronger.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: The best trip is the journey you take in finding yourself.
author: Zack Love

quote: Religion without reason is merely an illusion of religion – it is a mockery of religion, like it has become today.
author: Angela Vallely

quote: I strive everyday to be a great parent so my kids can be better people when they move out into the world on their own.
author: Harper Lee, To Kill a Mockingbird

quote: When the mind is without fear and prejudice, and the head is held high with the strength of reasoning, then only the brightest rays of religion can penetrate the darkest corners of the human society.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons

quote: After which, satisfied with the way he had conducted himself at Meung, free of remorse for the past, confident in the present, and full of hope for the future, he went to bed and slept the sleep of the just.
author: Kent Nerburn, Neither Wolf nor Dog: On Forgotten Roads with an Indian Elder

quote: Just remember that people who are known for their looks are rarely known for anything else.
author: Melissa  Jennings, Afterlife

quote: All the tools, techniques and technology in the world are nothing without the head, heart and hands to use them wisely, kindly and mindfully
author: Efrat Cybulkiewicz

quote: Emotions can become habits - she said haltingly as she wiped her eyes. But habits can be changed".
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: Imagination blocks you like a bolt on a door. Burn that bar. (Rumi)
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: If they had learned anything together, it was that wisdom comes to us when it can no longer do any good.
author: Jonathan Star, Tao Te Ching

quote: Release your Mind and go outside the box.Explore things that you may be afraid of.Experience life that you are not aware of.You will then know what you have never known before.You will be a new person with each new experience
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: Mindfulness and compassion can give you the power, illumination, love, and wisdom to draw higher forms, thoughts, feelings, and situations into your life.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Wise Mating: A Treatise on Monogamy

quote: To be productive, effective and to live a life of understanding and wisdom is not to waste time
author: Donna Goddard, Waldmeer

quote: Wisdom is not a mysterious universe where your mind enters but it is a mysterious universe which enters your mind!
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: There is nothing to fearFrom your reflection
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: True Love is when you are able to see yourself in another, when you recognize that there is no separation between you and any other Being in the Universe.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman, The Answer Is YOU: A Guide to Mental, Emotional, and Spiritual Freedom

quote: You are not limited to this body, to this mind, or to this reality—you are a limitless ocean of Consciousness, imbued with infinite potential. You are existence itself.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman, The Answer Is YOU: A Guide to Mental, Emotional, and Spiritual Freedom

quote: Examples of fractals are everywhere in nature. They can be found in the patterns of trees, branches, and ferns, in which each part appears to be a smaller image of the whole. They are found in the branch-like patterns of river systems, lightning, and blood vessels. They can be seen in snowflakes, seashells, crystals, and mountain ranges. We can even see the holographic and fractal-like nature of reality in the structure of the Universe itself, as the clusters of galaxies and dark matter resemble the neurons in our brain, the mycelium network of fungi, as well as the network of the man-made Internet.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman, The Answer Is YOU: A Guide to Mental, Emotional, and Spiritual Freedom

quote: Negative means separating energies, while positive means unifying energies. It’s not about being ‘good’ or ‘bad’ – energy is quite neutral, actually… one just feels better. Simply imagine that being negative creates distance between the hearts of two people, while being positive brings them closer together.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman, The Answer Is YOU: A Guide to Mental, Emotional, and Spiritual Freedom

quote: Everything we perceive to be solid and static is made up of almost entirely empty space.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman, The Answer Is YOU: A Guide to Mental, Emotional, and Spiritual Freedom

quote: Subject and object are not separate—so-called objective reality is projected by our subjective Consciousness.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman, The Answer Is YOU: A Guide to Mental, Emotional, and Spiritual Freedom

quote: If you want to conquer fear then you have to put fear on your fears.
author: Kwaku Owusu Jnr

quote: It’s true that many overly negative people actually fear letting go of their negativity, and it’s because it has become a part of their identity. If this is the case, make it a smoother transition by releasing and replacing one negative opinion at a time. It certainly is an identity shift, but it’s one that brings greater fulfillment and life satisfaction.
author: Efrat Cybulkiewicz

quote: To make your Opinion Count,you have to do something morethan just making Money.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Wise Mating: A Treatise on Monogamy

quote: The more we humanize the society, the more we will become humans.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Wise Mating: A Treatise on Monogamy

quote: We are like waves in the ocean, each with a unique character and quality on the surface, but deep down we are eternally connected to one another and to the ocean as a whole. If you practice looking beyond the surface of appearances, you will begin to see the true Being that lies within each form. You will see your Consciousness looking through the eyes of another, and it is when you see yourself in another that you cannot help but develop compassion for them; because in Truth, there is no “them,” there is only YOU, experiencing yourself from an inconceivable amount of perspectives.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman

quote: Heshima hujengwa kwa hekima, haijengwi kwa misuli.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman, The Answer Is YOU: A Guide to Mental, Emotional, and Spiritual Freedom

quote: Because we feel ourselves to be separate from the world in which we live, we have also grown to feel quite alone in this world. Our sense of loneliness and isolation not only makes us feel depressed and miserable, but it also causes us to be anxious and afraid of the world and everyone in it. Because of this inherent fear, we put up all kinds of barriers to protect us from the world—barriers that we have created to keep us safe, but that really end up making us feel more alone, more miserable, and more afraid, as they prevent us from being our natural selves.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman, The Answer Is YOU: A Guide to Mental, Emotional, and Spiritual Freedom

quote: It is because we feel that we are separate from nature that we also feel it is okay to manipulate it, pollute it, and cause it harm. We project our inner turmoil onto the planet, causing outer turmoil. Nearly all of the disasters of our time—war, famine, oppression, social injustice, environmental pollution, extinction—arise from this delusional belief that we have an existence independent of the world we live in. All of this misery, all of this destruction, all of this pain and suffering, is caused by our failure to realize that there is no separation and that really we are all one.
author: DeWayne Owens

quote: No label can define the immensity of your True nature. You are the awareness that precedes every label, the awareness that is perceiving these words and turning them into thoughts, the awareness that creates the world with every act of observation.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman, The Answer Is YOU: A Guide to Mental, Emotional, and Spiritual Freedom

quote: Store up knowledge. Then question your own knowledge in order to expand your mind, both to build and to create more space. Then store up more knowledge. And so on. That is wisdom.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman, The Answer Is YOU: A Guide to Mental, Emotional, and Spiritual Freedom

quote: If your consciousness is without form, without quality, and without characteristics of any kind, would that not imply that the consciousness in every other being is also formless? And if they are all without form, how can you distinguish their consciousness from your own? What forms would you use to compare them? Isn’t the observing you exactly the same as the observing them?
author: Joseph P. Kauffman, The Answer Is YOU: A Guide to Mental, Emotional, and Spiritual Freedom

quote: When we look at a tree, we do not see the tree for what it really is. We see how it appears to us on the surface, and we dismiss it as being just another form in the Universe. We fail to realize that the tree is connected to the Universe on every level; that all of nature is expressing itself through that single form. There can be no tree without the earth that it grows from, the sun that gives it energy, the water that nourishes its growth, and the millions of fungi and bacteria fertilizing its soil. Looking deeply into anything in nature, we realize that it is connected to the whole. We see that nature is one seamless web, and the notion that things have an existence of their own is merely an illusion.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman, The Answer Is YOU: A Guide to Mental, Emotional, and Spiritual Freedom

quote: Buddhist philosophy points out that the true nature of all forms is essentially formless. Forms do not have an existence of their own, but rather they arise together, and are mutually dependent on one another. Everything in the world of form is constantly changing, constantly dying, and constantly being reborn—which is why Buddhists say that there is no-self; no form that has an existence in and of itself.
author: Alaric Hutchinson, Living Peace

quote: Every being experiences themselves as the center of their experience. Consciousness is what lies at our very core, and connects us all to each other. We may appear to be separate and individual because of the various forms our Consciousness inhabits, but below the surface the substance of our being is one and the same.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman, The Answer Is YOU: A Guide to Mental, Emotional, and Spiritual Freedom

quote: And don’t forget: Elvendork! It’s unisex!
author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

quote: As swords were designed to killThey did well to make them tongue-shaped.(Anwar-i-Suhaili)
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Perfect understanding of the infinite requires limitless intellectual capacity
author: Gina Barreca

quote: the more you know the less you want to do
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: ...Vezi câte s-au întâmplat odinioară?... În zilele noastre însă nu mai întâlnești nimic, nici fapte, nici oameni, nici poveşti ca cele din trecut... Oare de ce?... Ia spune-mi! Aşa-i că nu poți să-mi spui?!... Ce știi tu? Ce știți voi tinerii? Ehei! Privește cu luare-aminte în trecut... şi acolo vei găsi răspuns la toate... Da voi nu vreți să vă uitați în urmă, şi, de aceea, nu știți să trăiți...Parcă eu nu văd cum e viața de astăzi? Ah, văd prea bine, cu toate că mi-a slăbit vederea! Văd că oamenii nu mai trăiesc, ci doar încearcă să trăiască, istovindu-şi în zadar toată vlaga din ei... Şi după ce s-au prădat chiar pe ei, pierzându-şi vremea în zadar, încep să se plângă de soartă. Ce amestec are ea în toate acestea? Fiecare își croiește singur soarta lui! În ziua de azi văd tot felul de oameni, dar oameni puternici nu mai văd!
author: Dr. Kyaciss Pfiell

quote: Old people have wisdom but not energy; young people have energy but not wisdom; energy and wisdom must be in the same body to create a much better civilisation! To do this, we will either give energy to the old or we will give wisdom to the young and for now the latter seems a more plausible action!
author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

quote: If we feel good, we can keep going in the direction of the reality we’re creating. If we don’t feel good, we may reflect upon our beliefs and change them according to the reality we do wish to create.
author: Roman Payne, Hope and Despair

quote: In essence the journey to wisdom is a study of self,The conscious, sub-conscious and unconscious self.
author: C.S. Lewis, The Screwtape Letters

quote: We live that we might have experience; that through it we might gain wisdom, compassion, faith, and inner strength.
author: Eraldo Banovac

quote: You have to learn where your weaknesses end and your strengths starts or you will spend your life focusing on all that falls apart.
author: distress is the only real reason to question something

quote: I understand why King Solomon asked for wisdom from God. For wisdom is like oil to a lamp, what would be the essence of having a lamp without oil in darkness?.
author: Jennifer Niven, Velva Jean Learns to Fly

quote: The ultimate aim of assimilating knowledge is to create new ideas or gain wisdom.
author: Levon  Peter Poe

quote: The little Otak was hiding in the rafters of the house, as it did when strangers entered. There it stayed while the rain beat on the walls and the fire sank down and the night wearing slowly along left the old woman nodding by the hearthpit. Then the otak crept down and came to Ged where he lay stretched stiff and still upon the bed. It began to lick his hands and wrists, long and patiently, with its dry leaf-brown tongue. Crouching beside his head it licked his temple, his scarred cheek, and softly his closed eyes. And very slowly under that soft touch Ged roused. He woke, not knowing where he had been or where he was or what was the faint grey light in the air about him, which was the light of dawn coming to the world. Then the otak curled up near his shoulder as usual, and went to sleep.Later, when Ged thought back upon that night, he knew that had none touched him when he lay thus spirit-lost, had none called him back in some way, he might have been lost for good. It was only the dumb instinctive wisdom of the beast who licks his hurt companion to comfort him, and yet in that wisdom Ged saw something akin to his own power, something that went as deep as wizardry. From that time forth he believed that the wise man is one who never sets himself apart from other living things, whether they have speech or not, and in later years he strove to learn what can be learned, in silence, from the eyes of animals, the flight of birds, the great slow gestures of trees
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: First it was "The Silent Generation", then "Generation Boomers", then "Generation X", then "Generation Y" and as last "Generation Z".
author: Robert Walser, Jakob von Gunten

quote: Sin, blasphemy, heresy – all these are primitive ideas created by primitive creatures, unworthy of the title “human”.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Either Civilized or Phobic: A Treatise on Homosexuality

quote: True beauty is not related to what color your hair is or what color your eyes are. True beauty is about who you are as a human being, your principles, your moral compass.
author: Stephen Chbosky, The Perks of Being a Wallflower

quote: Newt Scamander : "My philosophy is that worrying means you suffer twice.
author: it only shines because the sun is there.

quote: There is something beautiful about all scars of whatever nature. A scar means the hurt is over, the wound is closed and healed, done with.
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon, Dream Chaser

quote: Strike the shepherd and the sheep will scatter
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Open your mind before your mouth
author: Steve Harvey, Act Like a Lady, Think Like a Man: What Men Really Think About Love, Relationships, Intimacy, and Commitment

quote: The way of the miracle-worker is to see all human behavior as one two things: either love, or a call for love.
author: Paulo Coelho, Manuscript Found in Accra

quote: The comfort zone is a psychological state in which one feels familiar, safe, at ease, and secure.If you always do what is easy and choose the path of least resistance, you never step outside your comfort zone. Great things don’t come from comfort zones.
author: Richard Bandler

quote: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending." i love it so much
author: Michelle Sutton, Never Without Hope

quote: There was an enjoyment to being alive, he felt, that because of an underlying meaninglessness–like how a person alone for too long cannot feel comfortable when with others; cannot neglect that underlying the feeling of belongingness is the certainty, really, of loneliness, and nothingness, and so experiences life in that hurried, worthless way one experiences a mistake–he could no longer get at.
author: Randolph J. Rogers, The Key of Life; A Metaphysical Investigation

quote: A woman who writes has power, and a woman with power is feared.
author: Mo Stegall

quote: Write the book you want to read
author: Kendrick Nguyen

quote: When there is nothing left to give somone in need, we give them what we do have. We give them Divine Love, faith, and friendship. This is always enough to see anyone through anything. This, my friends, is how we save the world. (pg.99 of A Journey In to Divine Love)
author: Roy  Bennett

quote: When angels visit us, we do not hear the rustle of wings, nor feel the feathery touch of the breast of a dove; but we know their presence by the love they create in our hearts.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: when you have no spirit to seize the day, find it behind the music, between the flowing leaves, beneath the sun rays, and just within yourself. Talk to yourself, be the best friend for yourself, and do not hesitate to ask God help
author: April Cofield Essix, From Crack to Christ: A Witness

quote: Regardless of how black the page, he had always managed to turn it and move on to a new chapter in his life.
author: excuses are.

quote: Here is a universal law: that when it comes to negative and positive, you will always thrive more powerfully in the positive if you have first been immersed in, and have heroically overcome, the polar opposite negative of that thing. To abide in the positive existence of something, without having known and overcome it’s polar opposite— that is to be only a frame of the real structure. Easily toppled down and taken apart. True power is in the hands of the one who thrives in the positive, after having known and conquered the negative. Because when the demons come along, she will say to those demons: “I know you, I have owned you, but now you bow down to me.
author: Michael R. Krozer, Diary of a Short Life

quote: When you trust your inner guidance and begin moving in the direction of your dreams (aligned with your individual gifts) you will be cloaked in an armor bestowed upon you by your guardian angel.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Set goals that make your heart sing. Then achieving them is an experience of uplifting joy.
author: Roy  Bennett

quote: I’m barely human. I’m more like a creature; to me, everything gives off a scent! Thoughts, moments, feelings, movements, words left unsaid, words barely spoken; they all have a distinct sense, distinct fragrances! Both a smell and a touch! To inhale is to capture, to experience! I can perceive and I can “touch” in so many odd ways! And so I am made up of all these scents, all these feelings! An illumination of nerve endings!
author: Sue Nelson Buckley

quote: Truth even in the most whispered tones will always roar.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Do not be complacent about your achievements and not to strive for continual improvement when you get to the top. As soon as you let success go to your head, you sink into following familiar patterns and play it safe. In other words, you risk losing your edge.
author: Mohammed Sekouty

quote: Success is the relentless pursuit of joy.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Wishes are possibilities. Dare to make a wish.
author: Vishwas Chavan, Vishwasutras: Universal Principles for Living: Inspired by Real-Life Experiences

quote: Dear Marie Tussaud,Fake people are everywhere, you do not have to waste wax creating them
author: Haritha Velpureddy

quote: Minat, bakat serta peluang jarang bertindan buat seseorang. Antara ketiga-tiga elemen ini, peluang paling payah hendak dikecapi. Maka, peluang harus menjadi faktor penentu dalam membuat keputusan.
author: Louise Blackwick, Vivian Amberville - The Weaver of Odds

quote: Love has a certain element of tenderness, which alone pierces through the heart and binds us more intimately than any force in the universe ever can.
author: Kim Ha Campbell, Inner Peace Outer Abundance

quote: Don’t let past disappointments rob you of future happiness.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: A star is a rock that could no longer hide its beauty from the world.
author: Mark W Boyer

quote: Being different is not being odd
author: T.H. White, The Sword in the Stone

quote: When you fall short of your goals and dreams ask yourself is it your mindset, perspective, expectations, effort, approach, acceptance, company or a blend of these that needs to change.
author: Bible

quote: I work to make human beings out of human bodies. I work to make conscience out of mindlessness. I work to make Gods out of obedient worshippers.
author: Abhijit Naskar, I Am The Thread: My Mission

quote: The Holy Scripture reveals spiritual realities.
author: Liza Osae-Kwapong

quote: I am emotionally fluid and safe.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: Thirty two men keep guarding the tongue. Since it keeps a sense, still speaks non sense.
author: Mirza Sharafat Hussain Beigh

quote: Your inner critic is simply a part of you that needs more self-love.
author: Munia Khan

quote: Speak to yourself with compassion on the inside and you will radiate peace on the outside.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: When you love people, you are curious about who they are, what they think, and how they feel. You watch them closely, wondering about their experience and what you can do to make it more enjoyable. You feel compassion for their pain and seek to make it more bearable. You are eager to learn the unique language of their existence. You want to under-stand them, inspire them, heal them. What if you could look at yourself this way?
author: Max McKeown, #NOW: The Surprising Truth About the Power of Now

quote: The ocean is never afraid of wind rising against it
author: St. John

quote: To wake up every day with a whisper of a dream and then put pen to paper to make it a reality
author: Vijay Kedia

quote: Once you eliminate the persona that was created to survive. The real you will have permission to come forward, and enjoy the life that is meant to thrive.
author: Tai Lopez

quote: The ordinary are here to fit into the world
author: Apoorva Prajapati

quote: Be the person you needed when you needed help.
author: Amy Matayo

quote: Always please God FIRSTAll the timeEvery time
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Ignorance may be light as much as it may be a deemer
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Without inner peace we have nothing.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Taking care of yourself will take care of more than yourself.
author: Grace Sara, Awakening in the 21st Century: Considering Existence

quote: To act upon the outer world and change it, you must be first be fine to act upon yourself.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: You receive the gift of time freely and equally every day, beautifully wrapped in twenty-four new hours to invest in whatever you want, and how you use each hour decides your success or the lack of it
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The secret to succeeding in business, is in the first two letters of business... BU.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: You are no greater than the knowledge you acquire, the desires you harbor, and the experiences you cherish.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: From my own limited experience, I have found that the greatest degree of inner tranquility comes from the development of love and compassion. The more we care for the happiness of others, the greater our own sense of well-being becomes. Cultivating a close, warmhearted feeling for others automatically puts the mind at ease. This helps remove whatever fears or insecurities we may have and gives us the strength to cope with any obstacles we encounter. It is the ultimate source of success in life.
author: Unknown

quote: Life is impact and you have not lived unless you leave a trail
author: Christian  Michael

quote: If someone gave you the rules to the game you have been playing right away, you would miss the most exciting part – the details. Sometimes it’s all about the details, they make the whole more meaningful.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Pride be damned, we do what must be done to survive.
author: Vishnu Kanchan

quote: Wishing you blessings of good health and wealth. May Joy and Peace be your followers.
author: Aditi Agarwal

quote: Find something about yourself to laugh about every day.
author: Karla Diggs

quote: Attention is the beginning of devotion.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Best Chance: A Guide to Discovering Your Purpose, Reaching Your Potential, Experiencing Fulfilment and Achieving Success in Any Area of Life

quote: The abundant life should include all that life has freely given you – love, good health, success, prosperity, happiness, joy, spirituality, fulfilment, wisdom, purpose, growth and excitement.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Good Life: Transform your life through one good day

quote: You need time, perseverance, and patience to develop the character and abilities required for success.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Life is not about running away from your problems. It is about facing the problem, fixing it and then keep going until you stumble to another problem. The most important thing is never stopping.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: His pen spoke more to her than he ever did”.In the war of words, some are unwritten and some are unspoken.
author: Nishikant, The Papery Onions

quote: You have mastered the art of discipline when you are able to act according to what you ultimately desire rather than how you feel in the present moment.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Ninety-five per cent of your success or failure will come from your daily habits.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: The ability to make yourself do what needs to be done at the appropriate time and in the appropriate manner – irrespective of your feelings – marks the true test of self-discipline.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: The investment you make in others is transferred to everyone they influence long after you’re gone. Significance
author: Mensah Oteh, Wisdom Keys In Words: A collection of the Inspirational words that will change your life

quote: If you see success as a race, then you will start eagerly with enthusiasm and passion with the hope of finishing quickly but there is much more to your success journey than your duration and speed.
author: Confucius

quote: Courage isn’t instinctive or genetic
author: Chris Pepple, Without a Voice

quote: The depth of love is immeasurable, when you scale it, you will only see and experience it to the degree of your scales.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: You will only ever achieve the level of success that matches your wisdom or personal development level.
author: read them.

quote: Your wisdom decides your value, the size of the problems you can solve, the opportunities you create, and ultimately the level of success you experience.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Don’t ask what it will cost or how much of your time you will have to sacrifice. Instead, ask what it’s worth.
author: Mensah Oteh, Wisdom Keys in Words: A collection of the Inspirational words that will change your life

quote: If you wish to be and remain successful, invest a minimum of five to ten per cent of your income each month and your time each day on your personal growth and development.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Good Life: Transform your life through one good day

quote: Acting courageously is about knowing and making the right choices based on a deep conviction that dwarfs fear, doubt, and worry.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Best Chance: A Guide to Discovering Your Purpose, Reaching Your Potential, Experiencing Fulfilment and Achieving Success in Any Area of Life

quote: You might fear you don’t have what it takes, but you don’t need to have all the answers or everything figured right from the start.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Best Chance: A Guide to Discovering Your Purpose, Reaching Your Potential, Experiencing Fulfilment and Achieving Success in Any Area of Life

quote: Until you develop the courage to pursue that dream in your heart, you will never reach your true potential.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: At the end of your life you want to arrive at a well-designed destination rather than an unexpected destination, and you do this by setting life goals, not short-term, not medium, not long-term, but life goals.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Best Chance: A Guide to Discovering Your Purpose, Reaching Your Potential, Experiencing Fulfilment and Achieving Success in Any Area of Life

quote: Goals reveal your path to success, greatness and significance. Become a master goal setter and you will chart the course of your life.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: The best way to discredit something is to come with a better way of doing that thing.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Best Chance: A Guide to Discovering Your Purpose, Reaching Your Potential, Experiencing Fulfilment and Achieving Success in Any Area of Life

quote: Achieving your goal should always be of secondary importance. Your focus should be on becoming the kind of person deserving of the goal.
author: Irina Binder, Fluturi

quote: Joy is a fruit of the Holy Spirit, which is most greatly experienced in the heart of those willing to surrender all self-sufficiency: self-promotion, self-reliance, self-protection, and self-absorption: it is a gift given.
author: Dr. Jacinta Mpalyenkana, Ph.D, MBA

quote: You must discipline yourself consistently to do what others do occasionally in order to have the future few will get to experience.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Working hard alone without being smart and consistent won’t lead to success.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Good Life: Transform your life through one good day

quote: Hard work without purpose seldom leads to success.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Best Chance: A Guide to Discovering Your Purpose, Reaching Your Potential, Experiencing Fulfilment and Achieving Success in Any Area of Life

quote: They are probably the single most important deciding factor for long-term success, and your ability to set and make plans to achieve them is the master skill to your successful future.
author: Mensah Oteh, Wisdom Keys In Words: A collection of the Inspirational words that will change your life

quote: Life isn’t about what you have, it’s about who you are.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Best Chance: A Guide to Discovering Your Purpose, Reaching Your Potential, Experiencing Fulfilment and Achieving Success in Any Area of Life

quote: Your associations play a crucial part of your success equation. Study them closely because they will help or hinder you from reaching your potential.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Others have seen and experienced the good, the bad, and the ugly, and their experiences serve as models you can learn from.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Best Chance: A Guide to Discovering Your Purpose, Reaching Your Potential, Experiencing Fulfilment and Achieving Success in Any Area of Life

quote: Although failure is a good learning experience, you don’t have to go through life making mistakes if they can be avoided.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: The pursuit of any worthwhile goal requires that you give up something that feels comfortable, secure, and safe in the moment to get you closer to your future dreams.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Your willingness to sacrifice who you are today for who you need to be in the future is a necessary decision on the success journey.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Best Chance: A Guide to Discovering Your Purpose, Reaching Your Potential, Experiencing Fulfilment and Achieving Success in Any Area of Life

quote: Those in your inner circle can significantly influence your success and the progress you make towards achieving your dreams.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Good Life: Transform your life through one good day

quote: The first step may be the hardest, but once you take action you create motion, which in turn builds momentum.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Waiting for things to happen is like daydreaming. To break out of that cycle, you must be willing to take the first small step.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: If your actions are combined with proper planning and perseverance, there are no heights you cannot attain.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Feedback is to success like rest is to the body.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: When you tune into your soul essence and are in harmony with the Supreme, you are tapped into your superpowers.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: The most successful individuals and leaders achieve their dreams because they have a clear vision they have committed their life to.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Best Chance: A Guide to Discovering Your Purpose, Reaching Your Potential, Experiencing Fulfilment and Achieving Success in Any Area of Life

quote: The power and magnetic pull of your vision is hinged on the purpose and passion behind it and, most importantly, the intent.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Your vision is a glimpse of your purpose and a picture of your larger dream.
author: St. Hildegard of Bingen

quote: Our labor here is brief, but the reward is eternal. Do not be disturbed by the clamor of the world, which passes like a shadow. Do not let false delights of a deceptive world deceive you.
author: Mensah Oteh, Wisdom Keys In Words: A collection of the Inspirational words that will change your life

quote: It’s difficult to accept full responsibility and apportion blame at the same time – you have to choose one.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Best Chance: A Guide to Discovering Your Purpose, Reaching Your Potential, Experiencing Fulfilment and Achieving Success in Any Area of Life

quote: It’s easy to play the victim card (all of us have done this), but this mindset is one of the greatest obstacles to progress and growth.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: A mediocre idea acted on is of more value than a handful of brilliant ideas that remain in your mind.
author: dreams and incredible ideas alone do nothing. Action is needed to create change.

quote: Taking consistent action is guaranteed to increase the probability of your success. When combined with proper planning and perseverance, there are no heights you cannot attain.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Good Life: Transform your life through one good day

quote: Action is where sacrifice is honoured and where you require persistence and courage to endure all that life throws in your direction.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: To achieve your dreams you must be willing to take massive action over a long period, even when there is no evidence of progress.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: We will be able to depart this life with the quiet peace-giving notion, that we were permitted to contribute to the happiness of many who will live after us. In our long lives we endeavored to unfold the collective consciousness. In our lives we have known hell and heaven; the final balance, however, is that we helped pave the way to dynamic harmony in this earthly house. That, I believe, is the meaning of life.
author: Seth D.

quote: The greatest health shall be happiness.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I love you" means I want you to be happy.
author: Richard L.  Ratliff

quote: The more we practice sympathetic joy, the more we come to realize that the happiness we share with others is inseparable from our own happiness.
author: Sharon Salzberg, Real Love: The Art of Mindful Connection

quote: Some bow to the spirit of collectivism, while you ascend to the spirit of your own eclectic rhythms.
author: Sumrit Shahi, Just Friends

quote: A person who thinks he is right, causes great hurt to others and that is why hurt will come to him. A person who believes ‘I am right’, causes a lot of pain to others.
author: Georges Simenon, Maigret a peur

quote: We do not recognize that we are addicted to some negative psychological habit, some terribly self-destructive patterns of thinking...
author: Abhysheq Shukla, KARMA

quote: Karma is the balance sheet of life which debits and credit all your deeds.YourWhich is audited by our creator and actions are based on what we accumulated in it.
author: Abhysheq Shukla, KARMA

quote: Desires and Karma are the worst enemies living in the same soul together. It depends on us whom we choose and feed.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Think good for yourself ,good will follow you.when you think good for others ,happiness will follow you and when happiness follows you, people will follow you.
author: Shahid H. Raja

quote: No hay felicidad más grande que la que sientes al ayudar a los demás.
author: Эльчин Сафарли

quote: Happiness is the purpose of humans so it must need to be for the good of others otherwise one’s happiness could hurt many others.
author: Mohadesa Najumi

quote: Unfortunately, wisdom and happiness are old enemies, and where one can be found, the other seldom lingers. - Wolloff
author: Erik Pevernagie

quote: Gratitude is a miracle of its own recognition. It brings out a sense of appreciation and sincerity of a being.
author: Lisa Cypers Kamen, Are We Happy Yet?: Eight Keys to Unlocking a Joyful Life

quote: Seeing thou hast now given me the way, I will proceed to speak before thee: for our mother, of whom thou hast told me that she is young, draw now nigh unto age.
author: Compton Gage

quote: You do not love me
author: Diadjeng Laraswati H

quote: Consider with thyself; as the rain is more than the drops, and as the fire is greater than the smoke; but the drops and the smoke remain behind: so the quantity which is past did more exceed.
author: Compton Gage

quote: The land, that thou see now to have root, shall thou see wasted suddenly.
author: Compton Gage

quote: He shall rule, whom they look not for that dwell upon the earth, and the fowls shall take their flight away together:
author: Compton Gage

quote: Salt waters shall be found in the sweet, and all friends shall destroy one another; then shall wit hide itself, and understanding withdraw itself into his secret chamber-
author: Compton Gage

quote: To shew thee such tokens I have leave; and if thou wilt pray again, and weep as now, and fast even days, thou shall hear yet greater things.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Hear me, and I will instruct thee; hearken to the thing that I say, and I shall tell thee more.
author: Compton Gage

quote: O Lord that bear rule, who may know these things, but he that had not his dwelling with men?
author: Compton Gage

quote: Behold, O Lord, yet art thou nigh unto them that be reserved till the end: and what shall they do that have been before me, or we that be now, or they that shall come after us?
author: Compton Gage

quote: The creature may not haste above the maker
author: Compton Gage

quote: She cannot: but must do it by distance of time.
author: Compton Gage

quote: What man is able to do that, that thou should ask such things of me?
author: Compton Gage

quote: Thine own things, and such as are grown up with thee, canst thou not know; How should thy vessel then be able to comprehend the way of the Highest, and, the world being now outwardly corrupted to understand the corruption that is evident in my sight?
author: Compton Gage

quote: Verily it is a foolish thought that they both have devised, for the ground is given unto the wood, and the sea also had its place to bear its floods.
author: Compton Gage

quote: I beseech thee, O Lord, let me have understanding: For it was not my mind to be curious of the high things, but of such as pass by us daily.
author: Compton Gage

quote: We pass away out of the world as grasshoppers, and our life is astonishment and fear, and we are not worthy to obtain mercy.
author: Compton Gage

quote: The more thou search, the more thou shall marvel; for the world hast fast to pass away-
author: Compton Gage

quote: If therefore that which is sown be not turned upside down, and if the place where the evil is sown passes not away, then cannot it come that is sown with good?
author: Compton Gage

quote: How, and when shall these things come to pass? wherefore are our years few and evil?
author: Compton Gage

quote: O Lord that bear rule, even we all are full of impiety. And for our sakes peradventure it is that the floors of the righteous are not filled, because of the sins of them that dwell upon the earth.
author: Compton Gage

quote: From the beginning, look, what thou desires to see, it shall be shew thee.
author: Compton Gage

quote: When one grows older one learns that happiness—complete and unadulterated happiness—comes only in moments, and must be recognized and savored to the full, for even in the happiest life, the complete joy is not always present.
author: Fay Weldon, Female Friends

quote: In the end, you will realize most friendship is feigning, most loving mere folly.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: As thou know not what is the way of the spirit, nor how the bones do grow in the womb of her that is with child: even so thou know not the works of what makes all.
author: Compton Gage

quote: These be they that have put off the mortal clothing, and put on the immortal, and have confessed the name of God: now are they crowned, and receive palms.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Weigh thou therefore their wickedness now in the balance, and theirs also that dwell the world; and so shall thy name no where be found anymore.
author: but not the heathen.

quote: The struggles we endure today will be the ‘good old days’ we laugh about tomorrow.
author: Aaron Lauritsen, 100 Days Drive: The Great North American Road Trip

quote: Acceptance is an important part of serenity. It is not enough, however, simply to accept the things we cannot change. For me, serenity comes from not having any investment in the outcome. If I am genuinely serene, then it will not matter to me whether things change or stay the same. Either way, I choose to be happy.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Being grateful for what you have is the key to peace and happiness.
author: Kasie West, By Your Side

quote: Emotions are the road signs to your happiness.
author: Christopher West

quote: It takes a lot of courage to be happy.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Knowing that you can endure a very difficult challenge offers a degree of confidence that the next challenge can also be endured.
author: Auliq-Ice

quote: I told you that I needed you. But now I need you to survive. Forever. I won’t live through this without you, and I’m selfish for telling you that, but it’s the truth. You’re my rock, Danika. I can’t ever lose you, or I’ll follow Jared, I know I will.
author: Robyn Carr, My Kind of Christmas

quote: Something, somewhere, knows what’s best for me and promises to keep sending me people and experiences to light my way as long as I live in gratitude and keep paying attention to the signs.
author: Dave Pelzer, A Child Called "It"

quote: Worry looks back, Hope looks forward, but Faith always looks up.
author: Cora Carmack, Losing It

quote: All we know, Midnight. The best of all we know. For Chestry Valley and its master we loved. For Nana. For Sugarloaf and Brimstone Farm. For Pop and Mom and Tom. For the foals to come. For yesterday and for all tomorrows, we dance the best we know. For good-by.
author: Crockett Johnson, Harold and the Purple Crayon

quote: When we love something we never give up.
author: Amanda Linsmeier, Beach Glass & Other Broken Things

quote: I see your painas clearly as I feel my own.I will share your burden so you feel it less.Do not hate this world.Do not hate these people.I will share my hopeso you feel it more.I want you to see our loveas clearly as I feel yours.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: A hummingbird cake, she decided as she turned on the kitchen light. It was made with bananas and pineapples and pecans and had a cream cheese frosting.She would make it light enough to float away.She reached over to open the window. To float to her daughter.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Even the tiniest of flowers can have the toughest roots.
author: Karina Halle, Before I Ever Met You

quote: I have been blessed by those I cannot see, but whose presence I feel. I know that I am not alone and hope that you, too, will find that, even in the most difficult situations, you are fully supported by the universe. All that is required is that you ask for help. It is there waiting for you.
author: Susan Barbara Apollon, Touched by the Extraordinary, Book Two

quote: Strength other than that received from God is just hype manufactured by men.
author: George Chakiris

quote: Loss pushes us to difficult places where we have not been before. We often question whether or not we have the courage and stamina to survive the pain. However, we often are given gifts that tell us that we are not alone and that we can withstand the journey.
author: Susan Barbara Apollon, Touched by the Extraordinary, Book Two

quote: We all need hope. As souls, we journey in physical bodies, traversing a life that is dually lived. We experience safety through attachment to the physical world, but we also are comforted and cared for by a trust in the non-physical, spiritual part of our reality. Two different roads, available for us and from which we choose, moment by moment.
author: M.T. Anderson

quote: Filling ourselves and living with the energy of love feels wonderful. And because this energy resonates at a high vibrational level, it also attracts into our lives other high, vibrational experiences, many of which feel quite miraculous.
author: Sapan Saxena, Unns-The Captivation

quote: Each day is always breaking out anew Aspirations swirling round what you do
author: Kyan Christopher, Still Presence

quote: The sun never has an inferiority complex. It shines the same whether above or below.
author: Hajime Isayama, 進撃の巨人 18 [Shingeki no Kyojin 18]

quote: Never give up hope, no matter how dark things may seem.
author: we hope. Nothing hardly changes. We take action and more action. Wow! What we envision begins to occur.

quote: Give it air & let the scar on your soul reveal itself, because, like the body, it too was made to heal itself.
author: Wendell Berry, Hannah Coulter

quote: I wish I could run into the world’s arms. Linger within the spaces between nothing. I wish I could filter out of existence. To live quietly without dying. I wish I could be cherished by life itself. To speak and sing volumes without lying to myself.
author: F.K. Preston, The Artist, The Audience and a Man Called Nothing

quote: It’s like you’re always living in your head. . . . Relax and appreciate your surroundings a little.
author: Brent  Jones, The Fifteenth of June

quote: Happiness isn’t something you work toward, the same way misery isn’t something you work toward.
author: Tiffany Reisz, The Night Mark

quote: I know it is difficult to believe in your own courage or fortitude when everything inside of you feels weak and shattered. But do not believe what you feel. You will not be easily broken.
author: Rachel L. Schade, Forsaken Kingdom

quote: Posture is Paramount.
author: Seanan McGuire, Every Heart a Doorway

quote: For once,engulf,not air,but hope.For once,breathe on,a firm belief!
author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber

quote: Absence is more,thorny on the soul,than however dulcet,presence can be.Apparently,I have missed you,more than,I have ever loved you.
author: Felix Long, To Conquer Heaven

quote: I was moving around with my imperfect, broken pieces until you came across and stitched my flaws with your words.
author: Seth Adam Smith, Rip Van Winkle and the Pumpkin Lantern

quote: Bless the poets, the workers for justice, the dancers of ceremony, the singers of heartache, the visionaries, all makers and carriers of fresh meaning—We will all make it through, despite politics and wars, despite failures and misunderstandings. There is only love.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: We all die. Not all of us live.
author: Alaric Hutchinson, Living Peace

quote: Acceptance of death and cancer did not mean I intended to give up, just the opposite. I was prepared to fight cancer not out of fear of dying, but out of joy of living.
author: Edie Littlefield Sundby, The Mission Walker: I was given three months to live...

quote: When I put down Lance Armstrong’s book, I understood something profoundly. Edie, if you can move, you’re not sick. I decided right then and there that no matter what cancer did to me I would continue to move. Movement was what the physical body was designed to do; it was how it coped and functioned. Movement was vitality. It was life. I would move. Always. No matter what. Until my last breath, I would move.
author: Edie Littlefield Sundby, The Mission Walker: I was given three months to live...

quote: Wait in expectant of the desired wishes.
author: whether walking alone or with others.

quote: Despite all of our incessant tinkering, we can’t manufacture the things we most desperately need. And if perchance we do, they will never be more than pathetically emaciated facsimiles that will leave us emaciated. And until we finally realize that we can only ‘find’ these things, we will never sense any compulsion to ‘find’ God.
author: Jayne Castel, The Whispering Wind

quote: Seeing the mud around a lotus is pessimism, seeing a lotus in the mud is optimism.
author: Wendy Mills, All We Have Left

quote: There are occult Esoteric Metaphysics (the secret and most confidential aspect of occult teachings) and Mystical Sciences practiced by mystical adepts, Living Grand Masters. This is the cosmological verdict of the Order of Astral and Terrestrial Hierarchy universal occult recognition. Exoteric is public occult teachings. An Adept uses the Technique of the Master. Hell is called After-Life-Hallucination. There are entities, spirits, demons, demi-gods, Archangels and other names for evil beings. A Guru is a spiritual Master.
author: indonesia123

quote: It is high time that I learn to be more careful about hope, a reckless emotion for travelers. The sensible approach would be to the expect the worst, the very worst, that way you avoid grievous disappointment and who knows with a tiny bit of luck, you might even have a moderately pleasant surprise, like the difference between hell and purgatory.
author: Auliq-Ice

quote: The human spirit carries a torch called hope.
author: Melody Carlson, The Christmas Shoppe
