quote: Show me a person who found love in his life and did not celebrate it with a dance.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Lose yourself in the music, not the fog
author: Brenda Sutton Rose, Dogwood Blues

quote: Dancing daily is a good physical activity.
author: Adam Young

quote: Any performer tries to perform music as if for the first time, with all that energy and excitement that comes from discovering a new piece--maybe trying to recreate the memory of falling in love with a piece when hearing it first as a child--and just as people regularly say of a brilliant conductor that they seem to conduct as if recreating the energy an audience must have felt when the piece was first played decades, even centuries, before, so too I think we need to communicate our knowledge with the passion we first encountered as children.
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: One must indeed test the strings to this life, bounce the bow, wet the mouthpiece, prepare for the deeper music that follows.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: That Jim Morrison song gets it all wrong. People are strange when you’re a stranger, but it’s not because they ignore you—it’s when they notice you and smile, that’s when you realize you’re alone out here. Their kindness is what makes you notice how weak you are. That’s when you know it’s not the city’s fault, it’s yours. These people are in the same strange town, but they’re not letting the strangeness eat them up and turn them into robots. That’s just you.
author: Rob Sheffield, Turn Around Bright Eyes: The Rituals of Love & Karaoke

quote: Nothing exists without music; for the universe itself is said to have been framed by a kind of harmony of sounds, and the heaven itself revolves under the tones of that harmony.
author: David Nicholls

quote: If you move faster than the music, it will look strange; if you move slower than the music, it will look strange! Be like autumn leaves which follow exactly the rhythm of the wind!
author: Marshall McLuhan, The Medium is the Massage

quote: Realized dreams often turn into nightmares.
author: Anamika Mishra, VoiceMates - A Novel

quote: What will life be without music?
author: Becky Albertalli, Simon vs. the Homo Sapiens Agenda

quote: The power of music feels like taking a a nice brake from this busy world
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes

quote: Music is breath of life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Music escapes ideological characterization. Just as there are some social scientists who believe that what cannot be measured does not truly exist, and some psychologists used to believe that consciousness does not exist because it cannot be observed by instruments, so ideologists find anything that escapes their conceptual framework threatening - because ideologists want a simple principle, or a few simple principles, by which all things may be judged. When I was a student, I lived with a hard-line dialectical materialist who said that Schubert was a typical petit bourgeois pessimist, whose music would die out once objective causes for pessimism ceased to exist. But I suspect that even he was not entirely happy with this formulation.
author: Kastle King

quote: You sold your soul to feed your vanity..
author: Richard J. Alley, Five Night Stand

quote: Music is the truth that everyone do listen, feels, believes and loves.
author: Estelle Laure, This Raging Light

quote: Use your special gifts to fulfil your divine purpose.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: If just one person has done it, it can be done. by V.L. Marshall
author: Manoj Arora, From the Rat Race to Financial Freedom

quote: There is only one limitation that exists in our minds, which can indeed reduce the speed of our progress; that is the limitation of our understanding
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The time we are living in has its own conditions, peculiarities and standards
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: When we break 5M’s of Manufacturing Efficiency - Men, Machine, Materials, Methods & Money to personal level, the first two M’s will spell Minutes & Mind, and rest remain constant!
author: Charles Eisenstein, The More Beautiful World Our Hearts Know Is Possible

quote: Not being a man of means, I knew that if I did not stay sober enough to earn money, I would run out of liquor.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: If love makes the world go around, then money greases the axles.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Wisdom is worth more than money.

quote: I do not love money to chase it.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Money cannot buy friendship.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Unfortunately, money make us happy - look around then say your opinion!
author: honeya

quote: For the wealthy, money is a tool. For the impoverished, it is the rule.
author: Sotero M Lopez II

quote: A good reputation is better than great riches.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: Better than money and fame, teaching martial arts to your children; giving them your time and confidence, is the best inheritance
author: Vann Chow, Shanghai Nobody

quote: *Prostitution* is a euphemism for rape incidents that the victim and the economy profits from.
author: Vann Chow, Shanghai Nobody

quote: That was an important rule of any game: always make it easy for people to give you money.
author: Alan W. Watts, The Book: On the Taboo Against Knowing Who You Are

quote: Refusing dominance over others by using money is a clear sign of wisdom.
author: Maggie Stiefvater, Forever

quote: There were so many different versions of him. It was countless versions of a song, and they were all original, and they were all true, and they were all right. It should have been impossible. Was I supposed to love them all?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Work indeed has many more benefits than money.
author: Akhil Khanna

quote: Unfortunately, we do not often see the advantages in the power of values and virtues. We are easily taken away by physical wealth, material possessions and the power of money.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: Money can cloud your vision.
author: Kate  Cooper, Band of Angels: The Forgotten World of Early Christian Women

quote: Life must not be lived only to make money.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: . . . Like ashes of gold in a cinnamon-flame,My youthful desires have been burnt with the years– And tonight in the chilling sunset-windA cicada, singing, weighs on my heart.
author: Alfred Hayes, In Love

quote: I may not have a world of things, I may not have the biggest wings, What I do have is a heart of love, Because I trust the One above
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: Huang Sung turned to the master and asked, "Master, will it come to pass?"The master looked up into the sky and then turned to Huang Sung, "When the sky is red from our tears and the earth is blackened by the ashes of our forefathers and then, when we look inwards to where our hearts once were, then we shall know that it has come to pass, but not in the time allotted to man."From a book that I am writing, called, "The Teachings of Huang Sung.
author: Kate McGahan, Jack McAfghan: Return from Rainbow Bridge

quote: Her heart longed for some ark into which it could fly and be at rest. Rough or smooth she did not care, so long as it was warm.
author: Robin Jarvis, The Oaken Throne

quote: I envy people who know how to talk to her, my heart begins to pound whenever I see her and she forces me to forget all what I have had rehearsed in my mind. For me, not being able to tame my heart is the one failure I cherish the most.
author: Angie karan

quote: You will never win an unfair competition since the reward is meaningless.
author: Fabulous Godwin

quote: Sealing your lips makes your eyes talk Truth creeps beneath your lame feet’s walk Knees stiffen when blood vessels stalk A pounding heart’s lies hard as rock
author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber

quote: I would like to hold your hand as it holds this green leaf, yellowed, that fell early from its tree, this Autumn. And I would like to imagine that it feels your careful care, for your eyes are warmed by your heart, and I would let you sadly nestle into me as a bird folds into its nest, resigning itself to a storm. For my heart is as large as a city, and it glows with the fire that, with the right mischievous love, shall serve to inspire thousands upon thousands to inspire thousands upon thousands.
author: Stephanie Kaleto, Disconsolate

quote: People are not born perfect.We make them perfect,By loving them perfectly.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: The heart has a deeper intelligence than the mind ever will.
author: Jo Victor, Romance by the Book

quote: The mind is wired by society, the heart is wired by your deepest desires for a blissful life.
author: Steven Redhead, Unleash The Power of Your Heart and Mind

quote: Giving credence to persistent intuitions awakens the dormant heart consciousness.
author: Virginia Alison

quote: When your soulmate cries your heart weeps.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: But heads and hearts don’t always agree
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Who was it that hurt you,stole light out of your eyes?Cut a hole in your heartand let the love drain dry?Who was so damn careless,to leave you with such scars?Where will you find healing?Right here, within my arms.
author: John Mark Green

quote: Your heart is your temple.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: A graceful heart is a virtue of the meek.
author: Nicholaa Spencer

quote: The heart can never break if you believe love never dies.
author: Delilah S. Dawson, Wicked as They Come

quote: Words work like keys. When you use them appropriately, you can unlock any locked heart.
author: Santosh Lamichhane, Porridge Eaters and Gruel Drinkers: A Nepali Poetry Collection

quote: Love is the opposite of good sense.
author: Richard Castle, Driving Heat

quote: In life your expectations and disappointments are directly linked. So too is your heartfulness and your contentedness
author: Salil Jha, Naked Soul: The Erotic Love Poems

quote: At your young age, you stand up for Truth and use your conscience to see that justice always prevails, even if it leads to grueling consequences or personal sacrifices. You never fail to use your heart. Again, your heart is your key to immortality. Keep a good heart and all that is anything and everything will remember you,” said the Sphinx.
author: Criss Jami, Salomé: In Every Inch In Every Mile

quote: When we find money in the street, we happily pick it up, even if it’s just a buck, but when we bump into love, we tend to be so picky.
author: Catherynne M. Valente

quote: Simple and plain things can touch your heart very easily! If you can be simple and plain, you can touch every heart!

quote: Our heart creates everything from nothing. That is the magical power of love.
author: Catherynne M. Valente, The Girl Who Soared Over Fairyland and Cut the Moon in Two

quote: ....there are moments in life worth living for. Spring Walking is one of them; my mind frozen in the moment, changed perception of time, augmented sense satisfaction and happiness, my heart filled with awesomeness...
author: Jesse Jackson

quote: The human heart is like india-rubber; a little swells it, but a great deal will not burst it.
author: Dominic Riccitello

quote: Truth is first felt in the heart before the mind. Those who try looking for truth through the mind before the heart will never find Truth.
author: Tanzy Sayadi, Better to be able to love than to be loveable

quote: I wish to stay drenchedforeverin those rain-blue eyesin those...soul-reaching crystalsnot moving a musclenor breathingjustsavoringthis turquoise acheagainst my heart.

quote: Passion + Vision +Skill + Mentoring = Success.

quote: A lie near to truth is always difficult to catch

quote: Be content to love, to dazzle in the light,If only for moments…And then be gone,With gladness in your heart,Before the creeping shadowsClaim too much your sadness at leaving.

quote: Pursue what catches your heart, not what catches your eye.

quote: What is it that you long for best, that clenches teeth and claws over the ventricles of your heart?

quote: Don’t be afraid of failures it takes courage to try new things & only those who try create History.

quote: (Watching her) was a little like watching water lilies; rather more like smelling a dinner he was not allowed to eat. Was it possible to be starved for so long as to forget the taste of food, for the pangs of hunger to burn out like ash? It seemed so. But both the pleasure and the pain were his heart’s secret, here. He was put in mind, suddenly, of the soil at the edge of a recovering blight; the weedy bedraggled look of it, unlovely yet hopeful. Blight was a numb gray thing, without sensation. Did the return of green life hurt? Odd thought.
author: Gabriele Corno

quote: If you are depressed, you are living in the past. If you are anxious, you are living in the future. If you are at peace, you are living in the present.
author: Abhysheq Shukla, KISS Life  "Life is what you make it"

quote: True Relations never break and relation which breaks were never true

quote: Always follow your dreams with confidence and conviction, don’t fall for the trap of dream killers

quote: Life is a do-it-yourself project.
author: Abhysheq Shukla, KISS Life  "Life is what you make it"

quote: For all those who say its a Man world. Respect Women Its their World we are just guest here

quote: Life is same for everyone. The difference is only that some are living by heart and some for only sake of living

quote: As long as we have MEMORIES, yesterday REMAINS and as long as we have HOPE, tomorrow AWAITS...

quote: No matter what goals you set to accomplish always remember there is a thing known as Life which you should never forget to live and enjoy

They also begin to engage with the fantasy without realizing what it really is.They seek happiness and fulfilment through the simulacra of reality, e.g. media and avoid the contact/interaction with the real world.

quote: Though not everything is so easy in doing, ponder before you say something is far difficult to do! When you think of the difficulty in getting it done, think and think again; you may have spent the same time you should have used for the utmost preparations that could have made the difficulty you look at but cannot see the panacea on something else, or you are not finding the necessary time, wit, courage, tenacity and the will power to release your whole and true self to master the very act and art of making difficult things easier!

author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Life is too short for shitty sex and bad relationships. So go find someone who fucks you right and treats you how you deserve to be treated.

Uplift your spirit , hope and works to greater heights and you shall sit on top of unknown heights looking down at the bottom. Do not deprive your self to succeed.

When you mind your mind, you mind your mind, you mind your heart, you mind your body and you mind your spirit! The only rest stop in your body for bitterness is your mind. Don’t forget! Mind your mind!

quote: Let it be a footprint that you ones lived!Let it be a footprint that you thought failure a lesson!Let it be a footprint that you were stronger than life hurdles!Let it be a footprint that your speech was awesome!Let it be a footprint that you left a distinctive mark on minds!Let it be a footprint that you were the best father ever!Let it be a footprint that a great mother once lived !Let it be a footprint that once lived a humble yet an assertive you!Let it be a footprint that you stood for what is just regardless of the odds!Let it be a footprint that you fed the hungry! Let it be a footprint that you protected the vulnerable!Let it be a footprint that you lived for Christ!Let it be a footprint that you were courageous and not a coward!Let it be a footprint that a great worker is gone!Let it be a footprint that a good heart is gone!Let it be a footprint that you were a noble accomplisher !Let it be a footprint that you knew the essence of time!Let it be a footprint that you knew when to ignore and when to respond!Let it be a footprint! Let it be a footprint! Let it be a footprint!Let it be a footprint that though you are leaving, you are living!Let it be a footprint that you shall be missed!What footprint are you leaving behind?

quote: What is the reason that many thousands of Christian workers in the world have not a greater influence? Nothing save this—the prayerlessness of their service. It is nothing but the sin of prayerlessness which is the cause of the lack of a powerful spiritual life!

quote: The Lord is our mighty shield.The Lord is our greet strength.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: My heart is filled with thankfulness to God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: You are capable of much more than you envisage.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: We ought to live in the marvellous light.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: God knows your every need.
