quote: Oneness with God is not a dream, it is the only reality. Everything else is an illusion.
author: James Patterson, The Final Warning

quote: Writing … is an addiction, an illusory release, a presumptuous taming of reality, a way of expressing lightly the unbearable. That we age and leave behind this litter of dead, unrecoverable selves is both unbearable and the commonest thing in the world — it happens to everybody. In the morning light one can write breezily, without the slight acceleration of one’s pulse, about what one cannot contemplate in the dark without turning in panic to God. In the dark one truly feels that immense sliding, that turning of the vast earth into darkness and eternal cold, taking with it all the furniture and scenery, and the bright distractions and warm touches, of our lives. Even the barest earthly facts are unbearably heavy, weighted as they are with our personal death. Writing, in making the world light — in codifying, distorting, prettifying, verbalizing it — approaches blasphemy.
author: Kerry Greenwood, Death at Victoria Dock

quote: With each day, each hour and every moment of life, no matter how small, I realize that I have found a way of bringing me straight to the one person that I would give everything for… to you. I am living in a dream, in a dream I don’t want to awake from.

quote: The dumbest thing one could ever do is to hold on to something that is slippery

quote: As every good marxist already knows, the ideological shift toward a terminally optimistic humanism was vital to the rise of bourgeoisie, and the decline of aristocracy.

quote: Mistakes and failures are simply stepping stones on your journey to success.

quote: A hero: a man or woman who is unsatisfied by his condition, and resolves to do something about it.

quote: Every negative has a positive.” Take my sickness, for example. Being sick is not good, but through this, I have received a lot of blessings in different forms. Because of this, I am able to share everything that God has done for me.

quote: Some roads are covered with flower. Some hearts are full with kindness.

quote: Always be looking for what you can appreciate in the moment.

quote: When you start doing the impossible, you make it possible

quote: God is full of love, joy and peace. Every religion has said that God is within us or we are a part of God so why do we think small? Why do we have limiting beliefs about our success? Why do we not love ourselves? Why do we have fears? Isn’t thinking negative/small a sin then?

quote: Prayer also forms a type of nutrition for self confidence and keeps you free from worry. author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Compare yourself only with the word of God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Prophesy positive words into your life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: All great dreamers have great faith.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: When I count my blessings, it is immeasurable
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Rejoice and be glad, you have life, the greatest gift.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Reach with all your heart to your divine-dreams.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: I choice to think positively.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: You can renew your mind and revive spirit by reading great stories.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Great spirituality, Great soul!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: You only need grace to allow the light and good spirit of your sacred-self to exist.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Don’t be shaken by the circumstance.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Success requires discipline, dedication and diligence to the very end.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: With self-confidence and self-commitment, you will realise your dream.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: With careful guidance and mentorship, you will reach your highest-self.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Daring life, graceful living.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Amazing grace
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Life is spiritual!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: In any situation, there is hope.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Daring a greater life is a divine act.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Those who dare try and failure are courageous souls.
author: we will uphold the timeless future.

quote: The Lord is my ‘Strong Fortress’.The Lord is my ‘Solid Rock’.
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: With patient endurance, the best of life enfolds.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The willing spirit can do good deeds by grace.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Be happy. Be happy for no reason at all. Believe it or not, you have the ability and free agency to make that choice.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Success is a steadily progress.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Your actions today, define tomorrow.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: You should persist long enough to conquer.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Don’t quit when you encounter an obstacle. Adapt a new strategy to conquer it.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Nothing can replace confidence and single-minded pursuit of purpose.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Enthusiastic work is daring spirit.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: What needs to be done will be done by grace.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Time is irreplaceable asset.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: You can be beautiful and young even as you get older. Keep an active life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Dare to reach beyond the stars.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Life is full of limitless opportunities. You ought to seek them.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: There is no limit to life. The only limit is the limit you put into life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: My life is sacred being.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Failure is not the end of life. It is the beginning of a greater success, if thy will persist.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: They can’t denied who I am.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Dare to try again when you failure.
author: Stefan  Emunds

quote: A great sense of humor is a great gift!
author: Diamante Lavendar

quote: You will conquer every mountain.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: We wonder with our thoughts.
author: Jocelyn  Murray, The Roman General: A Novel

quote: Thinking can be done best when you’re in that state of mind where nothing can slip under the radar and destroy your concentration.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Daily Drive 365

quote: Fulfilling your special calling brings the greatest happiness.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: He who want to be great must first be a servant.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Your mind believes what you tell it, so tell it positive things
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The war we must must win is fought within.
author: Amit Abraham

quote: By seeing how small the world is, I realize how capable I am. I can conquer anything. Anywhere. Anyone.
author: Germany Kent

quote: Never give anybody permission to disturb your peace. Always ignore negative comment.Dwell on positive thoughts and occupied your mind with songs of praise.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I decree and I declare that I am not a raw material but rather a finished product. God knows me and knows the reason for which he created me. I am not here on earth to merely live and depart.
author: Muhammad Imran Hasan

quote: Anxiety and depression, and the physical symptoms they cause, are merely distractions and smokescreens to “protect” you from dangers, which are usually, imaginary.
author: Jon Gordon, The Energy Bus: 10 Rules to Fuel Your Life, Work, and Team with Positive Energy

quote: Whole worlds’ darkness is not enough to dark the blaze of a candle..
author: Terry Pratchett, The Carpet People

quote: Some will make you Dance, some will make you Smile, and some will make your misery longer than a mile! Pleasure or Pain, the Choice is thine.
author: Mark W. Boyer

quote: Attitude is that little thing that will make the most difference in the accomplishment of your goals.
author: Roopleen

quote: When you change what you believe, you change what you do... which changes what you get.
author: Roopleen

quote: To be able to live each day with honor, respect and dignity is the greatest achievement of all.
author: Roopleen

quote: She silently thanked God for creating such a beautiful universe where anything was possible even when it seemed impossible.
author: Carl Henegan

quote: Man cannot be homophobic without having concerned himself with another’s sex life.
author: Camille Paglia, Sexual Personae: Art and Decadence from Nefertiti to Emily Dickinson

quote: Lust is the craving for salt of a man who is dying of thirst.
author: Tom Stoppard, Arcadia

quote: The last few strokes filled me with searing heat, and electric pulses traveled through my body and my soul, as our orgasms burst forth together, a million nerve endings suddenly flashing like twin rockets exploding fireworks, the multitude of sparks joining with a billion stars in the heavens above.
author: Henry James, The Portrait of a Lady

quote: I tell my christian relatives that "churchianity" is the central reason the church is not teeming with young people. The hypocrisy within the church is not concealed from this growing, informed generation. The arrogance among church goers is unnerving, Jesus was such a humble individual to begin with, he did not discriminate.
author: Judith Ivory, Untie My Heart

quote: He’s a steamroller in my life and I like to be laid out flat. I like his hands on my chest, pushing me down whenever my back turns to the span of a bridge. His hands on my thighs, forcing me flat, flat, flat. Yes. Yes, I like that.
author: J.M. Ledgard, Submergence

quote: It is as if joy were the default setting of human emotion, not the furtive, fugitive glimpses it becomes in lives compromised by necessity, familiarity, ‘maturity,’ suffering. You must become as little children, Jesus said, a statement that is often used to justify anti-intellectualism and the renunciation of reason, but which I take actually to mean that we must recover this sense of wonder, this excess of spirit brimming out of the body.
author: Dariush Youkhaneh, Serving the living God

quote: We have a choice. We can be jaded by what we’ve lost, or joyous over what that thing had accomplished while we had it.
author: Douglas Carlton Abrams, The Book of Joy: Lasting Happiness in a Changing World

quote: Daily dance is my delight.
author: Dennis Prager, Happiness Is a Serious Problem: A Human Nature Repair Manual

quote: Man is more himself, man is more manlike, when joy is the fundamental thing in him, and grief the superficial. Melancholy should be an innocent interlude, a tender and fugitive frame of mind; praise should be the permanent pulsation of the soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: My heart dances with joy when I think about you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Be thankful always.
author: Adelaide Crapsey, Verse by Adelaide Crapsey

quote: Go beyond the boundary of conformity to find the true joy of life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Eat like you love your body.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Live by your own sacred standard.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: The beauty of existence is a passionate sacred-life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Be happy with what you have.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Love life.Love light.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: We chase wild dreams and long for all that eludes us, when the greatest joys are within our grasp, if we can only recognize them.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Your greatest gift is your life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: It is only God who can fill our void.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Man is hypocrite! He says that he loves flowers but he kills them for his own simple interests and for his own joy! Man is hypocrite!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: This universe was created for joy and happiness. You are born to be happy. Your happiness ultimately makes this universe joyful. Blooming flowers, singing birds, and smiling people fill this universe with joy.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: I have to learn to hear music, to see beauty, and to find joy in silence
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Your sacred time is now! Begin to live passionately.
author: Steve Goodier

quote: Be thankful for all that you have.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: When you are happy with what you have, you are the happiest.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: Bitterness gives ill-health and waste life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: If you don’t make your choices, others will give you’re their choice.
author: Jill Badonsky, The Muse Is In: An Owner’s Manual to Your Creativity

quote: There are two kinds of spirit
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Live a simple life, doing what you love.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: An enemy sees his attackers laughing? It is better than all the insults. A man who laughs as he goes into battle is a man who has confidence, and a man with confidence is terrifying to an enemy. “For the whore!” I shouted.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Life is not a competition.There is enough work for everybody. Find your passion and fulfill it.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: People often tell themselves lies, in order to reach what they consider acceptance in difficult situations. In reality, they fool themselves into believing they are healed, until that lie is corrected by time, further information or their own personal growth. True healing comes when we learn to not avoid truth, but face it. Only then will we be set free.
author: Andrena Sawyer

quote: Life never be serious with you it always make fun of you so learn to have fun.
author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana, Sweet Destiny

quote: Ah! Let the soul dance with joyLet us sit in dark deep silencenow feel, see and enjoy!
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To feel pure joy, the road of peace is the only road we should walk.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Find comfort in little things and joy in unexpected moments.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The road to happiness starts with a deep breath and an awareness of the many blessings tied to that single breath.
author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana, Release The Ink

quote: Abundance in life is achieved only when we tear down walls and fill our lives with light.
author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana, Release The Ink

quote: In the deep places he gives thought to music great and terrible; and the echo of that music runs through all the veins of the world in sorrow and in joy; for if joyful is the fountain that rises in the sun, its springs are in the wells of sorrow unfathomed at the foundations of the Earth.
author: Scott Hastie

quote: The idea of Zen is to catch life as it flows. There is nothing extraordinary or mysterious about Zen. I raise my hand ; I take a book from the other side of the desk ; I hear the boys playing ball outside my window; I see the clouds blown away beyond the neighbouring wood: — in all these I am practising Zen, I am living Zen. No wordy discussions is necessary, nor any explanation. I do not know why — and there is no need of explaining, but when the sun rises the whole world dances with joy and everybody’s heart is filled with bliss. If Zen is at all conceivable, it must be taken hold of here.
author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana, Sweet Destiny

quote: when exactly do the abuses that have been tolerated for so long become intolerable? When does the fear evaporate and the rage generate action that produces joy?
author: Curious George Brigade, Anarchy in the Age of Dinosaurs

quote: Let us see each other not through the eyes but through the heart and feel the joy of love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When they saw the star, they rejoiced exceedingly with great joy. Matthew 2:10
author: Vivian Amis, I Am: The Key to Manifesting

quote: I pray this new year will be greater, smooth and brings best aroma to our smelling, normal burning for toothpicks, blue colours for great celebration, unlimited joy from nw, then and beyound in JESUS name ★FEYIKOGBON★
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: Living beautifully and justly are the source of all joy and happiness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Open your heart! Dance with joy and love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: People are prettiest when they smile with joy.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Dream Big!: See Your Bigger Picture!

quote: A loving heart is the source of all happiness, all joy and all bliss.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Whenever you smile, whenever you care, whenever you love, whenever you share, your spirit will dance with joy because happiness is there.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Nothing can bring joy in your life except yourself.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When we learn to enjoy success as well as failure, we will be eternally happy and joyful for sure.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Hope keeps us alive. Love gives us joy. Perception of inner joy open the door toward the happiness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Life is not about success; life is about joy, peace, and happiness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: As you walk with Jesus, resting your head on His heart, you will learn to know His Word, His will, and His ways. You will want to obey Him, not out of forced compliance, but out of heartfelt connection. Your joy will abound as you remain in His love.
author: Marcel Proust, The Captive & The Fugitive

quote: All I’m saying is that I want you to be happy. I don’t care how it happens, or what it takes to facilitate it. I don’t care if it happens with me or without me. I don’t care if you use me to get there, or if I’m entirely irrelevant to your process. None of me is attached to how your happiness happens; I care only that it does.
author: Ayn Rand, The Virtue of Selfishness: A New Concept of Egoism

quote: If you’re giving to get, all you’ll receive is disappointment. But if you’re giving to give, all you’ll receive is joy.
author: Munia Khan

quote: In grief, part of the pain comes from our feeling that we should not suffer so - that it is fundamentally alien to our being, this even though we all suffer, and frequently. Yet we reject suffering as a basic human truth, while greeting joy as integral to our very substance.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: Joy is found in simple things.
author: Girdhar Joshi, Some Mistakes Have No Pardon

quote: Many people look at their past and bemoan their mistakes. Those errors in judgment, behavior, hurting others, and the wrong decisions may be what consumes them now. It does not have to be that way, for recovering from a traumatic situation is all a matter of how we think about what happened. It is not so much about what happened to us as what we make of the circumstance.
author: Jacob Nordby

quote: There is no greater moment in life than that when we discover the unique design which has shaped our lives from the moment of birth, save one:The instant we recognize destiny, accept it and then begin to create the rest of our own lives within it using the power of free will.When this threshold has been crossed, nothing can stop our inevitable journey into the highest good for ourselves and all around us.This is healing.This is actualization.This is integration.This is joy.And it is the birthright of every incarnated soul on this planet.
author: Emmuska Orczy, The Scarlet Pimpernel

quote: The source calls to you. Find a quiet place and listen for the voice of creation. Look upon the horizon and see the future of your new life, where you are again a natural soul living in joy and peace.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: The greatest joys are found not only in what we do and feel, but also in what we hope for.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Abstractions do us much harm by impelling us to the quest of the absolute in all things. Joy does not exist, but there are joys: and these joys may not be folly felt unless they are detached from neutral or even painful conditions. The idea of continuity is almost self-negating. Nature makes no leaps; but life makes only bounds. It is measured by our heartbeats & these may be counted. That there should be, amid the number of deep pulsations that scan the line of our existence, some grievous ones, does not permit the affirmation that life is therefore evil. Moreover, neither a continuous joy would be perceived by consciousness.
author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana

quote: Chasing the external to achieve joy is a death-trap for personal-development.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Amazingly, we take for granted that instinct for survival, fear of death, must separate us from the happiness of pure and uninterpreted experience, in which body, mind, and nature are the same. This retreat from wonder, the backing away like lobsters into safe crannies, the desperate instinct that our life passes unlived, is reflected in proliferation without joy, corrosive money rot, the gross befouling of the earth and air and water from which we came.
author: Leo Tolstoy, Anna Karenina

quote: The potential of controlling and living a successful life according to your terms depends on how you think. Your perception is your world. You can create the life you want and in fact, you can even shape it the way you want it.
author: Émile Zola, The Attack on the Mill and Other Stories

quote: Laughter is the only medicine, without side effects.
author: Tim Fargo

quote: If you are reading this then you have wasted another day of your life day dreaming, rather than planning the life God intended you to live.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: Everyone wants to protect their heart, but without pain, one can never have joy.
author: Ashly Lorenzana

quote: Truth’s nakedness is not concerned with whom it strikes - painfully, or with pleasure; responding appropriately to its ingenuous temperament, however, rewards perceptions of unbiased transparency.
author: Todd Stocker, Leading from the Gut: 3 Power Principles of Effective Leaders

quote: Today you are lifted higher. Understand that you can go further and be better than you ever thought possible. Start by saying yes to all good things. Doors will open for you filled with unlimited opportunities.
author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana

quote: Quoting geneticists, Guy Murcia says we’re all family. You have at least a million relatives as close as tenth cousin, and no one on Earth is further removed than your fiftieth cousin. Murcia also describes out kinship though an analysis of how deeply we share the air. With each breath, you take into your body 10 sextillion atoms, and-owing to the wind’s ceaseless circulation- over a year’s time you have intimate relations with oxygen molecules exhaled by every person alive, as well as everyone who ever lived. (The Seven Mysteries of Life)
author: Dee Dee Artner

quote: The things you can take with you: Love, Trust, Respect, Joy,.The things you leave behind: Everything else.
author: Theresa  Smith, Somebody I Used to Know

quote: Shattered edges of the diamonds rough sets to cut the unsuspecting.
author: Criss Jami, Venus in Arms

quote: When it comes to developing a worldview, we tend to face this false division: Either you are a realist who says the world is terrible, or a naïve optimist who says the world is wonderful and turns a blind eye. [Jack] Gilbert takes this middle way, and I think it’s a far better way: he says the world is terrible and wonderful, and your obligation is to joy. . . . A real, mature, sincere joy—not a cheaply earned, ignorant joy. He’s not talking about building a fortress of pleasure against the assault of the world. He’s talking about the miraculousness of moments of wonder and how it seems to be worth it, after all.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: You can feel anything. All is free for you to feel. But I guarantee you that if you allow yourself to feel envy and then to swim in it, that envy will destroy you and the people around you. Envy is unlike anger. Envy is not a right wing nor a left wing, it is not on either end of the balancing beam. Nobody needs it and I can assure you that once you give yourself to it, you will be eaten up. Envy can even eat up nations, casting them up against each other and pull a whole nation down into an internal collapse.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: Knowledge, you may get from books but wisdom is trapped within you, release it.
author: Radhe Maa

quote: Too many people are endowed with a feeling of entitlement, but born without God-given empathy.
author: Munia Khan

quote: The pause .... where wisdom has space to appear
author: Radhe Maa

quote: Plough your fields, cast your seeds, the rains will come when they please.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: The quickest way to find honey is to follow bees.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: An original pebble is better than a counterfeit diamond.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: When sheep grow blind, it is only wolves that rejoice.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Counting your chickens before they hatch is only wise if God has told you how many will survive.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: If you hide honey in the dark, bees will still find it.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: An apple only falls far from its tree when carried away by divine winds.
author: Haritha Velpureddy

quote: We follow the rules of Jungle.survival, survival, survival.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: A wolf only attends a rabbit’s funeral to eat its young.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: What would be the significance of the candlelight, if there were no darkness? What would be the power of the stars over our minds, if there were no night?
author: Kamaran Ihsan Salih

quote: People only stone a tree that is full of ripe fruit.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Do not make yourself a bridge for everyone to cross on you, because there are some people they put nail on their feet to cross on you.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: ...Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight. Proverbs 3: 5-6.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: If you want to access your power as a divine human being, you must search for the small inside of the big and for the big inside of the small. When you look up into the expanse of sky overhead, look for the stars, the planets, the birds that fly. Small things for the eye to spot. And when you look down into the the face of a streetside flower, look for joy, happiness, comfort, stillness, and a silent song. When you have mastered finding the small in the big and the big in the small, you will have mastered your own divinity.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: One who throws stones at others has less to use to build his own house.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: If you fish without proper bait, you will only catch disappointment.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Only fools are born wise.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: I know a number of clever people who lack wisdom.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The pen is mightier than the sword
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: A quick enlightenment tends to do more harm than good. Wise may easily become unwise.
author: wisdom will help you build an empire.

quote: Knowing your strengths is intelligence
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: If you touch a wound while it is healing, you will prolong it.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: It is in the shade that you look up at a tree and appreciate its efforts.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: A tree is naked, no matter how big, if it does not have leaves.
author: James Allen, The Wisdom of James Allen: Five Books in One: As a Man Thinketh: The Path to Prosperity: The Mastery of Destiny: The Way of Peace: Entering the Kingdom

quote: Purpose and reason? Purpose and reason are not the same thing. Reason seeks to understand. Purpose requires faith. Reason is attained. Purpose is revealed. Reason is acquired by works. Purpose is endowed with grace. And wisdom is the combination of both.
author: Kamaran Ihsan Salih

quote: You cannot tell a river in which direction it should flow, but you can steer your boat.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Light is a beautiful servant
author: but only wisdom walks through.

quote: It is never a river’s fault that one cannot swim.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Take your time to find, know and understand what you don’t know and in the end, you shall know that it is not all the things you know that show you something you don’t know, but something you don’t know!
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The mind is a temple of knowledge, the heart is a temple of understanding, and the soul is a temple of wisdom; together they are a temple of enlightenment.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: It is the roof that fights the rain, but the builder who gets all the glory.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: A bird cannot fly upward if each wing is flapping in a different direction.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The most dangerous enemy is that enemy when your ally becomes enemy
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Light travels half away around the world while darkness is still putting its shoes on.
author: Eileen Anglin

quote: When birds eat from your hand, they are letting the whole world know that they trust you.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Imagination is the bridge between what is and what could be--it is everything.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: As long as the belief is: we need suffering to grow, the world will be suffering and the belief will be limiting.
author: Nataša Nuit Pantović, A-Ma Alchemy of Love

quote: Materialized in a female body, with a life of an ordinary person, through centuries, She ascends to meet the ones that are ready for Her, that call Her, that have a wish to understand. She is the personification of the Universal Mother. She lives Love and Clarity and She dies at Will, when She decides that it is time to go. Her name is Ama.
author: Nataša Nuit Pantović, A-Ma Alchemy of Love

quote: Noble leaders choose: wisdom over wealth, knowledge over fame, understanding over honor, virtue over titles, and people over power.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: If the sun needed friends to shine, it would not rule the sky alone.
author: Levon Peter Poe

quote: Through the absence of what we think we have to have we can discover our wholeness
author: Eraldo Banovac

quote: Work with "what is" rather than "what if" and you will move towards "what can be.
author: Steve Cioccolanti

quote: You are the only one capable of loving you the way you deserve to be love. The only hero that will save you is you, you are everything that you need, If you would only take the time the to invest in getting to know yourself, not through outside lenses, but by finding your quiet place within and learning the language of your soul.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: When you have nothing, be hopeful; when you have little, be grateful; when you have much, be sensible; when you have everything, be humble.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Cockiness – the state subjective or intuitive state of self-assurance – is a sign of ignorance. Maturity comes with encountering the horrible and learning about what a person can withstand.
author: Aberjhani, Illuminated Corners: Collected Essays and Articles Volume I.

quote: A true Christian only falls upward and not backward
author: David Benedict Zumbo

quote: Refuse anxiety. When you borrow trouble against what might be, you neglect the moment you have now to enjoy. The man who worries about what will next be happening to him loses this moment in dread of the next with pre-judgement
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: I am sculptor. I am clay.What shall I make of myself today.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Travel is the best school
author: Professor Markins aka  Engineer Gikundi

quote: Sometimes I truly wish folks would learn to meditate on what they read being more proactive and less reactive for in so doing a humble heart will be found and wisdom from above will be sure to follow them all the days of their lives
author: John M Sheehan

quote: Marrying a stupid person is a reflection of your thoughtlessness.Marrying a clever person is a reflection of your intelligence.Marrying a wise person is a reflection of your shrewdness.Marrying a virtuous person is a reflection of your uprightness.
author: Adhish Mazumder, Solemn Tales of Human Hearts

quote: I really feel sorry for the many men who are surrounded by people who flatter them all the time. In Chinese we have a golden proverb: "The true friend is the one who shows you how to bow down. Because you cannot enter the cave of treasures without bowing at the opening. And the true enemy is the one who flatters you. Because you cannot enter the cave of treasures standing tall with pride." At the end of the day, it is those that flatter you who keep you away from the true treasures in your life. In the culture we all live in today, we are taught to surround ourselves by people "who believe in us". That is true to some extent. But in reality, there are many times when the people around us ought to slap us in the face because we are being idiots. This seems to be particularly prevalent amongst men. In their quest to build a kingdom, they surround themselves with peasants. But this is not how to build a kingdom. In order to build a kingdom, surround yourself with knights. True friends who will protect you, even if it means protecting you from your own wayward self.
author: Cristen Rodgers

quote: Everyday we are innudated with exciting string of events on social media and news, even suffer sensory overload at times. Keep it simple; embrace one thing at a time
author: Val Uchendu

quote: Let the fools hold on to their treasured stupidityLet yourself be safe in wisdom with much rapidity
author: Jellis Vaes

quote: As a working professional in the entertainment industry, I have come to truly cherish both my creative freedom and my independence. Because I, for one, know how precious and priceless they are.
author: Sara Niles

quote: The world is alive, and just as we humans draw energy from connection with other human beings, so we do too from this world.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Even though the world hails Joan of Arc as some sort of hero, which she undoubtedly was, what pains me the most is that her pathological condition ultimately led to her demise at the age of only nineteen.
author: Manikanta Belde, Quotes Of Wisdom

quote: All our unique human achievements may seem to be the creation of the unique human mind, but they are simply the by- products of our neurobiological response to the environment.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: The difficult people who we encounter can be our greatest teachers.
author: Swami Vivekananda, Complete Works of Swami Vivekananda 8 Vol. set

quote: first build up your physique. then only you can get control over the mind.
author: Swami Vivekananda, Complete Works of Swami Vivekananda 8 Vol. set

quote: stick to truth and we shall succeed, may be slowly, but surely.
author: Valencia Mackie

quote: stand up, be bold. you are the sole and only cause.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: If you venture to be a sageLet your virtues subside your rageFor deep wisdom you’ll be veneratedLet cold veins feel blood cells generated
author: Swami Vivekananda, Complete Works of Swami Vivekananda, 9 Vols.

quote: Pathology can indeed cause experiences of the Kingdom of God, but not all God experiences are caused by pathology.
author: Anthony L. Williamms

quote: Never trust books on the question of whether or not to trust your rational thinking. Trust your rational thinking on the question of whether or not to trust the books.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Accept all of you, the good with the bad, the successes with the failures, the times you shone and the mistakes you made. It will bring into a place of peace. It will help you to move forward with your life.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Think before you speak. Your own words can cure or curse you. The power in your tongue can spill blessings or lessons.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: No book on this planet can give you the description of terms like religion, spirituality, divinity unless you discover it within the realm of your own mind.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: God want to make you like boneless fish.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: If you are looking at anything from one point, from one angle, you can never attain wisdom because wisdom is to see all the things from every point, from every angle!
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: If one of the most interesting places to be is your inner world, you will never be bored when you are alone.
author: be in the Business Making Money.

quote: Be like stars; when darkness tries to stop you from shining, shine all the more.
author: Rehan Gillani

quote: If you are too good to look after God’s trash, you are not good enough to look after God’s treasure.
author: Dariush Youkhaneh

quote: You Change , the things WHEN YOU let your thoughts be like the mind of Christ.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The diamond does not need to prove its worth. It is in fact the person who must teach him/herself to recognise the worth of real diamonds. A person must study this in school. A diamond does not go to school to learn how to prove its worth. It is the person who must go to school in order to recognise the worth of a diamond. Dear diamonds everywhere, stop trying to go to school. The worthy will recognise your worth.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Intelligence is the icing, but wisdom is the cake.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The loveliest gifts sometimes come wrapped in the ugliest paper.
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, Pearls Of Eternity

quote: A few hours spent reading a book is better than a lifetime of ignorance.
author: Germany Kent

quote: Before walking in someone else’s shoes, you have to remove your shoes first.
author: Dr. Asoka Jinadasa

quote: A true leader invokes the desire to follow in those being led.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Flowers are prettiest where they are watered the most.
author: John de Ruiter, The Intelligence of Love: Manifesting Your Being in This World

quote: Your choices are made in a moment, and yet their consequences transcend a lifetime.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Where there is poverty and ignorance, there will be suffering, cruelty, corruption and intolerance.We must change everything and focus on education and empowering lives. Start in your own town and you will be a part of the changes you want to see happen in the world.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Listening to your wife is intelligence
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: A storm is an artist who passes by on her way to paint your rainbow.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: A book is a whole world that you can fit into your pocket.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The universe is one body
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Ask for a fish, and you only get one; ask for a net, and you can catch dozens.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: There lives a man, who is too small for his own brain." ‪#‎iampm‬
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: More you know, better advice you give. Less you know, more advice you give.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: A wise bird does not lend even the smallest of its feathers to a hunter.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: A flower has no choice in where it is planted, but does have a choice in the direction it grows.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: A cat may have nine lives, but a wise person has a hundred.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Life may be a bed of roses, but roses still have thorns.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: I owe most of my wisdom to the problems I was gifted.
author: Mohammed Sekouty

quote: Make your footsteps count
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Education costs an arm and a leg, but ignorance costs you your mind and your soul.
author: Christian Hunt, The Dawn of Grace

quote: Light cannot enter a dark room without illumining it.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Walking towards love is wiser than falling into it.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The most beautiful birds do not know how beautiful they are until they see their reflection in water.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: God works through angels, people, nature and animals.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Paying the high cost of education is better than paying the high price of ignorance.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: A static action is never an action. A real action is an action in motion! Dare to do something!
author: Ashutosh Gupta, The Constituents of Virtue

quote: When you start to question you are part of the problem.
author: Ikechukwu Joseph, Knowledge, Understanding, Wisdom: the tripartite force in the pursuit of Divine Access

quote: You cannot marry your past without divorcing your future.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Not until we leave bad situations for worst situations, we shall least value and appreciate bad situations which shield us from the worst situation
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: The doors to Wisdom & Glory are never closed, they just favor the undaunted
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Push away the past, that vessel in which all emotions curdle to regret.
author: Joseph L. Galloway

quote: A paradox of life; be it good or bad, joy or sorrow, comfort or discomfort, appointment or disappointment, encouragement or discouragement, deception or loyalty, faithfulness or unfaithfulness, a good day or a bad day, things in life never remains static. Things keep moving and things keep changing. Seconds keep galloping, minutes keep changing into hours and hours keep turning into days. Free your mind from such things which are capable of crippling it from thinking distinctively. Notwithstanding the situation, keep moving to the purposeful land.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The purpose of life seems to be to acquaint a man with himself and whatever science or art or course of action he engages in reacts upon and illuminates the recesses of his own mind. Thus friends seem to be only mirrors to draw out and explain to us ourselves; and that which draws us nearer our fellow man, is, that the deep Heart in one, answers the deep Heart in another, -- that we find we have (a common Nature) -- one life which runs through all individuals, and which is indeed Divine.
author: Cary Grant Mr. Lucky

quote: Many people get visited by the Lord in a given time but lack the wisdom to navigate in it.
author: Spanish Proverb

quote: Bitter wisdom is better than sweet folly.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The holy spirit is the sole instrument of my judgement and wisdom
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Do not feel sad for your tears as rocks never regret the waterfalls
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: To be real is to be who you are according to the purpose which God wants you to accomplish but not to be who people want you to be according to what they think you should be.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Proudness is from ignorance, humbleness is from wisdom
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Traveler! If you keep wandering in the path of wisdom you too eventually become a man of wisdom!
author: Miravel

quote: One who loves roses cannot avoid its thorns.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Teachers and leaders and storytellers and healers will grow from the earth like blessed flowers, blossoming outward with Divine guidance, to lead the rest.
author: Donna Goddard

quote: Growth of human hair is the absolute blessing for a barber
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: In the arena of life, so many lessons are taught but few are taken and few are applied
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: At the school of wisdom, mistake is not just a lesson but, a laboratory
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Know who you are and be who you are insofar as it is deem fit, for there is nothing so contemptuous to be who you are!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: The smartest fish are still in the sea.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: In reality, the world is not an arena of comfort but comfort that works! Comfort that makes impact! Yes, comfort that changes lives and leaves a distinctive footprint! Truly, comfort that does not work is only discomfort at work in silence. So many people shall dwell in comfort without working with it only to meet discomfort one day and remember comfort!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Small truths have greater power than big lies.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Because the sun helps you in the day, do not scoff at stars at night.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: It is a new day for a new thought, new identity, new ideas, new steps and new breathe! We may choose to repeat the mistakes of yesterday or think of the lessons from the mistakes of yesterday. We may choose dwell on the fortunes or misfortunes of yesterday or think of what we can do with the fortunes or misfortunes of yesterday today! We may choose to continue or discontinue the steps we took yesterday today. Life is here today and we must think of what we can do today for today was the vision of yesterday and the true foundation of tomorrow!
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: true giving lies not in receiving but in giving
author: Munia Khan

quote: They that pursue their dreams unrelentingly with tenacity and the right attitude never continue to live with dreams forever. They live their dreams and realize their aspirations.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Every author loves to read his own words.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: to live and leave indelible footprints, think of the rocks
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: It is in vain to wipe away tears in the rain.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The blossoms fall just once each winter, yet in our memories, they fall every day.
author: John E. Wordslinger

quote: You can crush a rose
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: The value of darkness can never be measuredif you don’t break its cheap spell secretly treasured
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Light enters a broken vessel more easily than an intact one.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: Smiling through confusion is courage.Smiling through tears is strength.Smiling through pain is power.Smiling through tragedy is greatness.
author: you cannot hide what God has revealed.The world deserves the light that’s within you

quote: Everybody can do something. Anyone can do anything, but, it takes an understanding of real freedom to know do’s and don’ts and the essence of do’s and don’ts’. Nobility knows rules, nobility understands rules, and nobility recognizes the real reasons for staying within the border lines of rules that uphold dignity as a sacred responsibility. Nobility least do things anyhow, anywhere and anytime.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Dream more.Learn more.Work more.Become more.
author: Ka Chinery

quote: There is always a good choice and there is always a better choice. There is always the best choice and there is always a choice to choose. If only you would think of the summary of your life tomorrow today, you would yearn to live and leave a distinctive footprint and you would never stand for anything at all
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: What you are trying to let go of...is already gone.
author: Alper Mazun

quote: You cannot lose if you have learned one new lesson.You cannot lose if you have helped one new person.You cannot lose if you have overcome one new obstacle.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: A clean pond is more useful than a dirty ocean.
author: Eric Onyango Otieno, Touring My Mind

quote: A strong ant is better than a weak lion.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The eye, though small, sees remarkable things.The ear, though small, hears remarkable things.The hand, though small, carries remarkable things.The foot, though small, transports remarkable things.The tongue, though small, utters remarkable things.The mind, though small, perceives remarkable things.The heart, though small, contains remarkable things.The soul, though small, experiences remarkable things.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: You cannot till this year’s land using last year’s sun.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Read when you can.Teach when you ought.Learn when you must.Apply when you should.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: You have not lost if you have learned one new lesson.You have not lost if you have helped one new person.You have not lost if you have overcome one new obstacle.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Maxims serve the wise
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The hidden hand of contentment is in the rewards of the gratified. The hidden hand of bliss is in the rewards of the tranquil. The hidden hand of happiness is in the rewards of the elated. The hidden hand of joy is in the rewards of the jubilant.
author: prudence takes care of it.

quote: If you debate the wise,no matter how poor,they will hearken to wisdom.If you debate the foolish,no matter how rich,they will mock wisdom.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Wisdom is reliable
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: One secret to wisdom:think more, speak less.If you let your words be few,your troubles will not be many.
author: wisdom is a heavenly liberator.

quote: I would rather be average and wise than be extraordinary and imprudent.
author: proverbs are her offspring.

quote: Life is a gift
author: he who obeys God is wisest.

quote: You can see a person without using your eyes,hear a person without using your ears,carry a person without using your hands,speak to a person without using your mouth,and move a person without using your feet.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Ignorance need not remove the crown on the head of a king before making him a slave
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Wisdom always ends up in gain
author: walk away from it.Pay attention to wisdom

quote: A wise person is able to bring down a thousand armies with a single insight
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: It is wise to read some books, and wise to throw away some.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Befriend knowledge
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Wisdom is simple but profound.Folly, even when complex, is stupid.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: So much can be done,even when little is said.So little can be done,even when much is spoken.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Less fear, more courage.Less doubt, more faith.Less talking, more action.Less ignorance, more knowledge.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Strength accomplishes sizable things.Wisdom accomplishes incredible things.Faith accomplishes remarkable things.Love accomplishes unbelievable things.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Wisdom is better than flattery, even if bitter in your ears.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: What the wise see eyes closed is greater than what the ignorant see both eyes open.
author: everyone must acquire it.Folly is dangerous

quote: When you strike the shepherd you strike the sheep.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: You don’t need a long beard to be a sage
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: To forsake wisdom is to seek folly,to seek folly is to seek evil,to seek evil is to be in the arms of the devil,and to be in the arms of the devil is be in the arms of death.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: We must remember each day we wake up that, there is something best to think about always than the better things we think about always
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Water wrestles great opponents,but has no hands,and tramples great rivals,but has no feet.It slips through our fingers,but can swallow entire towns.Wind also slips through our fingers,but can swallow entire cities.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: He who is happy in his hut is better than he who is miserable in his palace.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: A diligent ant is more useful than a lazy cow.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: A cup of wisdom is more valuable than an ocean of intelligence.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: A good question is the shortcut to a good answer.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The blind cannot see light,but can feel its warmth.The deaf cannot hear sound,but are aware of its power.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Speak well of the sun, but know that it can harm you;when enraged, it is pitiless. Speak well of the ocean, but know that it can injure you; when angry, it is merciless. Speak well of the wind, but know that it can wound you; when provoked, it is ruthless.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The deaf cannot hear wind,but can feel its touch.The blind cannot see the sun,but can feel its warmth.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Do good.Spread love.Embrace all.Hurt none.
author: Ken Poirot

quote: pause, ponder,consult, think through it well, understand the consequence, know the benefit and take a second look at it again for it takes a little mistake to cause a big had I know with a deep regret
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: A wise bird would rather lose a worm than a feather.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Be effective not just efficient. Do right things not just things right.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Patience is the blue vitriol to control the fungal emotions of life
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: An eagle can mock a lion only because of its wings.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Knowledge is the seed,intelligence is the stem,understanding is the branch,and wisdom is the fruit.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Planting flowers in a desert is more productive than imparting wisdom to fools.
author: only fools are confident they know everything.

quote: He who is deaf to wisdom is blind to good.
author: Anamika Mishra

quote: Sow wisdom today, and you will reap success tomorrow.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Learning is intelligence.Knowing is understanding.Practicing is wisdom.Teaching is virtue.
author: Dennis Adonis

quote: There is no sharper spear than wisdom.There is no larger shield than faith.There is no better fortress than truth.There is no greater strength than hope.There is no higher power than love.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Knowledge will give you strength,but wisdom will give you power.Talent will give you respect,but genius will give you honor.Pleasure will give you happiness,but joy will give you contentment.Strength will give you fortitude,but love will give you dominion.Courage will give you victory,but faith will give you greatness.Virtue will give you the world,but God will give you universe.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Wisdom lies at the edge of intelligence.Joy lies at the edge of happiness.Faith lies at the edge of boldness.Love lies at the edge of kindness.God lies at the edge of righteousness.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Somewhere, somebody is looking for someone exactly like you.
author: Wayne Gerard Trotman, Kaya Abaniah and the Father of the Forest

quote: Real Martial Arts is Mathematics, Physics, Poetry; Meditation in Action
author: the day you will value the essence of words. The day you will loose your sight

quote: when you see the problem as a more of you and less of people, you will find a distinctive solution to the recurring hurdles. Attitudinal and mindset change can cause a great change
author: Soke Behzad Ahmadi, Shorinjiryu Ryujin Kenpo

quote: Reaping from an opportunity is intelligence
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Future never desires to become a past
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The weaknesses of the wise are better than the strengths of fools.
author: Brandi L. Bates

quote: Honey does not lose its sweetness because it is made by bees that sting.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Pain helps the body grow.Riddles help the mind grow.Loss helps the heart grow.Temptations help the soul grow.
author: they are not worth your time.

quote: As soon as anger knocks at one’s door, wisdom prepares to leave.
author: Munia Khan

quote: Your mockers will only have your attention only if you give them your attention
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: they that fail to recognize, take and and learn the lessons of discomfort well, meet the comforts of life and still live in discomfort
author: it comes here on holiday when we’re all at work.

quote: Courage is not the absence of fear. Hope is not the absence of trouble. Joy is not the absence of pain. Love is not the absence of obstacles.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: It is not for a vulture to teach an eagle how to hunt.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Have gracious thoughts of your neighbors,kind thoughts of your friends,loving thoughts of your family,and humble thoughts of yourself.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: No matter how much territory the wolf conquers the lion will still rule the jungle.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Slaves of wisdom are masters of many.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: When family gathers around for a dying loved one, I have realised, that it probably does more good for the living, than for the dying. Sometimes, death can bring the living together, and death can cause the living to find solace in one another. In this way, death is a part of life, and those who die can in fact give gifts to the living, gifts that they were not able to give while they were still alive and well.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Childishness and childlikeness are two very different things. To know a childlike person, is to know a very mature person; to know a childish person, is to know a very immature person. To know childlikeness is to know original wisdom; to know childishness is to know original error. And there are many children more mature than adults, many adults less mature than children.
author: Germany Kent

quote: True freedom is in not having a master, but in making the master your slave
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: Without our ancestors we would not be.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Elders in the dark see better than children in the light.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: When the tables are turned,whoever was full becomes hungry.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: It is possible to draw a straight line with a crooked pencil.
author: Balkrishn Sanmotra

quote: We are looking for value, guidance, advice, inspiration; for someone to show us the way. When we find him, he is our hero
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: Keeping hatred against someone is like helping him to torture you
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Experience is hard to acquire. Only the wise acquire it
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: Know the laws before you break them
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: Some people have the license to sin: Soldiers, to kill; politicians, writers, priests, businessmen, married man and women, to lie; and married couples to have sex
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: If you want an abscess to cure you must press it hard
author: A.E.H. Veenman

quote: The hardest thing is a man to truly know himself
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: Forget about the great astounding victory. Focus on winning small victories every day, the final victory will come by itself
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: If you allow coldness to engulf you before winter, season is helpless to help you.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: life is full of fantasies. Life is full of realities. Fantasies bring fantasies and realities bring realities. You have a choice. Yes, an inevasible choice. To live in the world of fantasies or to live in the world of realities; your choice!
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: A little drop each day eventually fills the sea.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The world of reality exists. The world of fantasy exists. The great boundary between the world of reality and the world of fantasy is the boundary of pleasure and fallacy. So many people enter into the world of realities through the the gate of betrayal and pain of the world of fantasies. If you live in the world of fantasies, ponder!If you live in the world of realities, learn and use your lessons.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: You cannot cross large rivers without building bridges.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Only a fool lights a fire and tries to hide at the same time.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Small bait cast properly can catch big fish.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: It is a solemn duty to change lives positively.It is a noble honor to inspire and be there for others.It is an irresistible necessity to have empathy
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: Little is the imagination of the person who believes that the future of another may be determined by his/her past. We are so much more than our minds and our memories! We are in fact transcendent souls. If you determine what is ahead by what you can see when you look back, then you will in fact never behold what actually stands in front of you.

quote: we are bound to make mistakes. We are bound to meet mistakes. We have regretted certain decisions we took yesterday today and we may regret some decisions of today tomorrow but not until we regret the regrets, we shall always have the regrets

quote: Many people think that love represents chains, bondage, the opposite of freedom. But people who believe such things are simple-minded creatures who have been lied to, and who easily accept the general trend of the lie. It is in fact love that is the only thing powerful enough to set one free from even the most deeply-embedded and thoroughly-wound chains of the soul, the mind, and the body. The fact is that we are born into chains and born into bondages; these things are put upon us by fear, pain and doubt. When you are thoroughly loved by someone in mind and in heart, this has the power to set you so free, more free than you have ever been before. And that is because freedom is not the equivalent of detachment. Freedom is the equivalent of that which sets you free. And when someone loves you the way that only they can, that is what sets you free.
author: Angel M.B. Chadwick

quote: You cannot buy trust,you have to earn it.
author: Bernadette McDonald

quote: I think it is a wise person who does not answer the door to uninvited police officers. Who knows what kind of crazy person could be standing there with a loaded gun!

quote: Follow both: the call of the mountain of enlightenment and the temptation of the valley of experience. No mountain without valley, no valley without mountain.

quote: If you are a finger, your honesty is the hand to make your existence worth living.

quote: I believe that we are not determined either to heaven or to hell, through our actions here on Earth. On the contrary, I believe that we come either from heaven or from hell, prior to this life, and we carry our prior origins inside of us, at all times. People just go back to where they originally came from. And they live in this life as a result of where they once were. Of course, we have the capacities to develop and to build and to create more, while we are here, and perhaps even to change the course of our destinies, but I believe that the soul matter of individuals, are varied and are not of all the same origins.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: If a person has wisdom, then he will also have the anointing. But sometimes a person with theanointing may not have much wisdom.

quote: Wisdom dwells in the heart of God.

quote: All people want to belong to some sort of hierarchy. Allow me to explain. The rich want to be the richest; the poor want to be the smartest; those who are both rich and smart want to be the better persons; the better persons want to go to heaven; those who are in heaven will look down upon those who are in hell... there is always some kind of hierarchy desired by everyone; even by those who claim the opposite of this. So how do you find true divinity? Divinity is found in those who reach down low; because it is those who are above who must reach down low, while it is those who are below who must constantly reach for what is above! And this is divinity. What is divine, is what will have a curiosity in what is below. There is no fear of becoming "tainted"; because what is lesser can never really taint what is greater. it is what is greater than is able to transform what is lesser. The alchemist must first find the mud, pick it up, before she is able to transform it into diamond.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Knowledge is life. The more informed you are, the better you are in making the best decision.

quote: Thought is uncontrollable but controllable. Thought is the pivot of life and the epitome of good or bad living. A controlled thought is a controlled life and an uncontrolled life is an uncontrolled living. Our first and last thoughts from dawn to dusk are of great essence to living a purposeful life. They form a catalyst for a progressive or retrogressive life. What do you think of most before you sleep? What do you ponder upon most upon waking up from bed? The distinctive boundaries to your purposeful day are your first and last thoughts of the day. Remember! the first and the last thoughts.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: What will be your death note?

quote: I have learned that we may change the very nature of our thoughts, by changing the tone of voice we are thinking in! No one has ever paid attention to what tone of voice they are speaking in, during the time that their words are going on in their heads! People only pay attention to their tones of voice when their words are on their tongues! But it is the tone of voice we think in, that is responsible for creating the energy we emit. You may be screaming on the inside and even though you are calm on the outside, you are going to create the energy of your thoughts. If you want real change in your life, in your mind— really, just change the tone of voice that you think in!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Children of the light, walk in the light.

quote: Why do we laugh at insecurity in other people? Why do you get a kick out of someone feeling insecure? Do you not have your own insecurities to battle with? Do you not have your own battles to fight? So where is the honor in finding amusement in the insecurity of another? If someone stepped in just in time to soothe your own struggling mind, wouldn’t that have made a world of a difference? Then why wouldn’t you do just that, for another? Don’t laugh at the insecurities of another person; because that could very well be you. Soothe the minds of others, because that’s exactly what you know you are in such need of.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Life is uncertain, we can only hope.

quote: See everything, but judge nothing. Just choose your own path and let others choose their own. See everything, but judge no one. Just focus on your own path and let others focus on their own. See everything, but judge not what you see. You have your own inner worlds to conquer, your own inner gardens to water and to hone. You have your own inner gold to mine. See all, judge not, know thyself.

quote: No man was born in chains; it is their fellow man who has put them in chains, and at any given time, every single man and woman has the absolute right to break free from those chains of any nature and of any form! It is not God who has put you in any sort of bondage! It is your fellow man who puts you in bondage in the name of God!

quote: When God gives you a dream, He provide heavenly resources to fulfill the dream.

quote: When you are on a great mission, look simple;think and act complexly
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Today I began to criticise myself and look at myself with a judgmental eye... but then instead of going all out in that direction, I stopped and I began to understand me. And then I began to be patient with me. And then I began to feel a softness in the middle of my chest. So then I concluded that I can understand and be patient with me, just like how I am always understanding and being patient with everyone else. Why? Because I deserve that, and more.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: The process of enlightenment and evolution can never happen without the realisation of shortcomings. People, when they think they are the best and can’t get any better, are easily offended when others see room for improvement. But it is when you think you are already the best that you have put a ceiling right on top of your head, a ceiling made of concrete, that stops you from becoming any better! Be happy when you see an area for improvement! Be happy that someone pointed it out to you, be happy that there is still space above you for you to reach towards; and not just an impenetrable ceiling of satisfaction and ideology.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: The Christian living is a spiritual welfare. As the year draws to an end, seek the face of the Lord for guidance in the coming year.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Be of good cheer, your visions will be fulfilled in their own time.

quote: It is good to know that every single title/rank you hold is earned in a high cost of hard work, not some random self given title/rank.

quote: The Bible, profound wisdom .

quote: For peace read books, for success read books and take actions.

quote: Good and bad are illusions. What exists is either the presence of empathy or the lack of it. I think this should become the new, clear definition of how we see people. No more "good" and no more "bad". Those terms are highly subjective.

quote: the greatest clue to changing people is to know and understand what trigger change in people and effectively apply such things in wisdom.

quote: Do we reflect on life? Someday this life will be gone.

quote: Protect your dreams from your nightmare

quote: Don’t fall in love with the idea of someone being in love with you; fall in love with a person. Don’t fall in love with the idea of being in love with someone else; fall in love with a person. Don’t fall in love with a concept, an idea, a theory... don’t fall in love with a list on a paper. Fall in love with a person. Always, always, it must be the person.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Use what you have or risk losing it.

quote: Forgiveness is a very curious thing, in that you must not only know how to forgive; but you must also know how to accept forgiveness. Both of these aspects are equally important. When someone forgives you— believe it.

quote: One thing that creates difference between pilgrims of life as they journey along the various paths of life is the head. It makes some fall, others rest and some pursue to the farther.The reason for the difference is not the size, shape, hair color or the style of the head but what is within the head, what fills the mind, what enters the ears; what the eyes look and see, what the ears hear and listen to; make some champions of life and others wanders of life.
author: Ian Ségal, Castling the Crowns

quote: I want to be a transitory fallen, lifted up by virtues every time.
author: Ian Ségal, Castling the Crowns

quote: Children can be shaped into any way one desires.
author: Meera Uberoi, Leadership Secrets From The Mahabharata

quote: Lightning hides the colour of night
author: R.H. Peat

quote: What a shame it would be, if upon death, one who lived his life following his religion, were to find out that there is no Heaven and no Hell and that all souls just go out and back to the places where they came from, finally free from the monsters that hung onto their backs while they were in this world! And what a shame it would be, if upon death, one who lived life with no thought of her own soul, were to find out that some souls go to some place wonderful and some souls go to some place horrible! But what a shame it would be, for anyone, to live a life here on this Earth full of fear, void of freedom and happiness, meaningless and empty, due to either the probability of Heaven and Hell or the absence thereof! So what is really true, is that you and I have bones in our bodies and have flesh under our skin and we ought to live this life right here in such a way that creates Heaven on Earth and puts Hell far away.
author: R.H. Peat

quote: You can never be lost when you learn to get lost into the blue of the sea..

quote: There is non who is unfriendly, even the person we may regard as unfriendly has a friend. Our mind is the only limitation and barrier to people

quote: Comparing ourselves instead of taking lessons from ourselves is not only a catalyst to diminishing our true purpose but also a great ingredient to thinking negative and staying in mediocrity

quote: if you are to begin at the beginning of the end, do not wait till the end before you begin. Time and timing is an essential accoutrement in the journey of life.

quote: Without fools there would be no wisdom.

quote: Live in the seasons of life like you live in the seasons of the world.

quote: fear is dangerous but fear is good

quote: Complexity looks at simplicity and laughs at it for being too simple. But this is stupidity. Which is more valuable? The drop of pure rose oil or the cologne that mixes that one drop with many other things in order to make it affordable enough? It takes 60,000 roses to make a single ounce of rose oil. In simplicity there is value, there is meaning. Complexity is what happens when value and meaning are watered down. Don’t play games with pure-hearted people; they don’t need your rubbish. And don’t try to water them down so you can afford them.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Sell your materials but save your morals.
author: Liam Howley, The Absurd Demise of Poulnabrone

quote: Use your youth to do something useful or unique or ultimate.

quote: Creativity is admired only if it solves the problem.

quote: Opinions are like hearts. Everyone has one, but they are not ALL healthy.

quote: You have given intelligence to find one solution, and imagination to find ten.

quote: We are limited by knowledge, not by courage.

quote: You are only Invulnerable when you are in Fear

quote: Dreamers have a territorial seed in them that give them the power to possess, to dominate and to influence the world.
author: Euginia Herlihy

quote: To plan and talk is good but to plan and take action is even greater.
author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

quote: People have boldness to criticize but not to sensitize.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: At any given moment, you have the power to say: This is not how the story is going to end.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Improvement is not enough, you also needs innovation.
author: Anastasia Novyh "Allatra"

quote: My ideas will not be discussed, they will be executed.

quote: Consistency is good, but progress is better.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: A phenomenon noticeable throughout history regardless of place or period is the pursuit by governments of policies contrary to their own interests. Mankind, it seems, makes a poorer performance of government than of almost any other human activity. In this sphere, wisdom, which may be defined as the exercise of judgment acting on experience, common sense and available information, is less operative and more frustrated than it should be. Why do holders of high office so often act contrary to the way reason points and enlightened self-interest suggests? Why does intelligent mental process seem so often not to function?
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: The only measurement I understand is perfection.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Improvement is not enough, you also need innovation.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: God has created you, not your future.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Before you get bored of yourself try creativity in your life.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: A man can build a home but it needs a woman to run a home.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: After I leave the earth my work is anyway going to belong to the world for centuries but till that time I want to work freely.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Pragmatism is good prevention for problems.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: A civilization must be judged by its standards not by its expenditure.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: People with responsibility and people without responsibility are sorry for each other.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: In the world that we live in— purity and innocence are the true strengths. It is strength to live in a world like this and remain pure of heart, it is strength to live in a world like this and retain innocence. These are things that the world wants to take away from you, that experiences tend to alter and attempt to redefine. The wild ones aren’t the defiled ones— the wild ones are the pure ones, the innocent ones. It takes a true wildness to retain these things through the fire and through the storms. It takes a real wildness to remain in the wild— not contorted and maligned by circumstance and experiences. And it takes power to stand up and to choose what experiences we allow to take root or to even come into our lives.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: People never forget two things, their first love and the money they wasted watching a bad movie.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Emotions manipulates the man more than habits do.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: At home I am a man, at work I am a machine.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Never believe a friend who offered you his friendship just because he was getting bored.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Negotiation is permissible for mediocrity not for excellence.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: People come to me for the solution of their problem, if my knowledge and experience is not enough to solve the problem, I go to my library read the relevant book and provide the solution.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
