quote: People are crazy about food, smoking, drinking, girls but not about their dreams.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: People wonder if it’s possible to meet a person, or to just read their name out loud for the first time— and within those moments— to know them, to remember them, even if you have never met them before! Well of course this is possible and in fact, for some of us, our lives are spent reuniting with such people. There are different types of bonds. Some we have ran with, some we have swam with, others we have won battles side-by-side! And then there is the one whom we have loved. Some of us have been here so many times before— that we spend this lifetime not wasting any moments— but we spend our moments searching for those we have bonds with. And of course, searching for the one we are bound to. Our dreams at night— they contain our memories of places we think we’ve never even been to, of people we think we’ve never even met before. Of course, yes, it is possible to read a name out loud and for the vibration of that name on your lips to open up a casket filled with things that are anything but dead! Nothing dies.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Respect those elder to you in years, in knowledge and spiritual attainment and act with love and compassion with those who are younger or less fortunate than you.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: By practicing compassion and forgiveness, one can control hatred.
author: Radhe Maa

quote: Saints love all beings. They love even those who attempt to harm them.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Hatred can be cured by love.
author: Radhe Maa

quote: Live a virtuous life, help everyone and spread joy wherever you go.
author: Prerak Trivedi

quote: Spiritual growth is the only real growth
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The most important question I ask myself as a parent is this. How can I best help my children be fully themselves and happy with who they are in the world, however they show up.
author: Harrish Sairaman

quote: Let your children nourish their knack, for that knack shall one day provide them with the way to live with dignity and contentment.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Human Making is Our Mission: A Treatise on Parenting

quote: If there are ten thousand medieval peasants who create vampires by believing them real, there may be one–probably a child–who will imagine the stake necessary to kill it. But a stake is only stupid wood; the mind is the mallet which drives it home.
author: Kate Atkinson, Life After Life

quote: A child is child.
author: Sarah Waters, The Night Watch

quote: 25. Whenever two human beings spend time together, sooner or later they will probably irritate one another. This is true of best friends, married couples, parents and children, or teachers and students. The question is: How do they respond when friction occurs? There are four basic ways they can react:•	They can internalize the anger and send it downward into a memory bank that never forgets. This creates great pressure within and can even result in disease and other problems.•	They can pout and be rude without discussing the issues. This further irritates the other person and leaves him or her to draw his or her own conclusions about what the problem may be.•	They can blow up and try to hurt the other person. This causes the death of friendships, marriages, homes, and businesses.•	Or they can talk to one another about their feelings, being very careful not to attack the dignity and worth of the other person. This approach often leads to permanent and healthy relationships.
author: Natalia Ginzburg, The Little Virtues

quote: It is childish to eat primarily or only to please your tongue.
author: M.F.K. Fisher, Sister Age

quote: That’s what children eventually were for their aging parents: custodians of technology, free personal IT departments keeping them from disappearing forever from the universal cloud.
author: Steven Aitchison

quote: Keep those that influence you for the better close and never give them a reason to keep you far away.
author: Theodore Sturgeon, The Complete Stories of Theodore Sturgeon, Volume III: Killdozer!

quote: If your child is constantly interrupting or doing other things to get your attention, he is not getting enough communication of the right kind. Just the fact that you are in the house with him all day does not mean that you are necessarily devoting any time to communication of his choice.
author: Lorraine Loria, Wild about Manners

quote: The process of grief and loss is as unique as your personal DNA (deoxyribonucleic acid)
author: Theodore Sturgeon, The Complete Stories of Theodore Sturgeon, Volume III: Killdozer!

quote: Mandy smiled cheerfully at an overweight kid in a gold sweater and pink skirt who was chasing her little brother around along the boardwalk. When she was that age, on sunny days she’d be out on the boardwalk with Jud and Wendy, buying rainbow sorbet from the ice cream shop and placing paper boats into the harbour. She felt like a ghost, drifting past the shell of her own childhood.
author: Rainbow Rowell, Landline

quote: This generation seems to see children as a financial burden and responsibility to be avoided.
author: Jennifer Elisabeth, Born Ready: Unleash Your Inner Dream Girl

quote: At first parenthood was as I had expected, exhausting, sometimes heinous, and occasionally divine. I held my children close enough to feel them breathe, laugh, swallow.
author: David Chiles

quote: Children with disabilities are stronger than we know, they fight the battles that most will never know.
author: Neil Gaiman, The Ocean at the End of the Lane

quote: The imagination and trust of a young child are immeasurable. Through the prism of their eyes all things are possible, all dreams come true, and all people are friends. There is beauty in the seriousness of their play and their laughter is pure and unspoiled. Regardless of what other people say…go ahead and act like a child. Hang on to that simple spirit of living for as long as you possibly can.
author: Albert J. LaChance, The Third Covenant: The Transmission of Consciousness in the Work of Pierre Teilhard de Chardin, Thomas Berry, and Albert J. LaChance

quote: As a mother I see the future in the present. Every little thing she does or says makes me form a hypothesis of how she will see life and treat others in 20 years. So I plan for how amazing she will be now. Instead of living my life I have to live hers. Some may not understand how important it is to be a parent. How present, efficient, selfless, and imaginative you must be. But I do. I only pray that this little face is stronger than I am and more successful for this world and the next. I chase her butterflies. She was created from scratch and presented as a gift from God. She will never roam free, unattended and unloved.
author: Jackie Kennedy

quote: We can be much, much more than we were taught in teachers college... more than stern ladies at the front of the room who teach children to recite by rote. We can be, we MUST BE, learning partners, champions, observers, explorers, friends- and , for these special hurt children we need to be family
author: Galina Nelson

quote: First you be a hero and then raise your child to be a hero.
author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

quote: Angel of Fire is about an ordinary boy to whom extraordinary things happen
author: Eunice Baumann-Nelson Ph.D PENOBSCOT

quote: Children are born with imaginations in mint condition, able to leap tall buildings in a single bound. Then life corrects for grandiosity.
author: Eleonore Caron, Gizmo and Ellen Mysteries: The Case of the Missing Boy

quote: Her scream of utter horror and fright was a sound that no one in the chamber would ever forget.~Crispin.~
author: Clark Ashton Smith

quote: Men do not want solely the obedience of women, they want their sentiments. -The Subjection of Women
author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

quote: My least favorite form of street harassment is when a guy asks why I’m not smiling. It’s related to that: Women aren’t allowed to be quiet or stoic or shy—or, hell, just in a bad mood—without being criticized. Women are bitchy and frigid if we don’t seem accessible at all times, for the most part to men. We’re supposed to be perpetually friendly. Who wants to live up to that? And seriously, when was the last time you heard a quiet woman described as “deep”?Men who are serious are just that—serious. Think laconic cowboys and Clint Eastwood-style movie heroes. Strong and silent is a desirable personality trait for men—women, not so much. Because where silence in men is seen as strength, silence in women (if not seen as bitchy) is seen as weakness—she’s shy, a wallflower.
author: Sara Ahmed, The Promise of Happiness

quote: It is presumptuous to draw conclusions about a person from what one has heard
author: George Eliot, Middlemarch

quote: A society where everyone is following his own unique path has a much better chance to find the truth than the society where everyone is following some known cliché paths!
author: Stephen Magnus

quote: People are related to one another, not as total personalities, but as the embodiments of economic functions, or when they are not at work, as irresponsible seekers of entertainment. Subjected to this kind of life, individuals tend to feel lonely and insignificant. Their existence cases to have any point of meaning
author: Irfa Rahat

quote: It is impossible to examine questions we refuse to ask.
author: Chuck Klosterman, but what if we are wrong chuck klosterman

quote: Everyone is trying to impress everyone else. to make themselves out to be smarter or more confident than they actually are.
author: Bobby F. Kimbrough Jr.

quote: Liking other people is an illusion we have to cherish if we are to live in society. It is one I have long ago banished from my life. You wish to be liked. I wish simply to be.
author: Raif Badawi, 1000 Lashes: Because I Say What I Think

quote: Blessed is the society with elderly souls.
author: Greg Ip, The Little Book of Economics: How the Economy Works in the Real World

quote: As with all new inventions, there are upsides and downsides. The commercial drone is no exception. But until robust safeguards have been introduced to protect personal privacy from prying eyes in the skies, the true benefits to society of unmanned aerial vehicles will remain unrealised.
author: Erich Fromm, The Revolution of Hope: Toward a Humanized Technology

quote: Human kind has always been in the shadows of each other since its persistence of social interventional among the large groups of human societies.
author: Kate Griffin

quote: The formation of society serves not only for defensive purposes, but is also very useful, and, indeed, absolutely necessary, as rendering possible the division of labor. If men did not render mutual assistance to each other, no one would have either the skill or the time to provide for his own sustenance and preservation: for all men are not equally apt for all work, and no one would be capable of preparing all that he individually stood in need of. Strength and time, I repeat, would fail, if every one had in person to plow, to sow, to reap, to grind corn, to cook, to weave, to stitch and perform the other numerous functions required to keep life going; to say nothing of the arts and sciences which are also entirely necessary to the perfection and blessedness of human nature.
author: Manasa Rao

quote: The economy of early hominids and that of twenty-first century society have enormous differences, but they do share one important feature: in both of these economies, humans accumulate information in objects. Our world is different from that of early hominids only in the way in which atoms are arranged.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Through positive civil actions, the church can influence the society.
author: Naoyuki Ochiai, syndrome 1866 10

quote: Imperfection is the greatness of humanity
author: Mayank  Sharma, A Cocktail of Love

quote: How then did it work out, this? How did one judge people, think of them? How did one add up this and that and conclude that it was liking one felt, or disliking?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: All spheres of life in society are mission fields. They are the “Promised Land” where the Lordwill lead us to.
author: Sally Crawford, Daily Life in Anglo-Saxon England

quote: ☺☺ When a man gets you 99, he starts to think, he may only have another 10 years of sexy lovemaking left... Still Smiling At 99. ☺☺
author: Ken Poirot, Mentor Me: GA=T+E—A Formula to Fulfill Your Greatest Achievement

quote: Truth can conquer but only beauty can rule.
author: but the man hides the nature itself. Nature decides when to show a man what

quote: A society that has no wrongs will soon have no rights.
author: César A. Hidalgo

quote: Now domestication and sophistication of men by women are the norm and acceptable by society, but they are terrible for manhood.
author: Bernard Pomerance, The Elephant Man

quote: I’ve had the great pleasure of meeting Newt Gingrich and having a chat with the fellow on a staircase,” ex–Sex Pistols vocalist John Lydon once told Rolling Stone. “I found him completely dishonest and totally likable, because he doesn’t care.
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: But a society in which pluralism is not undergirded by some shared values and held together by some measure of mutual trust simply cannot survive. Pluralism that reflects no commitments whatever to the common good is pluralism gone berserk... ..Leaders unwilling to seek mutually workable arrangements within systems to their own are not surviving the long-term interest of their constituents
author: Janice Cantore, Visible Threat

quote: All but universally, human architecture values front elevations over back entrances, public spaces over private. Danny Jessup says that this aspect of architecture is also a reflection of human nature, that most people care more about their appearance than they do about their souls.
author: Solomon E. Asch

quote: Because knowledge is not for showing off. If I do good work, people should notice me.
author: William S. Burroughs, Naked Lunch

quote: A small world where people know each other, and still so deep, able to get lost.
author: Amish Tripathi, The Immortals of Meluha

quote: And that’s the terrible myth of organized society. That everything that’s done through the established system is legal. And that word has a powerful psychological impact. It makes people believe that there is an order to life and an order to a system. And that a person who goes through this order and is convicted has gotten all that is due him and therefore society can turn its conscious off and look to other things and other times. And that’s the terrible thing about these past trials that they have this aura of legitimacy an aura of legality. I suspect that better men than the world has known and more of them have gone to their deaths through a legal system then through all the illegalities in the history of man. Six million people in Europe during the Third Reich, legal, Sacco and Vanzetti, quite legal, the Haymarket defendants, legal, the hundreds of rape trials throughout the south where black men were condemned to death all legal, Jesus legal, Socrates legal and that is the kaleidoscopic nature of what we live through here and in other places because all tyrants learn that it is far better to do this thing through some semblance of legality than to do it without that pretext.
author: Mark Fisher, Capitalist Realism: Is There No Alternative?

quote: After being hurt by the world so much, they began to see the demons within humans. So without hiding it through trickery, they worked to express it.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: Our civilization is not Christian. It does not come from the skies. It is not a result of "inspiration." It is the child of invention, of discovery, of applied knowledge -- that is to say, of science. When man becomes great and grand enough to admit that all have equal rights; when thought is untrammeled; when worship shall consist in doing useful things; when religion means the discharge of obligations to our fellow-men, then, and not until then, will the world be civilized.
author: Janet Fitch, White Oleander

quote: Rather than being guided by images of how to be, people need to attend to how they actually are and to respect this.
author: Stanley Victor Paskavich

quote: Only in the love of those who do not serve a purpose, love begins to unfold.
author: Sharon Salzberg, Real Love: The Art of Mindful Connection

quote: My parents, you see, were a little square. They cared more about being good parents in the general sense than being good parents for me. They wanted to appear normal; respectable and responsible. But they weren’t prepared to acknowledge my individual needs.
author: Rebecca McNutt

quote: Proverbs and truisms are for this reason dangerous, because they produce blindness or non-thought.
author: Christopher R. Browning, Ordinary Men: Reserve Police Battalion 101 and the Final Solution in Poland

quote: From a social psychological standpoint, the selfie phenomenon seems to stem from two basic human motives. The first is to attract attention from other people. Because people’s positive social outcomes in life require that others know them, people are motivated to get and maintain social attention. By posting selfies, people can keep themselves in other people’s minds. In addition, like all photographs that are posted on line, selfies are used to convey a particular impression of oneself. Through the clothes one wears, one’s expression, staging of the physical setting, and the style of the photo, people can convey a particular public image of themselves, presumably one that they think will garner social rewards.
author: Daniel Marques

quote: And The Ucontrolled One Said "If I Am Weird Then You Are Not Normal
author: The Monster Pyro

quote: Religious persons are generally very interested in sex just like any normal person - and have an imagination and the energy for it. When constrained by the guilt cycle, however, they keep it under wraps. When guilt is temporarily removed, they can go to the other extreme. Many can remain in the uninhibited phase for weeks - months at most - then a wave of guilt overtakes them.
author: Idries Shah, Learning How to Learn: Psychology and Spirituality in the Sufi Way

quote: Being good or being evil is not something that is inherent in our nature over which we have no control, rather we define ourselves by the choices we make, moment by moment, situation by situation. All it takes is an act of will to be the best that we can be.
author: Phillip C. McGraw

quote: Real love will take you far beyond yourself
author: Darrel Ray, Sex & God: How Religion Distorts Sexuality

quote: All major religions put most of the responsibility for sexual morality on women. Religions teach that women should remain chaste and should control and hide their sexuality so men will not be tempted.
author: Darrel Ray, Sex & God: How Religion Distorts Sexuality

quote: he who speaks parables knows and understands the real meaning of parables better
author: Colin A. Ross, Evolving Psychosis: Different Stages, Different Treatments

quote: A writer sets up his own amazing experiment: his work of fiction.
author: Mohammad Ali V, The Three Others

quote: Man can be categorized into three levels on social strata: One who are Consciously Unconscious, second who are Unconsciously Conscious - while both are inter-dependent for their survival; the third by and large a rare breed, Consciously Conscious sect – who don’t ever relate to this world!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: To embrace love, we risk heartbreak. To resist love, we risk emptiness.
author: Haruki Murakami, South of the Border, West of the Sun

quote: We all feel that the opposite of our own highest principle must be purely destructive, deadly, and evil. We refuse to endow it with any positive life-force; hence we avoid and fear it.
author: Leviak B. Kelly, The Leprechaun Delusion

quote: Try and set yourself the task not to think of a white bear, and the cursed thing comes to mind every minute.
author: Idries Shah, Knowing How to Know: A Practical Philosophy in the Sufi Tradition

quote: We tend to suppress our anger against each other which ultimately leads to big quarrels some day. If two people have been naturally expressing their differences of opinion or having small arguments on regular basis, they will never have resentment or enmity of a lifetime.
author: C.G. Jung

quote: People are perfectly capable of giving love even if they feel less confident about themselves.
author: Anna Agoncillo, Psychology Of Love, Money, & Life

quote: It seems to be almost a law of human nature that it is easier for people to agree on a negative programme, on the hatred of an enemy, on the envy of those better off, than on any positive task. The contrast between the "we" and the "they", the common fight against those outside the group, seems to be an essential ingredient in any creed which will solidly knit together a group for common action. It is consequently always employed by those who seek, not merely support of a policy, but the unreserved allegiance of huge masses. From their point of view it has the great advantage of leaving them greater freedom of action than almost any positive programme.
author: Idries Shah, Tales of the Dervishes: Teaching Stories of the Sufi Masters over the Past Thousand Years

quote: Rest as the awareness that is aware without using thought.
author: Loch Kelly, Shift Into Freedom: The Science and Practice of Openhearted Awareness

quote: What the new science of anthrozoology reveals is that our attitudes, behaviors, and relationships with the animals in our lives- the ones we love, the ones we hate, and the ones we eat- are, likewise, more complicated than we thought.
author: Hal Herzog

quote: To show how memory changes to fit our story, psychologists study how memories evolve over time: if your memories of the same people change, becoming positive or negative spending on what is happening in your life now, then it’s all about you, not them. This process happens so gradually that it can be a jolt to realize you ever felt differently.
author: LHandLG, Stolen Inheritance - A True Story of Oil, Army and Murder

quote: The process of learning is the process of discovering what really exists.
author: Idries Shah, Sufi Thought and Action

quote: Definitions from Mulla Do-PiazaWisdom: Something you can learn without knowing it.
author: Criss Jami, Healology

quote: ...even though we do not have the wisdom to enumerate the reasons for the behaviour of another person, we can grant that every individual does have his private world of meaning, conceived out of the integrity and dignity of his personality.
author: Idries Shah, Caravan of Dreams

quote: Need is what tears people apart. When you want someone, you never really need them. But as soon as you start to need someone, they no longer want you.
author: Idries Shah, The Dermis Probe

quote: What if I said, there was a way
author: Katandra Jackson Nunnally, Carnal Sobriety

quote: If we can predict, then we have observed enough to know that what we are observing does not just happen randomly; we have noted a pattern of regularities.
author: Otto Weininger

quote: Acknowledging the important role of the emotions in health and illness, medicine must reexamine its concepts of disease causation.
author: GonzoBilly

quote: We are creatures built on a house of cards of language.
author: Initially NO, Percipience: Outside the Range of Understood Sense

quote: There is only one "now." Realize how rich you are in it. Right now you are creating history…your legacy. Make your time count. Do not wish your moments away. Do not ruin today by focusing on another time and place. If we counted our blessings more often, instead of our money, we would be a lot richer. Keep money on your mind but out of your heart. Never get so busy making a living that you forget to make a life for yourself. Cultivate your spiritual growth. The real measure of your wealth is how much you’d be worth if you lost all your money.
author: Anna C. Salter, Predators: Pedophiles, Rapists, And Other Sex Offenders

quote: Untraumatized people have a natural instinct to make healthy decisions in the best interest of their true selves. They are only limited by their immaturity and the brokenness of their external world.
author: Michael Salter, Organised  Sexual Abuse

quote: Business crises energize me. Personal crises devastate me. The doctors call it an avoidance tendency. (Mirena to Eve)
author: Diana Rose Morcilla

quote: Our outer relationships are a mirror of the relationship and communication between our own inner male and female sides. Our outer relationships with a man or a woman are a possibility to understand our own inner man or woman.
author: T. Scott McLeod

quote: She had inherited a story that was strewn with corpses and clotted with enmity, and was only trying to stay alive in it.
author: Barbara Lieberman, The Playlist Anthology

quote: This is a girl you can’t keep. You aren’t allowed to.
author: John  Myer, John Myer: A Collection of his Sermons and Writing, #1

quote: Spirituality is the strength of being.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: You have to stretch your soul to find your potential strength.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Anita is small and colourless in her grey trousers, grey knitted cardigan, grey hair and grey skin. But ove notices that her face is slightly red-eyed and swollen. Quickly she wipes her eyes and blinks away the pain. As women of that generation do. As if they stood in the doorway every morning, determinedly driving sorrow out of the house with a broom.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I tread paths by moonlight that others fear to speak of during day.
author: Steven Redhead, Life Is Simply A Game

quote: You do not give your precious body to the billy clubs of Birmingham sheriffs, nor to the insidious activity of the streets.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: A fool mistakes meekness for weakness and a quiet tongue for an idle mind.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: God gives strength to the weak souls.
author: Ellen Dreyer, The Glow Stone

quote: There is a greater power than human strength.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Acknowledge your inner child. Even though we have found the light in ourselves today, we sometimes forget to heal old wounds of our past. Your inner child still needs to be loved in order to heal the complete self.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: For the nearer everything is unto unpassionateness, the nearer it is unto power. And as grief doth proceed from weakness, so doth anger. For both, both he that is angry and grieveth, have received a wound, and cowardly have as it were yielded themselves unto their affections... For it was ordained unto holiness and godliness, which specially consist in an humble submission to God and His providence in all things; as well as unto justice: these also being part of those duties, which as naturally sociable, we are bound unto; and with without which we cannot happily converse one with another: yea and the very ground and fountain indeed of all just actions.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Every new morning brings new strength, new hope and new vision.
author: lailah    gifty akita

quote: A single minded vision gives strength of purpose.
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: It is only when you lose your wings, you really learn to fly. Its when the sense of loss, becomes the driving force.
author: rekindle of spirit and revitalize of strength.

quote: Always she thought of him as climbing some mountain in his mind, like that great one to the west on which his eyes would dwell so often and from which he seemed to derive something that was even more than strength.
author: Samuel B Watson

quote: Hold fast to your faith.
author: J.K. Rowling, Very Good Lives: The Fringe Benefits of Failure and the Importance of Imagination

quote: Nothing can replace your time and your strength.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Inner voice is the divine voice.
Encouragement is strength of the soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: O Lord, Thy Word, strengthens my spirit.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: WISDOM is the STRONGEST weapon you could EVER acquire in your LIFETIME.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: If you have strength, why won’t you work?
author: Tony Curl

quote: Your self-imposed prison. That think called your COMFORT ZONE. Challenge it, stretch it. You will thank yourself.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Turn your fear around. The other side of it is strength.
author: Kenn Bivins, the Wedding & Disaster of Felona Mabel

quote: Sometimes you need to stop fighting to stop drowning
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: We have one world. We have one chance; to be a united force of positive strength, to feed humanity the light of being humane.
author: Claire Messud, The Woman Upstairs

quote: Be strong enough to move mountains.
author: V.R. Barkowski, My Bloody Valentine

quote: She who leads with her heart is never forgotten.
author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quote: Trials are used by God to teach you dependence on His grace rather than on your strength.
author: Lyna Jones, From Ashes to the Moon: A Memoir of Tears and Miracles.

quote: To move forth and grab your destiny is admirable. To shape your own future with the strength in your fist is beyond that.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: He lay still, his bloodshot eyes staring blankly before him, and drifted into dreams of his problems, compulsively living out dialogues, summing up emotional scenes with his mother, Dot, and his friends. Repeatedly he chided himself to go to sleep, but it did no good, for he was hungry for these waking visions that depicted his dilemmas, yet he knew that such brooding did not help; in fact he was wasting his waning strength, for into these unreal dramas he was putting the whole of his ardent being. The long hours dragged on.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

quote: Hope. It is the quintessential human delusion, simultaneously the source of your greatest strength, and greatest weakness.
author: Anonymous, Deuteronomy

quote: When a man is at his weakest is where he will find the greatest opportunity to become his strongest.
author: Lindsey Allyson, Time Travel

quote: Courage is meant to be strong, while fear is meant to be broken
author: Adam Miller, Badiou, Marion and St Paul: Immanent Grace

quote: That I’ve horrified many flight attendants across the globe with my oft-thought morbid ritual of listening to Tuesday’s Gone as we fly through the sky is not my concern. My declaration evident, my truth now burns: there is no preordained destiny to battle, I thumb my nose at fate. I am a warrior. The rules don’t apply.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: The true purpose of the strong is to promote greater strength in the weak, and not to keep the weak in that state where they are at the mercy of the strong.
author: Christian D. Larson

quote: The strength was always in you. All you had to do was find it.
author: J.B. McGee, Skipping Stones

quote: We have the greatest power through love that can be known. It overcomes everything with its fierce and steady truth, if you can continue to stand in it.You can call love to you, directly from the original stream of consciousness, anytime you feel weak or fearful, and you will be given strength and courage.You can call love to you, directly from the original stream of consciousness, anytime you feel sad or alone, and you will feel embraced and comforted.Call love to you if you feel vulnerable. Feel its purity come to you from the universe and flow round you like a miraculous mother cradling its innocent child.Breathe love in. Say to yourself as you breathe deeply “I love. I am loved.” Say it over and over as you breathe it into yourself and out to the universe, until you really feel and believe that you ARE LOVE.Feel love pour into your lungs as you breathe. Feel it circulate round your body to fill every organ, every limb, and every cell. Vibrate with its radiance, and share it.
author: Jasinda Wilder, Falling into You

quote: Take down the walls.
author: Brandon Mull, Chasing the Prophecy

quote: And maybe that is what it comes down to, knowing what the other person needs even before they know it themselves. Maybe it’s just that simple and it is only us who make it complicated with our anniversaries and our gifts, with grand declarations and public demonstrations, empty words and valuable stones.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: We are living on what we believe and the virtues upon which we stand.
author: Natasha Tsakos

quote: The business of the dead belongs to the living.
author: Polkadot, Enchanted High

quote: Water is such a lifesaver into which we cannot breathe but without taking it into us we cannot live
author: Steven Magee

quote: And I am not one of these long-living fictional characters who prays for death as a release from the captivity of eternal life
author: Asa Don Brown

quote: Every aspect of your life is anchored energetically in your living space, so clearing clutter can completely transform your entire existence.
author: Darnell Lamont Walker

quote: The only way to survive after death is by breathing life into the universe before death.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson, Master of Maxims

quote: This is the best worst time of my life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Live each day with great love, hope and faith.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Never is a man wholly a saint or a sinner.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Those who think life is a competition become corrupt.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: How do you wish to live in lifetime existence; envying, hating and loving? It is better to live life loving
author: Steven Redhead, Unleash The Power of Your Heart and Mind

quote: There’s no rerun of life. Rejoice while there’s breathe.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Live a sacred life of love.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Every journey taken always includes the path not taken, the detour through hell, the crossroads of indecision and the long way home.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Our dreams will always tell us what we are missing in our lives. The smaller we make them tells God how little faith we have in him to make them come true.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: The great way to live life is to love.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Revived spirit, restored strength.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Don’t lose faith in the people.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: How beautiful to be fully alive in the moment?
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough, An Intimate Collision: Encounters with Life and Jesus

quote: Every action you take, leads to a consequence you face. Choose wisely!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: I have no regrets. Everything that happens to me was divinely ordered.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: ...the act of kindness is an unselfish act, it is medicine for your soul...
author: Cortney S. Warren, Lies We Tell Ourselves: The Psychology of Self-Deception

quote: Your thoughts are certain kinds of seeds in your life. You can water them and allow them to grow on fertile soil. Or, you can let them diminish and wither amongst the weeds. Be careful that your seeds are not contaminated as they begin to take root.
author: Richard Sibbes, Christ Is Best

quote: Even a brick wants to be something.A brick wants to be something.It aspires. Even a common, ordinary brick... wants to be something more than it is.It wants to be something better than it is.
author: William Golding, Lord of the Flies

quote: For each and every person, our Lord and Master provides sustenance. Why are you so afraid, O mind? The flamingos fly hundreds of miles, leaving their young ones behind. Who feeds them, and who teaches them to feed themselves? Have you ever thought of this in your mind?
author: Seamus Heaney

quote: I want to do a good job living today.
author: Bond Bixler

quote: Remember, Little Ones, everything is not important all the time. Only living is important all the time. Not things. Not money. Not more things and more endless money. Spend well the quality of your time. And yes, be greedy with your hours. If only to then give those hours away as the most precious gifts you have to offer to yourself, your family, and your friends. And yes, to my Little Ones.” –From The Legacy Letters–“The Everything and Nothing of Money.
author: Ingrid Nkenlifack

quote: Death was easy. Life was complicated.
author: Wes Adamson

quote: Every time we look at the clock, we must learn to feel a sense of urgency. We must learn to realize that “now” is happening and will very soon be gone. We must look at the digits on the display and be overcome with an urge to do something before those digits change. Before “now” slips through our fingers. We must look at the ink on the calendar and see an immediate opportunity to do something wonderful, incredible, or beautiful.It’s that simple. We need to change our thinking from “when the number changes” to “before the number changes”.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: At my core, I know this: God is God. All that lives and breathes flows from him in both original and ongoing states.
author: Naomi Benaron, Running the Rift

quote: Dying’s easy. It’s living that’s hard.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: Green and living jewels drip into my eyes" from the poem "All Green and Living Things" in the book "Terra Affirmative
author: sue atchley ebaugh

quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: but alas! Alas! She must confess to herself that she was not wise yet.

quote: Do not be unkind to other people just because you are passing through difficult times.They are not responsible for your misery.
author: Latika Teotia

quote: One best success comes after their greatest disappointments.
author: Efrat Cybulkiewicz

quote: I kindly ask you to place your name in 1 Corinthians 13:4-6. And read it out loud. This verse will help you reflect on your own behavior, to become the right type of person for yourself and others.
author: Efrat Cybulkiewicz

quote: When we learn to respond to disappointments with acceptance, we give ourselves the space to realize that all our experiences—good and bad alike—are opportunities to learn and grow.
author: Lolly Daskal

quote: Your ability to get along with others flows naturally from how well you are getting along with yourself from your own internal peace and harmony which is itself a function of your peace and harmony with God and your family.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: Just be yourself, when no one believe you!
author: Armin Houman

quote: Forgive transgressions committed by you or others today.Only then can you have peace tomorrow.
author: Gary M. Douglas, Blessed Possibilities

quote: Emotional fog is what a man feels when he begins to answer the questions he has not yet dared to ask himself.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: We become the product of our recurrent thoughts. Writing is one method of explicating upon our thoughts, condensing multiple scenes, times, and ideas, and editing our fragmented beliefs.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster

quote: Most of your struggles with managing your time are due to the self- limiting beliefs. Change your Mindset and you will be able to do lot more in lot less time
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Never let anyone belittle your efforts to better yourself. Let them stand back or stand aside, but you move forward no matter who tries to stop you.
author: Sanchita Pandey, Cancer to Cure

quote: Desire is the starting point of all achievement.
author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Vision

quote: By taking control of the present, you are choosing to alter the past you are making for yourself, and your future too.
author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, Mirror

quote: You can elevate yourself to higher self by devotion to God.
author: Jenny  Lawson

quote: I need to open this door of self in order to throw out everything that is useless and to save the meaning ofthe things I have to keep.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: I live in paradise within the pages of a book.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Regret is good. It proves you have a conscience.
author: Bob Proctor

quote: Change occurs when excuses pivot to execution.
author: Jeanne McElvaney, Time Slipping

quote: At the heart of all sales and marketing is the ability to create demand even in the absence of logic.
author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

quote: Most startup failures result from entrepreneurs who are better at making excuses than products.
author: Jay Samit

quote: The best big idea is only going to be as good as its implementation.
author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, Mirror

quote: The joy of disruption comes from accepting that we all live in a temporal state.
author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

quote: Only a coward will not make the necessary changes in his or her life to make it a better one.
author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

quote: Lifelong learning is no longer a luxury but a necessity for employment.
author: Jay Samit

quote: An average idea enthusiastically embraced will go farther than a genius idea no one gets.
author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

quote: Be the best at what you do or the only one doing it.
author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

quote: If life, you get what you believe you deserve.
author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

quote: Plan for ways to get more enjoyment into your life and you will get more joy out of it.
author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

quote: Data has no ego and makes an excellent co-pilot.
author: Jay Samit

quote: A dream with a deadline is a goal.
author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

quote: The most successful people have the same twenty-four hours in a day that you do.
author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

quote: CEOs will gladly overpay for a company if the acquisition enables them to keep their jobs.
author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

quote: You have a choice: pursue your dreams, or be hired by someone else to help them fulfill their dreams.
author: Franz Bardon

quote: Speak as educated nature suggests to you, and you will do well, but let it be educated and not raw, rude, uncultivated nature. Demosthenes took unbounded pains with his voice, and Cicero, who was naturally weak, made a long journey into Greece to correct his manner of speaking. With far nobler themes, let us not be less ambitious to excel.
author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

quote: The majority of people are not willing to risk what they have built for the opportunity to have something better.
author: Sharon Law Tucker, How to Be a BadAss - A Survival Guide for Women

quote: Whoever controls the money, controls you!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Early is a priceless timepiece owned by the successful.
author: Steve Goodier

quote: Trying to fix the shortcoming of others while ignoring your own flaws results in little if no improvement―not to mention bitter feelings. Concentrating on personal growth sets a good example and results in the improvement of one life if not more.
author: Dr. Glen A. Staples

quote: Choices create our map as we travel toward the new reality we are creating ~
author: Chris Prentiss, The Alcoholism and Addiction Cure

quote: Good advice is not often served in our favorite flavor.
author: John Templeton

quote: In the beginning, it is difficult and even painful to see the faults in yourself, the flaws in your soul, the error of your ways. But I have come to love the moments when I see my flaws and I spot my errors! It is one of the most beautiful things, really! Because it is when we see our own flaws and our own errors that we can find the opposite of those things! It is when we see our own flaws and our own errors that we can see that there is so much more room to become better! And so I have come to actually rejoice when I find something wrong with me! And I know when it’s really wrong because I can see it and I can feel it in my heart both at the same time— it is a revelation. It’s not something that comes from any external source; but it is my own spirit and the voice of God revealing these things to me, unfolding them, rolling them out of a silken cloth at my feet. And I smile.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Just one person. It really honestly just takes one positive person. One positive person can help you. And that can go a long, long way. - Alexis
author: Turcois Ominek

quote: It bothers me when people have no problem paying for all they can eat but have problems investing in all they can be.
author: Yasmin Tajuddin

quote: Rule #1: Life is supposed to be fun!
author: Warren Fox, Nobody promised life would be easy

quote: Doing what is right will always keep you moving forward toward your destiny, but choosing the wrong way will keep you stuck in the same spot:No Where!-Anita R. Sneed-Carter
author: David Baddiel, Whatever Love Means

quote: A consistent man believes in destiny
author: Stephanie Klein, Straight Up and Dirty

quote: a destiny in the making is, believe me, not one of those honest mystery stories where all you have to do is keep an eye on the clues. In my youth I once read a French detective tale where the clues were actually in italics; but that is not McFate’s way — even if one does learn to recognize certain obscure indications.
author: Paulo Coelho, The Alchemist

quote: The greater the destiny, the greater obstacles you’ll have to overcome. No great destiny comes without great challenges and sacrifices.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Men who’ve made choices always feel they own their destiny. Few ever think to ask who shaped and offered up those choices. Who dangles the carrot they think they’ve chosen to follow.
author: Joe Joe Dawson

quote: The living word of God is the light for my path.
author: Unarine Ramaru

quote: Choose your sacred-journey.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Travel on your sacred-path.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Write like you have many readers.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Keep travelling. You will discover new paths and new places.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: We are God’s inheritance by grace.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: May the Creator be with you along unknown journey.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Run you own race of life with patient.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The DoveFly your flight my dear doveSing your song, make it reach the oceanI want my freedomI want to live in peaceI want to sing your songTo have your wingsTo be able to flyI want my destiny to leave the path that it is taking now.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Dare to travel on new path.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Some day the road that you choose will be your destiny The hope and the anxiety you grasped tightly Will surely move you and me, because it will become a light
author: Sadashivan Nair, Negative-Positive and We

quote: HeDestiny is very jealous FOR TRUE LOVE
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: In race of life, you have to run at own speed.
author: Kimberly Karalius, Love Fortunes and Other Disasters

quote: What you are
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Your condition does not determine your life history. It’s your decision in that condition that tells more about your destiny. Decide not to see the available as the preferable!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Nothing before its time, son. Everything in its own time, to its own schedule.
author: Beth Moore Jones, The Cinderella Story: The Power of Shoes

quote: sometimes what you have planned, is nothing like the plan your soul invited you, to this earth for.
author: Suzette R. Hinton

quote: A Warrior of the Light does not waste his time listening to provocations
author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar

quote: Strange where our passions carry us, floggingly pursue us, forcing upon us unwanted dreams, unwelcome destinies.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: We are the unknown, he says, and you will join us.
author: Vivake Pathak, God and Destiny

quote: I would say that he has a rather limited and uncreative way of looking at the situation.
author: Arthur Koestler, Drinkers of Infinity: Essays 1955-1967

quote: A novelist must believe he can outdo himself. Or his creative drive would die.
author: Sahara Sanders, INDIGO DIARIES: A Series of Novels

quote: Out of Box” is a metaphor that means to think differently, unconventionally, or from a new perspective.
author: Pearl Zhu, Digital Master: Debunk the Myths of Enterprise Digital Maturity

quote: I am what I have ever read
author: Jessie Burton, The Muse

quote: Words disappear in the air, but writing remains. If you want something to be remembered about you, write it down
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: Creativity is a combination of discipline and childlike spirit.
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, Pearls Of Eternity

quote: You can edit what you write. Why not edit what you say? If it hurts somebody, you can still offer an apology or withdraw your statements
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, Pearls Of Eternity

quote: If you are afraid of the critics you will never write a word
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, Pearls Of Eternity

quote: How do you feel when you read stuff written by dead authors? A visit by a ghost?
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, Pearls Of Eternity

quote: All humans are born with raw creativity ability, but not all creativities are created equal.
author: Pearl Zhu, Digital Valley: Five Pearls of Wisdom to Make Profound Influence

quote: People speak even after their death. Only do speak those who have recorded their speech in writing before they die, the rest go silent forever
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, Pearls Of Eternity

quote: Many writers write because they’ve been there, seen that, did it and burnt their fingers
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, Pearls Of Eternity

quote: Writing is all about self-expression, we want to speak up, to get it off our chest. Whether we make an impact or not that is not for us to decide
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, Pearls Of Eternity

quote: Every book is worth reading. If it cannot make you wiser it will make you a critic
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, Pearls Of Eternity

quote: Neither compares nor competes. Be creative.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Procrastination is a form of punishment
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: What is it that we do here? By easing away from the mania that pulls on us, recalling and reconnecting with our essential spirit and callings, we regenerate our core inspiration and faith in Life and our place within it…with a purposeful eye toward facilitating evolution toward ‘More capable human beings,’ meaning grander, freer, more authentic and meaningfully effective.How do we do that? By delving into pockets of rituals that have, across traditions and cultures, produced superior forms of insight and understanding, healing, evolution and resolution. One could call these tunnels into beauty, truth and love. And we can find access to them in any given day of our lives.
author: Darrell Calkins

quote: We are all just beginners here, and we shall all die beginners.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien, The Fellowship of the Ring

quote: Life is an adventure I am enjoying creating.
author: Howard Thurman, Jesus and the Disinherited

quote: It’s frustration which makes creativity possible.
author: Sergio Troncoso, Crossing Borders: Personal Essays

quote: You have more brain cells than there are grains of sand on your favorite beach, and you have cleverness, dexterity, and creativity—all of which powerfully combine when you are at risk—if you listen to your intuition
author: Onyi Anyado

quote: Transcendence is before you should you choose to take a swim.Into your deep blue you dive and all that is within.Referred to as my subconscious so you may understand me clear.But there’s nothing very simple about the message I’m sending here.The colour of your blood, the liquid through your veins, is really just a pathway to the place that feels your pains.The heart is an ocean but within it there’s a sun, submerged beneath the ocean, and all that is but one.
author: John Mark Reynolds

quote: Intellectual growth is when you surpass the barrier of puerility, puzzling people with your dazzling creativity.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: At the very basic level all people are creators. We are all creating at every moment.
author: Alejandro Escovedo

quote: The creative act is not pure.
author: James A. Owen, Drawing Out the Dragons: A Meditation on Art, Destiny, and the Power of Choice

quote: What you see is what you get. The island is imaginative enough. Creativity don’t need to be wasted on naming things.
author: Aaron Swartz

quote: Life of scarcity teaches creativity.
author: Gerard Puccio

quote: Creativity is not any accumulated knowledge, coming from past to the present. The stage of creation is a spontaneous flash of intelligence, Energy merging with mind, to create a new beginning. Creativity and meditation are similar, as both are expressions of something beyond mind.
author: ELLE NICOLAI

quote: Creativity is at the heart of every stupid idea . . . creativity and stupid are interchangeable . . . because everything inherent to that kind of creativity requires breaking away from the norm, going against the grain, and leaning into risk and fear.
author: M.F. Moonzajer, A moment with God ; Poetry

quote: All art involves conscious discipline. If one is going to paint, do sculpture, design a building or write a book, it will involve discipline in time and energy — or there would never be any production at all to be seen, felt or enjoyed by ourselves or others. To develop ‘Hidden Art’ will also, of course, take time and energy – and the balance of the use of time is a constant individual problem for all of us: what to do, and what to leave undone. One is always having to neglect one thing in order to give precedence to something else. The question is one of priorities” (p. 32).
author: David Sedaris, When You Are Engulfed in Flames

quote: For one thing is needful: that a human being should attain satisfaction with himself, whether it be by means of this or that poetry or art; only then is a human being at all tolerable to behold. Whoever is dissatisfied with himself is constantly ready for revenge, and we others will be his victims, if only by having to endure his ugly sight.
author: Albert Camus, Resistance, Rebellion and Death: Essays

quote: Art was as much in the activity as in the results. Works of art were not just the finished product, but the thought, the action, the process that created them.
author: Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi, Creativity: Flow and the Psychology of Discovery and Invention

quote: Don’t be like everyone else and pawn your dreams for pennies, because they’ll never give you what it’s truly worth.
author: Abdulazeez Henry Musa

quote: Success is the bridge between insanity and credibility.
author: Alahdal A. Hussein

quote: You are the artistic painter of your success. Paint your life day-by-day, into a masterpiece of excellence over a lifetime.
author: Mark LaMoure, Step into Your Vision 2.0: 24 Inspirational Leaders Share Their Goal-Setting Secrets

quote: Now is the right time for you to become excellent. By taking action on your dreams of excellence, you start polishing the rough diamond you are. As you buff and shine yourself with practice, sparkling success becomes yours.
author: Mark LaMoure

quote: To be successful you must be willing to leave your comfort zone. Even then success is not guaranteed
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: You should never consider finished a war you did not win
author: you have to chase after it.

quote: Forget about tomorrow
author: Henrietta Newton Martin -Senior Legal Consultant & Author

quote: Visionaries will always meet opposition from weak minds but the seeds they plant always save the world
author: Latorria Freeman, Turn My Life Around Discovering Your Purpose

quote: Doubt, fear and regret are the three villains of success. However, if you close the door on the first two, you will never have to worry about meeting the third.
author: Marie Blanchard

quote: Life gives us many test. We must graciously take each test!
author: Bluenscottish

quote: Who think about the end will never become a hero .
author: Vishwas Chavan

quote: The way to success is long..But beautiful at the same time.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The outcome is not up to you. The outlook is.
author: Germany Kent

quote: Holding on to negative feelings and past circumstances is like placing a lock on your soul.
author: Charles F. Glassman, Brain Drain   The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: Accept the good, however big or small, with no strings attached.
author: Winsome Campbell-Green, The Secret Rules Of Self-Love: How To Love Yourself, Overcome The Loneliness Of Being Single, And Achieve Happiness

quote: Stars are out and there is seaenough beneath the glistening earthto bear me toward the futurewhich is not so dark. I see.
author: Joyce Rachelle

quote: The question was, could he forgive the past in order to have a future with her? Any future?
author: Look Im A Cat

quote: ...but the future is a teenage crackhead who makes shit up as he goes along.
author: Oswald Chambers, My Utmost for His Highest

quote: This is what you have to understand. You grew up, you went to this school and that one, you made these friends and those. It was nothing. The future is a much bigger deal than the past, Adrian, a much bigger deal. Not just because it has babies in it, but because there are better people in it, who are better behaved and more fun to be with, the scenery is better, the weather is better, the rewards and thrills are better. But I really am not sure that you will ever...
author: Kate McGahan

quote: Your future self is watching you right now through your memories.
author: Munia Khan

quote: In this delicate and unpredictable life, the future is unwritten. Do not take someone for granted today, for once tomorrow dawns upon the indigo night the only remaining trace will be tracks in the sand...
author: Kevin Hancock, Not For Sale: Finding Center in the Land of Crazy Horse

quote: Like the weather or bonds between lovers,transformations can never be predicted.All energy transmutes one day or another,in one way or another. Either in its form or composition. Or in its position or disposition.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough, An Intimate Collision: Encounters with Life and Jesus

quote: Analyze and correct your past mistakes before they paralyze your future! An undiscovered error will always crave for repetition. Kick out errors
author: Yaganesh Derasari

quote: Books’ll be back,” Esther-in-Unalaq predicts. “Wait till the power grids start failing in the 2030s and the datavats get erased. It’s not far away. The future looks a lot like the past.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: And I wanted to believe that there could be an us. That some way, somehow there would be an us somewhere in the future that I could not see.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: I am convinced that the way forward for the human race is to recognize and protect the fundamental right of sovereignty over consciousness, to throw off the chains of our divisive religious heritage, to seek out forms of spirituality (or no spirituality at all if we so prefer) that are truly supportive of liberty and tolerance, to help the human spirit to grow rather than to wither, and to nurture our innate capacity for love and mutual respect. The old ways are broken and bankrupt and new ways are struggling to be born. Each one of us with our own talents, and by our own choices, has a part to play in that process.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: It’s one of the things I love about the sea, the way you can see weather afar. It’s like looking at the future.
author: to forget it is to try to navigate the future with no memory of the past.

quote: Three million years! The infinitely crowded panorama of written history, with its empires and its kings, its triumphs and its tragedies, covered barely one thousandth of this appalling span of time.
author: Alamvusha

quote: Everyone was always in such a rush to shoot forward that they never took the time to look back. Which was a mistake. If you wanted to avoid snags, kinks, knots, and cuts, you had to "keep your mind on your line," as the saying went.
author: William Ellery Channing

quote: God has a plan for the future and, because He is sovereign, it will come to pass. You can count on it!
author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quote: while she wanted to look neither to her past nor her future, she lived exclusively in both. They had took different paths, but they had journeyed, so she realized, together.
author: Daniel Woodrell, Tomato Red

quote: The future is forever a projection of the present.
author: Adrienne Wilder, Seven

quote: Now comes the reign of iron — and cased sloops are to take the place of wooden ships.
author: Megan Duke, Without Me

quote: He knew he would always remember her, standing there with that expectant, forward-looking smile, enough to turn the future into summer.
author: Milan Kundera, The Book of Laughter and Forgetting

quote: The future begins today.
author: Melody Carstairs

quote: I’m not mad. I already told you that. We all have mistakes in our past...and our future. It’s a fact of life.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau, Emile or On Education

quote: Within this confusion a few fundamentals remain constant:a. A strong belief is more important than a few facts.b. The stronger the belief, the fewer the facts.c. The fewer the facts, the more people killed.
author: Tite Kubo, Bleach―ブリーチ― 74 [Burīchi 74]

quote: Life flows as a whole, both inside and out, but you divide life with your mind, both inside and outside.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Maybe the real miracle in any miracle is our ability to believe that despite our own depravity, in the eyes of God we are worthy of a miracle.
author: Sam Harris, The Moral Landscape: How Science Can Determine Human Values

quote: I think believing in something is what matters most.Believe in nature or believe in love or believe that bydoing the right thing you can make some differenceto another human being or an entire generation.
author: Akiroq Brost

quote: False belief is more emotional than true belief
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, Pearls Of Eternity

quote: Our systems, perhaps, are nothing more than an unconscious apology for our faults, a gigantic scaffolding whose object is to hide from us our favorite sin
author: Andrena Sawyer

quote: Generate the belief in what you wish to achieve.
author: Steven Redhead, Life Is Simply A Game

quote: The gospel of salvation, the divine truth, set us free.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: You are one belief away from breakthrough. It’s a choice, so choose the next right thing, you can do it!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: The greatest patient is to wait for God to act.
author: Melanie Houtman

quote: The word of God is full of assurance.
author: Ramana Pemmaraju

quote: We are justified by faith.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: People sometimes cling to the strangest beliefs. On the one hand, they believe in an all loving God, but on the other hand they believe He will give you cancer to test or mature you.
author: Het Desai

quote: Idealism easily becomes dangerous because it brings with it, almost inevitably, the belief that the ends justify the means. If you are fighting for good or for God, what matters is the outcome, not the path. People have little respect for rules; we respect the moral principles that underlie most rules. But when a moral mission and legal rules are incompatible, we usually care more about the mission.
author: Dean Koontz, Innocence

quote: God will save us.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Love fuels the existence of a divine being
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Belief & Trust should be deep from mind & heart. Love is just emotional...without Belief & Trust, love is like an empty bottle. Only the outer layer will be present, the inside will be ALWAYS hollow..
Your purpose is God’s success. You can’t pay for what God want to be done. It’s God’s business; it’s his farmland, so when he said he’ll provide the rain, don’t doubt it!
author: Abraham Verghese

quote: Whenever you get such repulsive and destructive thoughts, always remember that there are more people in this world who love you unconditionally than the years of life you have lived.
author: Nicholas Nassim Taleb

quote: To believe something and not live is like making fun of your abilities. You cannot be really trusted if you can dream and doubt its possibility.
author: Brandon Sanderson, The Final Empire

quote: Culture makes lies plausible through exposure to time. It makes prejudice seem like physics intergenerationally. It is therefore the most dangerous opponent of philosophy, because it feels the most credible to the average person.
author: you have millions of alternatives. Fill yourself with the bullets of hope and you will kill failure with one shot.

quote: Our love is the reason romance was created.
author: Kenneth Newry

quote: Your limitations are largely programming instilled by others that you choose to believe.
author: Mamie Thornbrue

quote: We are but a speck in the Universe Oh, but what a lucky speck to be...
author: Thomas Clifford Allbutt

quote: The absence of theistic bel
author: Kei Miller, The Last Warner Woman

quote: Not only do I not know what I believe, but also I cannot know for sure that I believe. How can I define precisely what my attitude is toward something it cannot conceivably grasp? Can I be said to be in the relation of "belief," in any usual sense of that term, toward something that I cheerfully and readily acknowledge to be absolutely incomprehensible to me?(...) No man can be sure that he is in faith; and we can say of no man with certainty that he has or does not have faith. (...)Not only does faith always carry its opposite uncertainty within itself, but also this faith is never a static condition that is -had-, but a movement toward... And toward what? In the nature of the case we cannot state this "what." We cannot make a flat assertion about our faith like a simple assertion that we have blue eyes or are six feet tall. More than this, the affirmation of our faith can never be made in the simple indicative mood at all. The statement "I believe" can only be uttered as a prayer.
author: Richard Dawkins, The God Delusion

quote: If, as I have reason to believe, I have disintegrated the nucleus of the atom, this is of greater significance than th
author: Martyn Stanley, The Verkreath Horror

quote: When two men of science disagree, they do not invoke the secular arm; they wait for further evidence to decide the issue, because, as men of science, they know that neither is infallible. But when two theologians differ, since there is no criteria to which either can appeal, there is nothing for it but mutual hatred and an open or covert appeal to force.
author: Joseph Lewis, An Atheist Manifesto

quote: It is for the good of states that men should be deluded by religion.
author: Konrad Zuse

quote: I had given up the church, more because of its complicity with slavery than from a full understanding of the foolishness of its creeds.
author: J. Ross Clara, Citations: A Brief Anthology

quote: I do not go to church. I don’t go to Christian church or Jew church or any other church. I don’t go to church at all. Not ever. A perfect Sunday for me is spent drinking green tea while reading the Sunday New York Times. Yikes! Why don’t I just turn in my Al-Qaeda membership form and call it a day? As if that wasn’t bad enough, not only do I not go to church:I don’t believe in God. How can I say the Pledge of Allegiance if I don’t believe in God? How can I spend our American currency which pledges “In God We Trust?” How can I swear to tell the truth, the whole truth, so help me God? Answer: I can’t. It’s a real problem. Don’t get me wrong – I’d like to believe in God. I wish I did, especially if He was the kind of God that thought America was #1. But I don’t, which to many people is the same as not believing in America. Up until recently, I thought those people were lunatics.
author: Gordon Stein, The Encyclopedia of Unbelief, 2 Vols

quote: There is a kind of truth in everything, even fairytales. In fact, especially in fairytales... The King understood it as he looked out from the roof of the Temple and saw the clouds flying past and the green fields far beneath him. He knew that some things are real whether you believe in them or not...(The Thirteenth King)
author: Thomas Merton, No Man Is an Island

quote: The real reason for quest is always self-knowledge.
author: Robert Macfarlane, The Old Ways: A Journey on Foot

quote: In literature, the reader standing at the threshold of the end of a book harbors no illusion that the end has not come—he or she can see where it finishes, the abyss the other side of the last chunk of text. Which means that the writer is never in danger of ending too soon—or if he does the reader has been so forewarned. This is the advantage a book has over a film—it is the brain that marshals forward the text and controls the precise moment of conclusion of the book, as the density of the pages thins. A film can end without you if you’ve fallen asleep or, because you can’t wait any longer to use the bathroom, slipped out of the darkness of the theatre salon, and missed it. There will never be a form more perfect than the book, which always moves at your pace, that sits waiting for you exactly where you’ve left it and never goes on without you.
author: Daniil Kharms, Today I Wrote Nothing: The Selected Writings

quote: They sat a few meters apart, speaking very rarely, and there was really only the noise of turning pages (…) Where Hans Hubermann and Erik Vandenburg were ultimately united by music, Max and Liesel were held together by the quiet gathering of words."Hi, Max.""Hi, Liesel."They would sit and read.
author: Paul Murray, The Mark and the Void

quote: I call that creativity," Orville said. "The purpose of literature is to teach you how to THINK, not how to be practical. Learning to discover the connective tissue between seemingly unrelated events is the only way we are equipped to understand patterns in the real world.
author: Jorge Luis Borges, The Garden of Forking Paths

quote: Rather than pound or a national mind that he believed had been closed by his critics, John Quincy Adams decided to seek a place in the is the esteem of future generations.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: He will understand when it is too late that it is easier to love.
author: Glen Duncan, Talulla Rising

quote: Long ago we conquered our passions looking at ourselves in the mirror of eternity.
author: Italo Calvino, The Uses of Literature

quote: From one bell all the bells toll.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Shape

quote: Poirot, watching him, felt suddenly a doubt--an uncomfortable twinge. Was there, here, something that he had missed? Some richness of the spirit? Sadness crept over him. Yes, he should have become acquainted with the classics. Long ago. Now, alas, it was too late....
author: R.M. Engelhardt (TALON), The Last Cigarette: The Collected Poems Of R.M. Engelhardt 1989-2006

quote: I travel, always arriving in the same place.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Shape

quote: All dust is the same dust. Temporarily separated To go peacefully And enjoy the eternal nap.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Shape

quote: Mathematics doesn’t care about those beyond the numbers.
author: with you: it’s zero. Here lies the only difference.

quote: He awaits himself while walking, out of the icy circle to escape.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Shape

quote: In the end, the world returns to a grain.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, Circling: 1978-1987

quote: In the biggest and the smallest I sleep but at the same place I stay.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sign and Its Children

quote: Nothing is part of everything.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, Circling: 1978-1987

quote: From what you didn’t say, lies that you did say.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, Circling: 1978-1987

quote: There is nobody to wake up eternal seekers.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sign and Its Children

quote: You are hurrying to the sweet place, To the nonsense chasing your spirit And in the nonsense you look for answers.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, Circling: 1978-1987

quote: From everything, nothing looks to nothing.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sign and Its Children

quote: Without nothing, everything would be nothing.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sign and Its Children

quote: With your goal you make the one.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, Circling: 1978-1987

quote: To leave out beautiful sunsets is the secret of good taste.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: To say more while saying less is the secret of being simple.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: When I want to be reminded of stupidity, especially my own, I turn on the TV.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: In an endless silence even screams sound silent.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: We traveled long and forgot why poetry was invented.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: Nothing reminds us of an awakening more than rain.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: If you are only what you are, You at least have a chance Not to outsmart, But be on a par with yourself And that is worth trying.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: Why poetry, you ask? Because of life, I answer.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: To dream on occasion is not dreaming, To love on occasion is not love.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: When there is noise and crowds, there is trouble; When everything is silent and perfect, There is just perfection and nothing To fill the air.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: The Booker thing was a catalyst for me in a bizarre way. It’s perceived as an accolade to be published as a ‘literary’ writer, but, actually, it’s pompous and it’s fake. Literary fiction is often nothing more than a genre in itself. I’d always read omnivorously and often thought much literary fiction is read by young men and women in their 20s, as substitutes for experience.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: Too often, feelings arrive too soon, waiting for thoughts that often come too late.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: There is a moonlight note in the Moonlight Sonata
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: Even great men bow before the Sun
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: They will smile, as they always do when they plan a major attack late in the night.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: Our desire to say more grows bigger and what to say about it, except that saying is not always about saying, growing is not always about growing.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: There are countless circles of hell
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: They blossomed, they did not talk about blossoming.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: It is easy to see the glow but hard to recognize the awakening of silence.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: Beyond all vanities, fights, and desires, omnipotent silence lies.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: The light teaches you to convert life into a festive promenade.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: Disease often comes with a smiling face.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: Your head is a lit chamber.
author: be always wary of his secret.

quote: Whatever others may say, they say it to deceive and comfort themselves, not help you.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: The deeper thought is, the taller it becomes.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: Do not look too far for you will see nothing.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: We measure everything by ourselves with almost a necessary conceit.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: Teaching others, he corrected himself.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: How does one say something new and not retell?
author: that was his greatness.

quote: His Highness was always confident in his statements, especially about what he viewed for the first time.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: He did not profess to anybody how to reach others without professing.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: Except that love - that mysterious, vast, all-encompassing power - could not possibly be contained in a single word.
author: Pablo Tusset, The Best Thing That Can Happen to a Croissant

quote: For example. But I cannot give you an example. It was not so much any one example, any one event, which I recollected which was important, but the flow, the texture of the events, for meaning is never in the event but in the motion through event. Otherwise we could isolate an instant in the event and say that this is the event itself. The meaning. But we cannot do that. For it is the motion which is important. And I was moving. I was moving West at seventy-five miles an hour, through a blur of million-dollar landscape and heroic history, and I was moving back through time into my memory. They say the drowning man re-lives his life as he drowns. Well, I was not drowning in water, but I was drowning in West. I drowned westward through the hot brass days and black velvet nights.
