It took me seventy-eight hours to drown. For my body to sink down to the very bottom of West and lie in the motionless ooze of History, naked on a hotel bed in Long Beach, California.
author: Erich Maria Remarque, All Quiet on the Western Front

quote: Before the tears of the eyes dry outLet them sprinkle words on the paper Life is short and the man shall dieBut the words shall live on forever...
author: Eudora Welty, On Writing

quote: A versifier arranges words and rhymes into verses
author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber

quote: I have always been obsessed with naming things. If I could name them, I could tame them. They could be my friends.
author: ETC Wanyanwu

quote: Be mindful of your thoughts and words for they are the pen writing that which will manifest.
author: Nicola Yoon, The Sun Is Also a Star

quote: When words lose their meaning and expression, silence is the only language that heart follows, speaks and celebrates.
author: Idra Novey, Ways to Disappear

quote: Why must we be so restricted by language, these ruined tongues! These twenty-six letters- how can that explain this agony? How could we ever endeavor to prove what we are here for- through such combinations? Death is just a word someone invented for what happens at the end of a person’s life. It’s only a word: if there was no word for it we wouldn’t be so worried!
author: Girdhar Joshi, Some Mistakes Have No Pardon

quote: Be careful how you use your words, how you build them and how people will understand them!?
author: Louis Nizer

quote: An individual who delights at all in the beauty of language does well to avoid becoming an attorney or a legislator.
author: Karen Armstrong

quote: Is love always like this? Is it always so passionate, yet so damn painful?
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: You are judge by your words
author: George Ivanovic

quote: Writers are people whose words speak louder than their actions.
author: Saiber, Stardust and Sheets

quote: The answer is no," said Melody firmly. “Undeniably, indisputably, categorically no.
author: Jasmine Sandozz

quote: Begin to write, your heart will flow with sacred words.
author: Toni Morrison, Jazz

quote: Should’ is my all time least favoriteword! It’s this sort of guilt inducing, finger wagging word that we use to beat up ourselves andothers.
author: Frank Beddor

quote: The two words expressed volumes.
author: Denis Guedj

quote: Quotes tell a story. A stringing together of a few words can leave you with an idea that changes the course of your life, and can direct you toward reaching your highest potential as a human. The story they tell is derived from the experience which inspired them, and it is our sharing that experience that allows for the quote to resonate so deeply within our being.
author: Mary-Ellen Peters

quote: Your efforts extend like ripples on the ocean, much further than you know.
author: Jonathan Safran Foer, Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close

quote: The real trouble is this: giving expression to thought by the observable medium of words is like the work of the silkworm. In being made into silk, the material achieves its value. But in the light of day it stiffens; it becomes something alien, no longer malleable. True, we can then more easily and freely recall the same thought, but perhaps we can never experience it again in its original freshness.
author: Nathan Filer, The Shock of the Fall

quote: I learned to swallow words back, hold secrets on my tongue until they dissolved like soap bubbles.
author: Thiruvalluvar, Thirukkural

quote: When you don’t cover up the world with words and labels, a sense of the miraculous returns to your life that was lost a long time ago when humanity, instead of using thought, became possessed by thought. A depth returns to your life. Things regain their newness, their freshness. And the greatest miracle is the experiencing of your essential self as prior to any words, thoughts, mental labels and images.
author: Callum McLaughlin, Seeking Solace

quote: Words alone can effect great good as well as evil. A few apt words have swept candidates into office, ended as well as started wars, paved the way for peace and carried with them both hope as well as despair. Words alone have ruined lives, but have also brought forth healing. It is well known the harm words can cause, but the good they can bring is equally impressive.
author: Amy Harmon, Infinity + One

quote: Words can express true feelings, true emotions and wisdom. It is up to you to use them wisely... Choose your words carefully and express the peacefully!
author: Dianna Hardy, The Spell of Summer

quote: I walk alone, absorbed in my fantastic play, — Fencing with rhymes, which, parrying nimbly, back away; Tripping on words, as on rough paving in the street, Or bumping into verses I long had dreamed to meet.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: The point I am trying to make is that words are a mysterious, ambiguous, ambivalent, and perfidious phenomenon. They can be rays of light in a realm of darkness. . . . They can equally be lethal arrows. Worst of all, at times they can be one or the other. They can even be both at once!
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: If we rub a fabric too often, it will quickly grow threadbare; and Nobu’s words had rasped against me so much, I could no longer maintain that finely lacquered surface Mameha had always counseled me to hide behind.
author: Andrew Heller

quote: Choose your words carefully. They reveal your inner character.
author: Thomas Hardy, Two on a Tower

quote: Avoid the use of abusive words when communication is in session
author: Stephen Fry

quote: Freedom of speech means setting words free. Imprisoned and freed words are consequential. All words have consequences.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: I dread the beginning of her new life more than words can tell, but I see some hope for her if she travels - none if she remains at home.
author: Mark Dunn, Under the Harrow

quote: Wisdom is not counted in grammers, niether in fluency, but vividly shown in mannerism.
author: E.L. Konigsburg, Throwing Shadows

quote: Every individual is an author in himself. It is only that he falls short of words to express
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: The pressure disappeared with the first word he put on paper. He thought--while his hand moved rapidly--what a power there was in words; later, for those who heard them, but first for the one who found them; a healing power, a solution, like the breaking of a barrier. He thought, perhaps the basic secret the scientists have not discovered, the first fount of life, is that which happens when a thought takes shape in words.
author: Jeanette Winterson, Sexing the Cherry

quote: I don’t know what message to send to Bran. Help him Tyrion.”“What help could I give him? I am no maester, to ease his pain. I have no spell to give him back his legs.”“You gave me help when I needed it” Jon Snow said.“I gave you nothing,” Tyrion said. “Words.”“Then give your words to Bran too.
author: Anne Tyler, The Amateur Marriage

quote: But he had turned, little by little, a disturbance into words, he had made a pillow of old words, for his head.
author: Paul Bourget

quote: And after that, and also for each word, there should be sentences that show the twists and turns of meanings—the way almost every word slips in its silvery, fishlike way, weaving this way and that, adding subtleties of nuance to itself, and then perhaps shedding them as public mood dictates.
author: Donald Harington, Ekaterina

quote: When fear and cold make a statue of you in your bed, don’t expect hard-boned and fleshless truth to come running to your aid. What you need are the plump comforts of a story. The soothing, rocking safety of a lie.
author: George MacDonald, A Dish of Orts

quote: Words will only ruin you, if you allow them.
author: Rob Riemen, Nobility of Spirit: A Forgotten Ideal

quote: My heart is sinking and my chest physically aches from the heavy sadness that it carries within.
author: Amy E. Butcher, Visiting Hours: A Memoir of Friendship and Murder

quote: If that made him heavy company sometimes, so be it. Who decreed that life was to be one long rowdy masquerade (punctuated with those little pets of melancholy indulged by a crowd who made a religion of their feelings)?
author: Elizabeth Langston, I Wish

quote: The trick to loneliness is to spend a lot of time inside one’s head.
author: Betsy Cornwell, Mechanica

quote: She’s a gray woman with gray sayings.” “A crape-hanger.
author: Yahia Kareem

quote: What was wrong with me? Why could I not just flip the switch and see all the brightness ahead if only I chose the correct path? Or rather, why could I see the correct path but not choose to tread upon it?
author: Northern Adams, Mickey and the Gargoyle

quote: For most of us the prayer in Gethsemane is the only model. Removing mountains can wait.
author: E.M. Bounds, Power Through Prayer

quote: Your prayers for others and the universe make a difference!
author: Douglas Abrams, The Book of Joy: Lasting Happiness in a Changing World

quote: May the Lord grant you a tender kind heart.
author: Brent Eshleman

quote: Every perfect gift comes from the great God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: She became at once more intimate and more exalted.
author: Steven Curtis Chapman

quote: O Lord grant us the grace for sacred rest
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: My chains are broken in Jesus Name. Amen.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: If you are not praying the type of prayers that scare you, your prayers are certainly not frightening our enemy.
author: Kate McGahan, JACK McAFGHAN: Reflections on Life with my Master

quote: The second level of prayer is seeking.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: You have no excuse to give... Jonah prayed fervently even in the belly of the shark! Environment is not a barrier!
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: May the Heavens be open to your prayers.
author: Brian Spellman

quote: Music is the sweetest language for hearts, kindest prayer for souls, peaceful breeze for minds, and a magical sail for imaginations.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: He who makes his needs known to God gains for immediate answer "the peace of God which passeth understanding," and can wait God’s time for the rest.
author: R.C. Sproul, Does Prayer Change Things?

quote: One of the gifts we receive from Jesus is an entirely new foundation upon which to build our lives. Once you receive Him, He becomes your new foundation and every day you walk with Him, you build on it.
author: Katie Kiesler, Because I Love You

quote: God loves a prayer of action.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Pray, and let God worry.
author: Jonathan Edwards

quote: We give to God of our strength, not our weakness. But we also say: “Da lifneh mi ata omed”—Know before whom you stand. We know what we are in the face of that. We see the full picture—God and ourselves. We cannot see ourselves as more than we are because we see how much greater is the reality. But we must not lessen our value in our own eyes either, because we are a necessary part of this reality. It is no small thing that we are able to “stand” and to address that reality.It would be good if we could approach life the way we approach prayer, knowing before whom we stand.
author: Munindra Misra, Chants of Hindu Gods and Godesses in English Rhyme

quote: I just remembered a time when to warm up my spirit I prayed: movement is spirit. Prayer was a means of mutely and hidden from others reaching myself. When I prayed I achieved an emptiness of soul - and that emptiness is all I can ever have. Besides that, nothing. But the emptiness has the value and appearance of plenty. One way of getting is not looking, one way of having is not asking and only believing that the silence I believe to be inside me is the answer to my - to my mystery.
author: Peggy Noonan, A Heart, a Cross, and a Flag: America Today

quote: Lincoln had entirely outgrown juvenile delight in religious argument. Talking with God seemed to the mature Lincoln more important than talking about Him.
author: Mark Batterson, The Circle Maker: Praying Circles Around Your Biggest Dreams and Greatest Fears

quote: Whether we write lyrics or craft legislation, sell homes or teach classes, design spaces or open franchises, prayer is a critical part of the creative process. Don’t just brainstorm; praystorm.
author: Richard J. Foster, Celebration of Discipline: The Path to Spiritual Growth

quote: Author challenges parents to bridge the gap with maturing, more independent kids with what he calls "Knock and Pray". He says parents should invite their kids to unscheduled times to "pray... big".
author: David Paul Kirkpatrick, Breakfast in the temple

quote: Man in his usual perversity turns the footstool into a throne from whence he would feign direct the Almighty as to what He ought to do, giving the onlooker the impression that if God had half the compassion that those who pray (?) have, all would quickly be right
author: Ahmed Ibn Fadlan

quote: Sometimes all you need in your life is anything strange because strange things can revive your soul just like a cold water freshening your pale face with every splash!
author: Planes, Trains & Automobiles

quote: In a company of children and grown-ups, the latter are those who should demonstrate good manners and always let the children speak first.
author: Ana Claudia Antunes, A-Z of Happiness: Tips for Living and Breaking Through the Chain that Separates You from Getting That Dream Job

quote: You will never really think hard about your life until your oxygen mask is taken away from you when you are at the bed of the ocean. At that exact moment, your true self will be revealed. You will really know if you are a believer or an atheist, whether you really love life or hate it as you usually say. All your claims will be tested
author: Ariel Lawhon, Flight of Dreams

quote: Then nothing became something, and I was born, and I wrought great havoc in the world in the time allotted to me, and I returned to nothingness
author: Anne Lamott, Bird by Bird: Some Instructions on Writing and Life

quote: A good human being can still be molded from bad clay
author: Amit Ray, Enlightenment Step by Step

quote: We live like sheep in line waiting to be slaughtered in a slaughterhouse. We eat and laugh and fight as we see those in front of us fall to the knife
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, Pearls Of Eternity

quote: One the advantages about this life is that you can hate someone without knowing him
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, Pearls Of Eternity

quote: There are a lot of human experiences that challenge the limits of our language.
author: Ava Dellaira, Love Letters to the Dead

quote: The moment when your heart’s rhythm synchronises with the chants of the holy temple, you find God in your soul. It was noisy yet peaceful. They were all dancing in the packed hall, with eyes closed and hands swinging up in the air. It was as if the motto of life was nothing but to enjoy this very moment and taste the love of the almighty.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: No house is big enough for the rule of two women.
author: Amit Ray, Walking the Path of Compassion

quote: The man died inside cannot live outside. ‪
author: Nirab karki

quote: Only those with tenacity can march forward in March
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Giving someone gifts cannot equate to spending quality time with them. Never replace time with things. Time is precious and once lost cannot be regained. Make every moment count...you never know when your time will be up.
author: Rupali Rajopadhye Rotti

quote: If you wish to break with tradition, learn your craft well, and embrace adversity
author: the outcome is a life of imprisonment ultimately leading to deep-rooted feelings of resentment.

quote: The people in our life is like the mountain and the river. Some people will stay as others will leave. Some will travel away and make their way back to you.
author: Ibrahim Khidair Ali

quote: The Time (T) and Energy (E) we invest in others, people will take it and carry it with them.
author: Ken Poirot, Mentor Me: GA=T+E—A Formula to Fulfill Your Greatest Achievement

quote: True enough. I say this all the time.Trez looked at his hands. “I didn’t ask for this.”“No one asks for life.” The executioner hiked iAm’s body up higher. “And sometimes they do not ask for death...
author: Stacey  Donovan, Dive

quote: There are two important days in your life. The day you discovered you were alive and the day you forgot about it
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: The hardest thing in life is a man to be honest with himself
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: If you still have fear, you love life
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: Life is a war. Guerrilla warfare, the strategy
author: Godwin Elendu Ph.D

quote: Life is existence with meaning
author: Godwin Elendu Ph.D

quote: Sometimes the rope seems the only option when at the bottom of the pit. Climb it to safety.
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: Every life is a unique random business
author: Mary Balogh

quote: Often in life the pleasure of the journey is only eclipsed by the ecstasy of the destination.
author: Jackie Haze, Borderless

quote: You have to really believe that you can move mountains.
author: Godwin Elendu Ph.D

quote: The older we get, the more we become ourselves.
author: Kiana Davenport, Shark Dialogues

quote: (I) want to do everything and see everything, sense everything and feel everything and taste everything; to know that life is an enormous experience and must be used. To be in the world, and of the world, and never to stand aside and watch.
author: chinna reddy

quote: I have patient to wait for what I desire.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Forget about being impressive and commit to being real. Because being real is impressive!
author: Ken Poirot

quote: The kindness that we receive from others in life, is also the kindness that we will want to give. The harshness that we receive from others in life, will also be the harshness that we will give. But true strength lies in seeing the harshness that we have received in life; and living in such a way so that that others will never feel the same from us.
author: The Truth

quote: You can find three species at any defind area.... Stray animals, pet animals and SOCIAL animals... I wonder where HUMANS are..!!!
author: The Truth

quote: In embracing your difficulties is liberation.
author: Dennis Lehane, Live by Night

quote: If you dream big, you achieve big.If you dream small, you achieve small. Dreams make the difference.
author: Karen  Gibbs, A Gallery of Scrapbook Creations

quote: If you fall still stand your ground and strive for that new start.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Do your thing, without harming anything.
author: Jerhia

quote: Whenever she walked along the streets of Manhattan, she looked at all the different faces coming toward her and, despite their different features and colors, she regarded them all as Americans.
author: Diyar Harraz, One Minute to Midnight

quote: Life,’ thought Septimus, ... ‘you could never trust the bastard. What it gives with one hand, it takes away with the other.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Learn to handle books, you will learn how to enjoy life.
author: Billy Collins, The Apple that Astonished Paris

quote: Time is life.Time for birth, time for death.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The Bible is instruction for life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Life will be very boring without any challenges to overcome.
author: Robert Brault, Round Up the Usual Subjects: Thoughts on Just about Everything

quote: Smile and the world smiles with you, cry and you cry alone.
author: Amit Ray, Nonviolence: The Transforming Power

quote: All I wanted was my art and the chance to be the creator of my own world, my own reality.
author: A.B. Shepherd, Lifeboat

quote: And the uniqueness of every momentseeks the path from pain to a pearl.
author: Yann Martel, Life of Pi

quote: Lines are very difficult to learn.
author: Larry McMurtry, Lonesome Dove

quote: Don’t be too quick to leave the tree you are highly convinced of its future sweet fruits and comforting shade just because you see its present fruitlessness. Just sit under it and endure the scorching sun, one day, its branches will give you comfort and its fruits will give you smiles and nourish your body!
author: for through books we are instructed and inducted into the path of repentance

quote: Consciousness and free will are necessary in order for human beings to live meaningful lives by supplying agency to our intentions. The innate capacity for consciousness and directed free will plays a linchpin role in making human curiosity a viable concept. We would lack an ability to learn without an inquisitive mind and the ability to act. A premeditated act of human free will enables us to apply what we learn and make calculated adjustments when our plans need alteration. Human beings’ cognitive processes and a liberal range of free will allows us to study the past for learning rubrics to employ in the present and cogitate upon a future course of action.
author: Dedy Budiman, Sales Insight

quote: Realizing and truly accepting that we are constantly evolving, that everything and everyone around us is also constantly evolving helps us to understand things. We have no way of predicting the future. What is right/wrong for us now, may not be right/wrong for us tomorrow because we and everything is constantly changing. We are free to make decisions with the knowledge that there is no exact correctness by which we can make a decision. It’s ok if the decision doesn’t work out, in fact, that will happen. It’s also ok to change our mind. There is no shame in changing our mind. What was right for us yesterday may just not work for us anymore
author: Akiroq Brost

quote: You are likely to keep repeating the same mistake all over again if you do not agree it’s a mistake.
author: Vironika Tugaleva

quote: I listen to the silenceand yearn to be more me,swimming in the sea of myself,learning eternally -finding out where the rocks areand smoothing them into sand.
author: George Leonard, Mastery: The Keys to Success and Long-Term Fulfillment

quote: In Indian Country,” he says, “we have a different sense of time. I’m learning and you’re learning—and more will.
author: Thomas Bradwardine

quote: Everyone thinks that teachers are automatically above the taught The teachers are the taught.
author: Matthew Donnelly

quote: It is the unknown that we thirst for. Curiosity that drives us... to learn. Not to hear, or to be told. But to see and feel, to experience.
author: Barbara Sher, Refuse to Choose!: Use All of Your Interests, Passions, and Hobbies to Create the Life and Career of Your Dreams

quote: Don’t listen to advice. Give yourself the freedom to make your own errors, it’s the only way you’ll learn.
author: Nicholas Boothman, How to Make People Like You in 90 Seconds or Less

quote: No one ever pays to learn the most important things.
author: Katerina Stoykova Klemer, The Porcupine of Mind

quote: While there may be various tips, pointers, ingredients, and strategies to success, there is no one formula that always guarantees it other than to keep learning from failure itself.
author: Edith Hamilton

quote: Much is known by reading, more is mastered by doing.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: If you Fail, Never Give Up because, F.A.I.L means First Attempt In Learning.
author: Curt Gabrielson, Tinkering: Kids Learn by Making Stuff

quote: Saying of the ProphetInk and BloodThe ink of the learned is holier than the blood of the martyr.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: each year India produces thousands upon thousands of eighteen-year olds who have little to no instructed idea of the last sixty years of Indian history. They have no idea if or how those five-year plans worked. They have no idea if or how the Non-Aligned Movement worked. They have no idea about the numerous wars India has fought against Pakistan or China. They have no idea, for instance, of what many people call the greatest threat to India’s internal security: the Naxal movement. What created this Naxal movement? And why is the movement popular where it is? Our youth doesn’t know.
author: Sidin Vadukut, The Sceptical Patriot: Exploring the Truths Behind the Zero and Other Indian Glories

quote: In mastering one thing, you have mastered all things because you have learned how to learn.
author: Jennifer Elisabeth

quote: Life can be tough at times, but each time you fall, is another lesson to learn from.
author: Seth Godin

quote: You have to make your own condensed notes. You learn from MAKING them. A lot of thinking goes into deciding what to include and exclude. You develop your own system of abbreviations and memory methods for the information.
author: Mark Strand, Blizzard of One

quote: I learn by doing....the same thing over and over and over again countless times.
author: Gwendoline Riley

quote: You learn from mistakes so the best leaders are constantly making new mistakes on their success journey.
author: Anonymous

quote: There is a great fulfillment when you commit your life to lifelong learning.
author: John Grogan, Bad Dogs Have More Fun: Selected Writings on Family, Animals, and Life from The Philadelphia Inquirer

quote: Beating yourself up over every perceived mistake is the work of an internal abuser who must be restrained and reformed.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Learn to understand your energy and how you create with your energy.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Speak kindly to and of yourself.
author: Michele E. Gwynn, Exposed:  The Education of Sarah Brown

quote: If Life worked on auto mode then manual mode for photography would have never existed.
author: they get that way by respecting them.

quote: Every dimension of your suffering will instruct you, until you have learned your essential lessons.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: Nothing worth knowing can ever be taught in a classroom.
author: Anonymous

quote: The person that you feel yourself to be, according to the Sufis, is a false person, which has no true reality.
author: there must be a time to feed on it.

quote: Good intentions but bad results
author: Beth Ramsay, #Networking is people looking for people looking for people

quote: Remember that lettuce doesn’t grow on a spruce
author: Dee Williams

quote: A wise system of education will at least teach us how little man yet knows, how much he has still to learn.
author: Idries Shah, Learning How to Learn: Psychology and Spirituality in the Sufi Way

quote: Do not try to be humble: learn humility.
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: The art of teaching lies in communicating the mystery of the universe without taking the mystery out of it.
author: Dane R. Pascoe, The Zen of Teaching

quote: The man who knows must discharge a function. The one who does not, cannot arrogate one to himself; he can only try to do so.
author: Brandon Sanderson, The Way of Kings

quote: To honor and celebrate; or to balance and rectify, drawing what you want or need into your life. A third mode is less personal, involving a desire to know more deeply, involving a desire to know more deeply, to grow in knowledge and understanding of the cards--breathing in the wisdom of the tarot for its own sake and to learn more about life and the human condition.
author: John Gardner

quote: I wish that the last breath of your life is a sigh of relief.
author: Navonne Johns

quote: To try and fail is at least to learn
author: Aniruddha Sastikar

quote: We lose our ability to live fully if we neglect or ignore our responsibility to the other people who share this planet with us. We simply cannot reach our full potential without the insights and observations that other people--our teachers--have to give us. We cannot feel whole until we are helping other people to reach for their potential and to grow as strong as they can grow. We do need down time, and we do need time to ourselves, but we very much need to acknowledge our ties to our fellow human beings and act as if those people meant more to us than our jobs or pets or cars do. They are much more important than anything material that we ever can get our hands on or strive for.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: We need people who push boundaries rather than retreat inside them.
author: Odysseus Elytis

quote: If you are not learning, you are not living.
author: Lori Nawyn

quote: A good teacher does something more than teaching
author: Raheel Farooq

quote: The bridge between the words glamour and grammar is magic. According to the OED, glamour evolved through an ancient association between learning and enchantment.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: You go to a great school not so much for knowledge as for arts and habits; for the habit of attention, for the art of expression, for the art of assuming, at a moment’s notice, a new intellectual position, for the art of entering quickly into another person’s thoughts, for the habit of submitting to censure and refutation, for the art of indicating assent or dissent in graduated terms… And above all, you go to a great school for self-knowledge.
author: John Kendrick Bangs, The Autobiography of Methuselah

quote: Anybody or anything may stand between you and knowledge if you are unfit for it.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle, A Study in Scarlet

quote: By bringing together people who share interests, no matter their location or time zone, social media has the potential to transform the workplace into an environment where learning is as natural as it is powerful.
author: Lorii Myers, No Excuses, The Fit Mind-Fit Body Strategy Book

quote: Education is that process by which thought is opened out of the soul, and, associated with outward . . . things, is reflected back upon itself, and thus made conscious of its reality and shape. It is Self-Realization. As a means, therefore, of educating the soul out of itself, and mirroring forth its ideas, the external world offers the materials. This is the dim glass in which the senses are first called to display the soul, until, aided by the keener state of imagination . . . it separates those outward types of itself from their sensual connection, in its own bright mirror recognizes again itself, as a distinctive object in space and time, but out of it in existence, and painting itself upon these, as emblems of its inner and super-sensual life which no outward thing can fully portray. . . . A language is to be instituted between [the child’s] spirit and the surrounding scene of things in which he dwells. . . . He who is seeking to know himself, should be ever seeking himself in external things, and by so doing will he be best able to find, and explore his inmost light.
author: Claude Moore Fuess

quote: Grant was something rare in that or any war. He could learn from experience.
author: Randy Alcorn, Money, Possessions and Eternity

quote: I should learn to run, to wrestle, to swim, to ride horses, to row, to drive a car, to fire a rifle. I should fill my soul with flesh. I should fill my flesh with soul. In fact, I should reconcile at last within me the two internal antagonists.
author: Tom Hanks

quote: Do not give hope where there is none.Do not turn away hope where there is seldom some.
author: Jonathan Culver

quote: Love forever, love is free
author: Rosen Topuzov

quote: When we relate to ourselves with loving kindness, perfectionism naturally drops away.
author: Sharon Salzberg, Real Love: The Art of Mindful Connection

quote: Keep Calm and Find Your Zen-ity
author: Anthony Trollope, The Belton Estate

quote: Holy intimacy is fostered with the marriage to two commitments: one to sitting in quiet solitude with the inner Self
author: Mariah McKenzie, More: Journey to Mystical Union Through the Sacred and the Profane

quote: Non-doing simply means letting things be and allowing them to unfold in their own way.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Neurons of Jesus: Mind of A Teacher, Spouse & Thinker

quote: Enlightenment comes when you understand the language of heart - the language of tree, birds and the nature.
author: Amit Ray, Peace Bliss Beauty and Truth: Living with Positivity

quote: He is fifteen and ten and five. He is an instant. He is flying back to her. He is hers again. She feels the weight of him in her chest as he comes into her arms. He is her son, her beloved child, and she takes him back.
author: Pawan Mishra

quote: Meditation provides the tools not only to abide more comfortably in the present, but also to observe rather than engage with unhappiness-creating thoughts.
author: David Michie, Mindfulness Is Better Than Chocolate: A Practical Guide to Enhanced Focus and Lasting Happiness in a World of Distractions

quote: If you dance, you’ll feel more joyful. Just thinking isn’t going to make you feel better. Think about how joyful you’ll feel as you dance. Don’t repeat the foolishness of putting off dancing as you debate whether dance will really bring you joy. We feel joy as soon as we dance. Everything is like that.
author: Pico Iyer, The Art of Stillness: Adventures in Going Nowhere

quote: Energy is the language spoken by your body. You probably already know that your brain sends bioelectric signals to your organs and muscles through the nerve pathways in your body. But did you ever consider how your brain talks to your cells?
author: Ilchi Lee

quote: If our minds are like a garden, then emotions are like the different flowers that bloom and wither in it all year round, according to the season. Emotions sometimes bring dynamism and significant change to our lives, but we must never be led around by them.
author: Ilchi Lee, Calligraphic Meditation for Everyday Happiness

quote: Meditation is defined by not just the mode of thinking, but also the object of thought
author: Ransom Riggs, Miss Peregrine’s Home for Peculiar Children

quote: Ironically, we may discover that death meditation is not a morbid exercise at all. Only when we lose the use of something taken for granted (whether the telephone or an eye) are we jolted into a recognition of its value. When the phone is fixed, the bandage removed from the eye, we briefly rejoice in their restoration but swiftly forget them again. In taking them for granted, we cease to be conscious of them. In taking life for granted, we likewise fail to notice it. (To the extent that we get bored and long for something exciting to happen.) By meditat- ing on death, we paradoxically become conscious of life.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: Many people experience a sense of rage and very strong anger toward their parents and others who hurt them. Ultimately that is also a thought. It doesn’t really exist in this very pure and present moment. It doesn’t really exist. So actually what we are really carrying is nothing but a bunch of thoughts. When we let go of those thoughts then nothing else is required. We are free......Whenever you suffer, whenever you struggle, don’t go outside trying to find out what is wrong with your life. Don’t treat your life like you treat your car. When something is wrong with the car we get out, open the hood, see what’s wrong with the engine, and fix it. But life is not like a car. Life is consciousness. Life is not something outside of us. Therefore whenever we feel that we are suffering, tormented, or challenged we should always look into our consciousness. Immediately we discover that we are having a very evil affair with an evil thought. That’s all there is. Just that thought.Such thoughts always come with a specific idea and with some kind of voice: “I am good. I am bad. I am poor. I don’t have this or that. I am not enlightened.” It is always associate with a concept and a belief system. Until we are awakened to the ultimate truth we are completely ruled by our thoughts. Thoughts are always dictating reality to us. So in that sense thought is the ultimate empire of propaganda. Thought is always coloring and defining reality.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: The mind will always take on an order conforming to that upon which it concentrates.
author: Vironika Tugaleva

quote: May you comfort and healing.
author: Donald L. Hicks, Look into the stillness

quote: Universe responds to the person who meditates daily.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: You are the space in which these thoughts arise, but not the thoughts themselves.
author: Shrii Shrii Anandamurti

quote: When you are truly awakened, you have completely stopped trying to become awakened. You simply are. You know that you did not locate awakening; awakening located you.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh, The Miracle of Mindfulness: An Introduction to the Practice of Meditation

quote: Being enlightened ironically means realizing that there is no separate entity that can be enlightened or unenlightened.
author: the real meaning of surrender does not involve anything external. It means to surrender to your true nature.

quote: You aren’t actually a someone, a person, who is conscious. You are the awake space of awareness itself, within which all the “thought up” entities in your world appear. Out of all these imagined entities, you have simply made the mistake of thinking that one of them is you.
author: Enza Vita

quote: Awareness is that which is reading these words right now, whatever “that” is. You know without a doubt that there is something reading these words right now and awareness is precisely what that is.
author: Enza Vita

quote: The One that experiences itself as your body-mind is the same One that experiences itself in every other body-mind, form, or appearance that exists.
author: Enza Vita

quote: Nothing can be the total truth in the worlds of manifestation and the more solid your concepts, the more likely they are going to sink you, sooner or later.
author: Enza Vita

quote: Even amazing states of bliss, peace, clarity and spaciousness have nothing to do with awakening as these are just experiences coming and going in the impersonal awareness that you are.
author: Enza Vita

quote: Only in stillness does the imperceivable become discernible
author: Pema Chödrön, The Pocket Pema Chodron

quote: Meditation leads you to your spiritual information, and takes you on a journey of getting to know yourself and your creations.
author: Mary Ellen Flora, Chakras: Key to Spiritual Opening

quote: Often when we hear people speak about meditation, we hear about wisdom, we hear about knowledge. But what, actually, is the effect, what’s the use, of wisdom or knowledge? Understanding. When you understand mind, you’re not at its mercy. When you don’t understand, you’re lost in the midst of it.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh, The Heart of Understanding: Commentaries on the Prajnaparamita Heart Sutra

quote: Meditate, Ānanda, do not delay, or else you will regret it later. This is our instruction to you.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Think, how hard it is to change yourself. How can it be easy to change others?
author: Radhe Maa

quote: Spiritual Practice involves being constantly aware
author: Radhe Maa

quote: Everything is possible through complete devotion to the Lord.
author: Radhe Maa

quote: Love does not expect anything in return
author: Radhe Maa

quote: Fools only crib about what they do not have. They do not count their blessings.
author: Radhe Maa

quote: Give and take is business not bhakti
author: Nicola Salter

quote: Do not expect too much from the world. We are here to give not to take.
author: Radhe Maa

quote: Never be proud but show humility towards others, true wisdom lies in being humble.
author: Radhe Maa

quote: Continue to breathe, peaceful and easy. Light in, light out, love in, loveout. Rest in your feelings of well-being.
author: Radhe Maa

quote: Water and grace flow to persons and places that are lower.
author: Radhe Maa

quote: Pray with a pure heart and pray from where you are. He will answer your prayers. There is no need to abandon the world or retreat to a jungle
author: Radhe Maa

quote: The least among the sadhus, saints and monks and other people of God is worthier than you. Never speak ill of them
author: Radhe Maa

quote: Be contented with the things of the world. Develop greed for God.
author: Radhe Maa

quote: The key to meditation is to exist one hundred percent in the here and now.
author: Ilchi Lee, Brain Wave Vibration: Getting Back Into the Rhythm of a Happy, Healthy Life

quote: What a miracle, that all we have to do to be beautifully loving creatures is just relax and allow.
author: Yogi Kanna, Return to Love: A Guide to Inner Peace, Emotional Healing and Spiritual Transformation

quote: Meditation is an excellent habit and tool for transformation, however your ‘practice’ should eventually evolve into your natural primary state of being.
author: Kyle Idleman, Not a Fan: Becoming a Completely Committed Follower of Jesus

quote: I was manipulating my inner experience rather than being with what was actually happening.
author: Drew Myron, Thin Skin

quote: In order to do anything about the suffering of the world we must have the strength to face it without turning away.
author: Sharon Salzberg, A Heart as Wide as the World: Stories on the Path of Lovingkindness

quote: Through meditation we come to know that we are dying & being reborn in every moment.
author: Michelle Cruz-Rosado

quote: It is the mind’s job to protect and take care of you, to solve your problems and make sure you’re safe. So, if you feel a surge of emotional upset, it moves into action, trying to help, looking for the source of the upset—for the problems—and generating solutions.Under these conditions, the key to getting the mind to go on standby—to stilling the mind’s compulsive thinking—lies in recognizing, accepting, and working with the emotional upset. Once you address the emotional undercurrent, once it is no longer churning inside you, the mind can switch off and quite literally leave you in peace.
author: Barry López, About This Life

quote: Sweep the broomOver sand and stone.Softly, gently,Brush away the dust.Listen to the leavesAs they sing in the tree.Peace fills the soulWhen living well.
author: Barry López, About This Life

quote: Meditation is the glue that holds our mind, body, and spirit together
author: Anatoliy Obraztsov, A Crossing or the Drop`s History

quote: I do not belong to any spiritual group or tradition. I am just interested in exploring what it means to live with open eyes. People in spiritual organizations also tend to get caught in ideas of how it should be, and in the need of the ego to create hierachies of power, status, roles, ambition and obidience.Spiritual Masters teach on many different levels at the same time. Some people take what they can, and some take something deeper.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten, Presence - Working from Within. The Psychology of Being

quote: If you have time to be mindful, you have time to meditate.
author: Tara Brach, True Refuge: Finding Peace and Freedom in Your Own Awakened Heart

quote: Even though the darkness may come,Our love will always shine bright,Not only us,But also to show others the way.
author: TRIPURARI

quote: If I could simply place the various parts of myself into the night sky to occasionally glance up and behold myself—maybe in the end I am only hoping to vicariously soak up some starlight.
author: Akshay Vasu

quote: It was tall, made of pale blue light, a creature with long arms and long legs and the shadow of a smile, and above it all, eyes that shone bluer still than its body. "What do you seek in this place?" the shade asked plainly.
author: LaShawnda Jones

quote: I speak of the Creator. He has walked with me often in my journeys, and it has been by learning to walk with Him that I have learned to walk forward.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Sending love to a situation is really simple and works wonders. All you have to do is think of the situation and imagine it surrounded by a light that reminds you of love.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I live in the realm of love and light.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The light extinguishes all the flaming arrows of darkness.
author: Helen Humphreys, Leaving Earth

quote: May the light shines on the people siting in darkness.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: We ought to walk in the bright light.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Light is light.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Shine bright like a diamond.
author: the paths of the light must be protected as well so that either we may reach the light or the light may reach us!

quote: Ever since her diagnosis, she’s been fading like a light bulb with cancer’s hand on the rotary dimmer.
author: Gary   Hopkins

quote: Love light.
author: T.S. Eliot, Collected Poems, 1909-1962

quote: The light can only shine in the darkness.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: I love you like the plant that does not bloomand carries in itself, hidden, the light of those flowers,
author: Alan W. Watts

quote: We walk in the path of light.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Darren wasn’t darkness, and I wasn’t his light.
author: Joyce Wycoff

quote: Holy God, Holy light.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Let the light of your being lit every dark situation.
author: Munia Khan

quote: Light is the shadow of god
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: You are not the oil, you are not the air—merely the point of combustion, the flash-point where the light is born. You are merely the lens in the beam. You can only receive, give, and possess the light as the lens does. If you seek yourself, you rob the lens of its transparency. You will know life and be acknowledged by it according to your degree of transparency—your capacity, that is, to vanish as an end and remain purely as a means.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The general instrument by which God interferes in the affairs of men is by the weapon of LIGHT
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Jesus himself refers to himself as light, illumination, knowledge, insight, understanding, wisdom
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Light makes invisible things manifest.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Daily Drive 365

quote: Grace will dropinto your pocketon a day of waning light-
author: Tyrean Martinson, Champion in the Darkness

quote: It is the photographing of ordinary things, in extraordinary light, that produces extraordinary photographs.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Let the beauty of life be your light.
author: Steven Magee, Curing Electromagnetic Hypersensitivity

quote: God is a life-giving light.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: I’ve got to stop looking at you, like you light my world. You’re the dark cloud which brings the rain. You’re the hurricane which destroys my peace. You are not the sun. I am my own light.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: Creating light is a wiz
author: Diana Rose Morcilla

quote: I was once in darkness, but now, the light of God has shone upon me.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Confess your sins, pray towards the Heavens and be set free from all bondages in Jesus Name.
author: Ramona Govender

quote: Hope is the light, trusted guide in darkness.
author: Slade Combs, The Choice: Death Is Just The Beginning

quote: Love has glints of light that wake up our heart to feel the beauty of life.
author: Kasi Kaye Iliopoulos, Living in Light, Love & Truth: You Can Positively Change Your Life by Living in Light, Love, & Truth-Awareness + Reflection + Learning + Application

quote: We can honor our emotions after any traumatic event by moving through the experience centered in the heart with the goal of reaching the light on the other side.
author: Molly Friedenfeld

quote: In the land of light there is only one currency. The currency of love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Where love is the light, love is the way. Happiness is there; sadness flies away.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: There is a certain kind of darkness that seeps into our lives if we are not actively engaged in creating light.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: There is always a storm before a calm.There is always a darkness before daylight. There is always turbulence before quietness.There is always sacrifices before a great victory.There is always awaiting before a breakthrough.There is always prayer before an answer.There is always pain before joy.There is always failure before success.There is always pregnancy before the birth of new born baby.
author: Raphael Zernoff

quote: It is not enough that light shines on you
author: H.P. Lovecraft, The Outsider

quote: The difference between darkness and brightness is how you thrive on those moments and how you use such circumstances with goodwill in your spirit.
author: John Tyndall, Faraday as a Discoverer

quote: I used to be afraid of the dark until I learned that I am light and the dark is afraid of me.
author: Stephen King, It

quote: Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our Light, not our Darkness, that most frightens us. And as we let our own light shine, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same.
author: J.B. McGee, Skipping Stones

quote: It always amazes me when taking off from a stormy airport, how once you reach a certain altitude and get through the clouds, the sun shines as brightly as ever. If we learn to choose the experience of joy in our bodies, minds, hearts, and spirits, we will move in tune with the universe and dance in a flow of light and love, and remain above the clouds.
author: Jocelyn  Murray

quote: I’m sorry for hurting you. I know I did. I’m most likely dead now, and I guess if there’s any kind of fairness in the afterlife I’m probably in hell getting roasted. But if that’s where I am, I want you to know, I still love you. Always did. Love, Caine
author: Brené Brown

quote: For nothing is fixed, forever and forever and forever, it is not fixed; the earth is always shifting, the light is always changing, the sea does not cease to grind down rock. Generations do not cease to be born, and we are responsible to them because we are the only witnesses they have. The sea rises, the light fails, lovers cling to each other, and children cling to us. The moment we cease to hold each other, the sea engulfs us and the light goes out.
author: Henry Miller, Tropic of Capricorn

quote: His charm was not electric, but it was enveloping.
author: Vann Chow, Shanghai Nobody

quote: Trust is a lot to ask of someone.
author: David Amerland, The Tribe That Discovered Trust: How Trust Is Created Lost and Regained in Commercial Interactions

quote: A good pastor knows how to trust people and how to give them authority to fulfill all kinds of tasks. He tries to make himself unnoticed and unnecessary. Don’t be indispensable!
author: trust only your Soul.

quote: A critical ingredient which binds customers to a brand is trust
author: Justin K. McFarlane Beau

quote: Faith is confident trust in God and the salvation He provides in His Son Jesus Christ.
author: irak.ibrahim hussain didi

quote: The Israelites in the desert found that hoarded manna rotted. They were permitted no bank accounts and no insurance policies. God is enough. He will be tomorrow who he was today. Later, through Jeremiah (Jeremiah 2:13) God chastises Israel for digging cisterns next to streams of living water, hedging their bets just in case God forgets to be God...or neglects to be good. God is enough. Will he not be tomorrow who he has been today?
author: Vironika Tugaleva

quote: Hope and trust are beautiful things. One gives a person the will to live, the other makes it worth living.
author: Janet Mullany, Jane and the Damned

quote: God is too good to be unkind and He is too wise to be mistaken. And when we cannot trace His hand, we must trust His heart.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Shaping the dream

quote: Humble leaders trust more easily because they realize that the world does not rest solely on their shoulders.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I expect nothing of man, and disown the race. The only folly is expecting what is never attained; man is most contemptible when compared with his own pretensions. It is better to laugh at man from outside the universe, than to weep for him within.
author: Richard Bach, Illusions: The Adventures of a Reluctant Messiah

quote: God always has a reason for what you are asked to endure.
author: Lisa Henry, Mark Cooper versus America

quote: If I want to gain her trust, I have to give her mine...
author: Prashant Chopra, The Eyes that drowned Uyuni

quote: All my life I have been the sort of person in whom people confide. And all my life I have been flattered by this role - grateful for the frisson of importance that comes with receiving important information. In recent years, however, I have noticed that my gratification is becoming diluted by a certain weary indignation. They tell me because they regard me as safe. All of them, they make their disclosures to me in the same spirit that they might tell a castrato or a priest - with a sense that I am so outside the loop, so remote from the doings of the great world, as to be defused of any possible threat. The number of secrets I receive is in inverse proportion to the number of secrets anyone expects me to have of my own. And this is the real source of my dismay. Being told secrets is not - never has been - a sign that I belong or that I matter. It is quite the opposite: confirmation of my irrelevance.
author: Ann Aguirre, Horde

quote: In order to grow you have to let go of all that you are and all that you know.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: She made a choice that day never to disregard the fact that people need to do things sometimes that others may not understand—and that did not give her reason to judge them
author: Jill Williamson, From Darkness Won

quote: You can never right an intentional wrong.
author: Amine A. Ayad

quote: Youths of the Pellaians and of the Macedonians and of the Hellenic Amphictiony and of the Lakedaimonians and of the Corinthians… and of all the Hellenic peoples, join your fellow-soldiers and entrust yourselves to me, so that we can move against the barbarians and liberate ourselves from the Persian bondage, for as Greeks we should not be slaves to barbarians.
author: Ana Marie Velazquez

quote: Many in the church have turned their back on serious study, and have embraced an anti-intellectualism which refuses to learn anything from scholarship at all lest it corrupt their pure faith. It is time to end this standoff, and to reestablish a hermeneutic of trust (itself a sign of the gospel!) in place of the hermeneutic of suspicion which the church has so disastrously borrowed from the postmodern world.
author: Michelle Aguilar, Becoming Fearless: My Ongoing Journey of Learning to Trust God

quote: Fear is like a weed in a garden. Once you allow it to take root, it spreads, replicating itself, until, eventually, it chokes out all the other life there. Trust, love, kindness – none of those things can ever really bloom in a garden of fear.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Relationship and relations, two different ends, very difficult to meet their needs.
author: Elijah Onyenmeriogu

quote: i often sit and wonderi often sit and dreami often sit and waitfor the one that’s just for me i search the many facesin the crowds of people i see exploring, seeking,looking for, the one that it could be.is it Mister Blue Collar?  is it Mister Too Clean?  is it Mister Holy Onewhich was made for me? then i stop and thinkof the biggest catastrophe -what if this man  i’m waiting fordoesn’t even recognize me?-LostInACrowd
author: Girdhar Joshi, Some Mistakes Have No Pardon

quote: With great hope in their hearts and wholehearted belief in their eyes during each new attempt, they keep on using the same approach over and over again, and always FAIL... Yet every time they expect that somehow a totally different result will magically occur!They are “stepping on to the same rake,” and each time they’re surprised and angry when the rake handle hits them on the forehead again. But they keep seeing the reasons for their failures as just another hurtful kick from life—not a result of their own actions, which cause these setbacks. They just keep on blaming the rakes!
author: Luigina Sgarro

quote: The two grappled in the quiet of old-fashioned personal diplomacy.
author: Stefan D

quote: I think probably one of the important things that mesmerize me is my RELATIONSHIP.Here comes the way how I narrate it as,The fabric enhances the beauty of the soul.I feel,The fabric of love, which will nurture from the depth of the heart&The fabric of celebration, which will cherish the occasion with wine and sweet words&The fabric of memories, which will mesmerizes our age and experience.I had all this desire to pursue my passion as,The fabric of wedding that embraces the fragrance of bliss in two souls&The fabric of tradition that exhibits beliefs and culture from one generation to the next&The fabric of surprise that fills the excitement in the ravishing family.It’s all about,A feel that nourish my emotions towards my heart& A feel that endeavors my passion towards my life& It’s THE FABRIC OF MY RELATIONSHIP that stays forever and enhances for generations.
author: Elaine  White, Right Kind of Wrong

quote: Do not say but show you care.
author: Rainbow Rowell, Landline

quote: The young girl inspected her flounces and smoothed her ribbons again; and Winterbourne presently risked an observation upon the beauty of the view. He was ceasing to be embarrassed, for he had begun to perceive that she was not in the least embarrassed herself.
author: Frank Herbert, The Dosadi Experiment

quote: If the only thing that you have to offer in a relationship or marriage is your physical appearance, then you are definitely walking on a very thin line. It takes more than physical beauty to sustain a healthy relationship or marriage.
author: Nityananda Das, Divine Union

quote: When it comes to youI can’t help myselfI’ve never been thisattachedto someone’s flaws
author: Zygmunt Bauman

quote: A relationship without trust is a waste of time
author: Nikhil Anubhav Minz

quote: Laughter is sweet when enjoyed alone. But it becomes sweeter when you enjoy it together with the people around you. Your success must lead to the success others.
author: Marcus J. Borg, The God We Never Knew: Beyond Dogmatic Religion to a More Authentic Contemporary Faith

quote: Options abound world over, Options to choose from and be the best.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

quote: I was just trying to open the door... but the walls fall down
author: Emmanuel Aghado

quote: So, am I too, like all other humans, just a rogue? Sure! Just a notch less than those rascals wearing godly robes.
author: Donavan Nelson Butler, Master Sergeant US Army

quote: The world has enough light from the sun, but not from your mind; and the universe has enough light from the stars, but not from your soul.
author: the divinity you’ve always been seeking is wrapped within.

quote: Bless the world with your positive thoughts,with your positive desires, with your positive words, and with your positive actions.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The mind is its thoughts, the heart is its desires, and the soul is its experiences.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Association brings impartation
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: If your coming into the world was a mistake, then you are the most beautiful error in the universe.
author: Karim Camara

quote: If you deliberately and passionately grieve over the consolations of darkness and participate with your spirit in their annihilation, you would put yourself above other forms of life and lives of other people.
author: William Dalrymple

quote: I release ribbons of gratitude to flow back upon the path I have walked as it stretches out behind me, so they brush past everyone whose path crossed my own. May they feel the brief kiss of remembrance within their hearts, there and then gone again, passing like a spring breeze, so that they suddenly know the things they have done for others, in so many ways big and small, seen and unseen alike, somewhere are known and treasured.
author: Jostien Gaarder

quote: At times there will be fire
author: anticipate the future for all the blessings it has in store for you.

quote: If love was a crime, God would encourage us all to go to prison.
author: Eileen Anglin

quote: Raise your love so high that anger cannot reach it.
author: Adele Kenny, A Lightness, a Thirst, or Nothing at All: Poems

quote: Each time a star twinkles, God is winking at the universe.
author: love was the first religion.

quote: Spiritual highs help you overcome emotional lows.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Your soul does not give you your dreams if you don’t have what it takes inside to achieve them.
author: Kennard Setubal

quote: You are the greatest temple in the universe
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: God cannot resist love for He cannot resist Himself.
author: all its songs are symphonies.

quote: Religious nuts, atheists, theists, as too most scientists fail to "get" IT - the Ultimate Reality - because they seek it through ego.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Most probably your belief system is screwed up. And so were your ancestors, before you. And now, maybe so are you. Overcome it, you!
author: Fakeer Ishavardas

quote: If you want to know how the heart is related to the soul, love someone.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The soul’s steps are greater than the heart’s leaps.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Bricks on your back are easier to carry than pebbles on your soul.
author: Phil Mitchell, A Bright New Morning: An American Story

quote: Love in your heart is better than gold in your hands.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The golden door of harvest for the planet, it felt so ready to be opened ...
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: The center of my sins stuck behind a blocked door, circled by hollow deeds spread on my lifetime’s floor
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: If you ask God for love,He may give you someone to forgive.If you ask God for patience,He may give you someone to bear.
author: Eileen Anglin

quote: Trust in God, the dependence on supernatural powers!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Power of prayer, serenity for the soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Love and Fear are polar opposites. Love originates from the soul, while Fear and worries and insecurities originate in the mind. Love is Heavenly, while Fear is Earthly. Love is a gift from Above, Fear is a burden from below.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: If you Love all Life you observe, you will observe all Life will Love.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Start and end your day with God.Seek His presence and blessing daily.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The sound of music, makes me dance.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: God seeks to walk with you along the journey.
author: start and end your day with God.

quote: Lord gives even more grace, so you can endure the test of time.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The goal of the soul is to work toward enlightenment.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: When you ask, expect the answer.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: My soul crave to walk with the Creator.My spirit sought to know the will of the Creator.My mind seek to mediate on the Holy words spoken by the Creator.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Live life in the power of the Holy Spirit.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The Bible is the greatest book ever written.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The birth of a child is supernatural spiritual event.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: May you find grace to be faithful at all times to the Lord.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Confess your sins, pray towards the Heavens and be set free from all bondages.
author: Dean Bokhari

quote: I am blessed with 365 days of thanksgiving and answered prayer.
author: Liberty Forrest, Soul Food: 101 Inspirational Messages to Nourish and Heal Your Spirit

quote: Pray and read your Bible daily. God has all the answers you seek
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: May you overflow with love, hope and joy of knowing the Saviour.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: My wishes before I die, to fulfill my mission on earth; The writing of my life stories to inspired present and future generations.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: A difficult journey is spiritual rewarding.There is a more dependence on God, His supernatural power, grace and divine favour along the travel.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: God is a supreme-being.God is all powerful.God is the creator of all things.God is great.God is mighty.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The essence of death is discovered in the gap between one moment ceasing and another one beginning. That essence is the wakefulness that is our true nature.
author: Enza Vita

quote: I am exactly who I am choosing to be. Should I change my choice, the universe will always be there to assist me.
author: Milan LaBrey, Back to the Basics: Five Core Values Revitalized

quote: Like an alchemical wave sending ripples of love to every part of our being, once we become conscious of an intelligent life force existing within us, everything changes.
author: Milan LaBrey, Back to the Basics: Five Core Values Revitalized

quote: Thoughts, by their nature, come and go endlessly in you. But you are not the thought; you are the one seeing the thought, so any thought of who you are cannot be the truth of who you are.
author: Milan LaBrey, Back to the Basics: Five Core Values Revitalized

quote: Life is not permanent problems with the goal of obtaining peace. Its permanent peace with occasional problems.
author: Katy Tackes, Each Time She Wakes

quote: We are beings emanating energy of multiple colors and sounds of Light.
author: Brian Edward Arsenault

quote: Action, not philosophy will get you going. Pick yourself up and move forward. That is the only way you can still enjoy life while you are blessed to be living it.
author: Charles F. Glassman, Brain Drain   The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: Staring at the light of another blinds the view of our own.
author: Charles F. Glassman, Brain Drain   The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: Guilt is to your health as a thief is to your wealth.
author: Charles F. Glassman, Brain Drain   The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: Connecting with the wilderness allows us to live in the flow of a meaningful, joyful life. Embracing this state of connectedness or oneness with other living beings including animals, as opposed to feeling an “otherness” or “separateness” brings a sense of harmony and enables us to be at peace with oneself and the world.
author: Grace G. Payge, A narrow escape from an ordinary life: A true story

quote: When you are where wild bears liveyou learn to pay attention to the rhythm of the land and yourself. Bears not only make the habitat rich, they enrich us just by being.
author: Julia Heywood

quote: Forgiveness is the road of love.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Be compassionate with all people. Give them the chance to change.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: I was thinking about changing into a different sort of person than the one I am. I do think about that. I read a book called The Art of Loving. A lot of things seemed clear while I was reading it but afterwards I went back to being more or less the same. What has Cam ever done that actually hurt me, anyway, as Haro once said. And how am I better than he is after the way i felt the night Mother lived instead of died? I made a promise to myself i would try.I went over there one day taking them a bakery cake - which Cam eats now as happily as anyone else - and I heard their voices out in the yard - now it’s summer, they love to sit in the sun - Mother saying to some visitor, “Oh, yes I was, I was all set to take off into the wild blue yonder, and Cam here, this idiot, came and danced outside my door with a bunch of his hippie friends - ‘	‘My God, woman,’ roared Cam, but you could tell he didn’t care now, ‘members of an ancient holy discipline.”	I had a strange feeling, like I was walking n coals and trying a spell so I wouldn’t get burnt.	Forgiveness in families is a mystery to me, how it comes or how it lasts
author: Unarine Ramaru

quote: The only person we have the right or the power to forgive is ourselves. For everything else, there is the Art of Acceptance.
author: Michelle Madow, Diamonds are Forever

quote: It’s taken years, but part of my own personal growth has involved deciding that I can learn something from even the most annoying person.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: It is useless to fight fire with fire. When you’re offended, it is instinctive to want to fight back in anger.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Repentance is words, God forgives the kind.
author: Cheryl Strayed, Tiny Beautiful Things: Advice on Love and Life from Dear Sugar

quote: Always be kind. Every one needs it. Practice forgiveness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You need to understand something. Forgiveness isn’t an emotion. It’s an action, and it’s a choice. It’s the choice to not let the past affect how you feel about her.
author: Janet Mullany, Hidden Paradise

quote: To live a wonderful life create more, buy less, hug more, scold less, give more, take less, forgive more, worry less and be grateful everyday for life.
author: Joya Ryan, Break Me Slowly

quote: We all reek of weariness. A room full of the black-soul phenomenon. All of a sudden I don’t feel so alone in the recognition of my own mixed feelings mirrored in those faces. In those faces, I see that the seemingly repugnant behavior wasn’t so atrocious after all. Everything is forgiv- able. Everything we said and did and felt was magnified by the pres- ence of something we couldn’t control, and that fact definitely brought out the crazy. Each of us will carry a balance of regret and pride for the rest of our lives.
author: Jason Micheal Ratliff

quote: We have to figure out how to let go, and forgive. This is our job
author: #NAME?

quote: Forgiveness can help you to be sane.
author: Dawn M. Turner, Defender

quote: Support is not always easy to come by if you wait for the world to see your worth. Discover your own worth and the world will indeed follow your lead. Its the law of cause and effect! It has to happen. Support yourself.
author: Leo Tolstoy, Anna Karenina

quote: We watched, and he taught us like he did every day we were with him. He showed us how to forgive.
author: Khaled Hosseini, A Thousand Splendid Suns

quote: People that hurt others, only act on a pain they feel themselves.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway

quote: You never get a second chance to make a first impression. God bless those who see beyond our flaws painted in bold strokes.
author: Todd Stocker, Refined: Turning Pain Into Purpose

quote: Every friend, every neighbor, and every family member wishes that you retain your golden heart. No one wants to see your love sullied. Yet, they all know a dark circumstance will find you eventually. Know this: You are being hunted--like game. Life will knock you down with some unexpected misfortune. Resolve now, to help your partner get back up. Only a determined family kills its wounded. When everyone else abandons him, come back for your husband.pg 55
author: Michael Ben Zehabe, Song of Songs The Book for Daughters

quote: It is better for a leader to make a mistake in forgiving than to make a mistake in punishing.
author: Dustin Cruz

quote: Because I have forgiven my past, and God has forgiven my past, no person can make me denounce my past. It made me who I am today, and the choices I make from this moment on are what will ultimately define me.
author: Lauren DeStefano, Sever

quote: Love, forgiveness, modesty, humility and gratitude are most important virtues in life.
author: M.L. Stedman

quote: Once, when I was little, I asked her if she’d cried when my father had fallen to his death.At the funeral? I mean, the burial?No, I did not.Because you weren’t sad?Because it was nobody’s business if I was.
author: Michelle Franklin, Recollection of Shared Days: Stories of Celebration

quote: For so long, she had remained the sleeping volcano, her passion and pain and anger roiling quietly as lava within. She’d buried her love deep within her core; with heat and pressure she made diamonds of it all, gemstones precious and beautiful, glittering and indestructible and of no use but to be hoarded in her heart.
author: Rivka Galchen, American Innovations: Stories

quote: I have been loved," she said, "by something strange, and it has forgotten me.
author: William Shakespeare, Macbeth

quote: It had been so long since she had felt anything.
author: Lyrical Treasure

quote: I whisper over to myself the way of loss, the names of the dead. One by one, we lose our loved ones, our friends, our powers of work and pleasure, our landmarks, the days of our allotted time. One by one, the way we lose them, they return to us and are treasured up in our hearts. Grief affirms, them, preserves them, sets the cost. Finally a man stands up alone, scoured and charred like a burnt tree, having lost everything and (at the cost only of its loss) found everything, and is ready to go. Now I am ready.
author: Patricia Hamill, Fearless

quote: Loss is merely a tool for evaluation, organization, determination and actualization towards being the best you that you can possibly be.
author: Walter Rodney, How Europe Underdeveloped Africa

quote: If there is something we need more than anything else during grief, it is a friend who stands with us, who doesn’t leave us. Jesus is that friend.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: Nothing big ever happens, good or bad, unless the floor falls out first.Let your longing wind you down through that spiral. And know that falling can be the most wickedly awesome and totally safe thing you’ve ever done. Down, down, down, because when you hit that solid ground you’ll know.You might touch down softly, or you might land in an ungraceful thud. But land you will and when you’re ready, you can stretch your shaky legs, dust yourself off tossing your head back to the heavens and proclaim ‘Here I am! All that I am, and all that I will be.”And your heart will still love what it loves. And you will remember that was good in you, and in her. And these memories will comfort and will serve you as you move through life, open to love – wherever and whenever it finds you.
author: Edward Fahey, The Mourning After

quote: The risk of all friendship is, alas, a little grief.
author: Anne Tyler

quote: The only thing grief has taught me is to know how shallow it is.
author: Susanna Kearsley, The Splendour Falls

quote: For a while she cried silently until she tired herself out and the overwhelming feeling of sleepiness overcame her. The room around her was fairly silent, although she wasn’t the only one crying herself to sleep. It was quite common at places like this to hear cries in the dark. There were so many saddened and lonesome souls around her. It was usually at night when they were reminded of just how sad and lonely they actually were.
author: William H. Gass, The Tunnel

quote: An indescribable sadness emanated from the white splendour of the staircase and balustrade; the blood-red, now almost black splendour of the carpets. The huge palms in their huge pots looked like they had recently arrived from the cemetery. Their dark green leaves also looked blackish, like wizened, perished weapons from olden days.

quote: A little madness shows the way to happiness.A little kindness can heal the sadness.

quote: From my window I watched the full moon—a moon that reminded me of Brett—become shadowed, little by little until there was only a deep blackness in the woods at night. I would sit there wakeful, hour after hour, and wonder if this aching around my heart, this sense of being alone, forlorn and unwanted in a world where there was gayety and love for others of my age, was going to continue for all of my days.

quote: Nothing returns, nothing begins anew; it is never the same thing, and yet it seems always the same. For, if the days never return, every moment brings forth new beings whose destiny it will be to create for themselves, in the course of their lives, the same illusions that have companioned and at times illuminated ours. The fabric is eternal; eternal, the embroidery. A universe dies when we die; another is born when a new creature comes to earth with a new sensibility. If, then, it is very true that nothing begins all over again, it is very just to say, too, that everything continues. One may fearlessly advance the latter statement or the former, according to whether one considers the individual or the blending of generations. From this second point of view, everything is coexistent; the same cause produces contradictory, yet logical effects. All the colors and their shades are printed at a single impression, to form the wonderful image we call life.
author: Andre White

quote: There is no reality except in action. Man is nothing else than his plan; he exists only to the extent that he fulfills himself; he is therefore nothing else than the ensemble of his acts, nothing else than his life.

quote: No one can make you feel inferior unless you let them.

Men respond to and admire the qualities that would make men useful and dependable in an emergency. Men have always had a role apart, and they still judge one another according to the demands of that role as a guardian in a gang struggling for survival against encroaching doom. Everything that is specifically about being a man—not merely a person—has to do with that role

quote: Evaluation eliminates frustration. We should also evaluate unrealistic expectations. Unrealistic expectations become unmet expectations. And unmet expectations are like kindling wood-it only takes but a spark of frustration to set them ablaze and burn those involved.

quote: The discoveries of my life that were of greatest significance (1) When I discovered love, (2) When I discovered faith and (3) When I discovered one cannot be without the other.

quote: I saw on his face a glimpse of his past. The damage, the unhappiness and the pain, and I wondered what kind of skeletons he has been hiding and for how long. It’s one of those mutual attraction moments that are unexplainable, but as real as anything you’ve ever seen. Almost like my soul knows his soul.
