quote: We come into this world priceless, with no value befitting our precious tiny frame. As we grow older we begin to assign value to ourselves. And eventually we reach a point where we can place a monetary value on our existence. It is in this moment where we stop believing we are priceless that we start believing we are worthless.
author: Cyma Rizwaan Khan, I See The Devil

quote: Don’t try to change the world; just change yourself. Why? Because the whole world is only relative to the eyes that are looking at it. Your world actually only exists for as long as you exist and with the death of you, includes the death of your world. Therefore, if there is no peace in your heart; you will find no peace in this world, if there is no happiness in your life; you will find no happiness anywhere around you, if you have no love in your heart; you will not find love anywhere and if you do not fly around freely inside your own soul like a bird with perfectly formed wings; then there will never be any freedom for you regardless if you are on a mountaintop removed from all attachments to all of mankind! Even the mountaintop cannot give you freedom if it is not already flying around there inside your own soul! So I say, change yourself. Not the world.
author: Kathryn E. Livingston

quote: Dreams are reality that has not become true. However, in the hearts of some people, they have already come true. People whose dreams are already achieved in their hearts, and who can see that as they boldly throw themselves into it, have true courage.

quote: Do not pray for an easy life. Pray for a difficult on with the strength to endure it.

quote: Before you contemplate becoming immersed in the collective, make sure you become immersed in the liberation of your own individualism. Rescue yourself from seeking refuge in group think, or from being transfixed on the false security of cooperative agendas, and first master the essence of your own individuality. Only then will you really be a valuable part of a collective.

quote: It is better to do what you love for work, but if it is your day job that enables an unpaid passion, then your life is still sweeter. What is important is that you make time for your dreams, not whether or not you get paid for it.

when a lifestyle is created from the existence of your dream, you dont leave any room for failure.

quote: Dream big, but stay humble.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

quote: The most valuable people in the world are "Visionary People".
author: Vikas Swarup, Q & A

quote: Happy the man, whose wish and careA few paternal acres bound,Content to breathe his native airIn his own ground.
author: Harlan Coben

quote: As long as there is love and memory, there is no true death," - John Carstairs
author: Emory R. Frie, Neverland

quote: Make someone feel something and you will never be forgotten.
author: Wisława Szymborska, View With a Grain of Sand: Selected Poems

quote: There was something brittle about her, and he feared she would snap apart at the slightest touch; she had thrown herself so fiercely into this, the erasing of memory, that it would destroy her.
author: Jackie Haze, Borderless

quote: I was sad to leave, but I was also pleased to have met people outside of Sierra Leone. Because if I was to get killed upon my return, I knew that a memory of my existence was alive somewhere in the world.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Life is a journey, education is our pleasure and our memory.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The magnitude of any one day is compromised by its passing quickly into the next, a mere moment in time which soon fades into the collective memory of our past.
author: David Nicholls, One Day

quote: Precipitate as weather, she appeared from somewhere then evaporated, leaving only memory.
author: Francesca Marciano, The Other Language

quote: Each loved one went silently down
author: Jeane Westin, His Last Letter: Elizabeth I and the Earl of Leicester

quote: As it is?
author: Chris Huntington

quote: One measure of friendship consists not in the number of things friends can discuss, but in the number of things they need no longer mention.
author: Michael Salter, Organised  Sexual Abuse

quote: And now about the cauldron singLike elves and fairies in a ring,Enchanting all that you put in.
author: Becca Ritchie & Kristia Ritchie, Long Way Down

quote: Oooh, sneaky, I thought. Must be how normal mothers operate instead of yelling.
author: Marilee Brothers, Moon Rise

quote: If you never tell anyone the truth about yourself, eventually you start to forget.
author: Neil Patrick Harris, Neil Patrick Harris: Choose Your Own Autobiography

quote: I wish for magic this season,laughter and fun.I wish for mistletoe kisses-those sparkly ones.
author: Jane Cousins, To Bedevil A Beauty

quote: Fire. I see it everywhere.
author: Jane Cousins, To Wrangle A Witch

quote: To face a real daemon, you must first look inwards and conquer your own darkness. ☥
author: Catherynne M. Valente, The Girl Who Soared Over Fairyland and Cut the Moon in Two

quote: The power of faith can be a strong force, but the power of knowing is even stronger. ☥
author: Luis Marques

quote: Did you ever face Death and let it stare back at you right in the Eyes? ☥
author: Luis Marques

quote: Never grow up!
author: Luis Marques, Kemet - The Year of Revelation

quote: your mother is the longest magic show you will ever seeno one knows how her face is target practice for her partner and a shield for her childrenhow she makes a mouthful of blood disappearerases bruiseshardens teethhow she wakes up and dresses her children beforedressing her wounds
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Life is a chance at Evolution. Overcome yourself and Become. ☥
author: Luis Marques

quote: Words are sigils that can hide the coded language of your Soul. ☥
author: Luis Marques

quote: An evolved and balanced Ego can be a valuable tool for the Self. But a blinding one is always among the first footsteps into Oblivion. ☥
author: Luis Marques

quote: In darkness lies a mystery that has the power to shine brighter than true light. ☥
author: Luis Marques

quote: An Asetian never tries to talk louder than the crowd surrounding him. An Asetian becomes that crowd.
author: Casey Caracciolo, The Shadow of the Gauntlet

quote: All his senses screamed in warning, the very air reeking of forbidden magic, but duty call him forward.
author: Karen Azinger, The Flame Priest

quote: A bad magician never gets the good props.
author: he is just more magical in his presentation.

quote: Books" - Snell smiled - "are a kind of magic.
author: Jim Butcher, Fool Moon

quote: You know, the kind who know Jesus by His first name, but out of politeness never use it even to His face.
author: Bryan Chapell, Unlimited Grace: The Heart Chemistry That Frees from Sin and Fuels the Christian Life

quote: Imagine being with the apostles and having the opportunity of seeing Jesus being taken up into heaven. Imagine if you had been there to witness to the ascension of Christ. For sure it must have been an awesome experience!
author: George MacDonald, Mary Marston

quote: The simple record of three short years of active life has done more to regenerate and to soften mankind, than all the (investigations) disquisitions of philosophers and than all the exhortations of moralists.
author: Lewis N. Roe, From A To Theta: Taking The Tricky Subject Of Religion And Explaining Why It Makes Sense In A Way We Can All Understand

quote: Poor Mary. They married her to Jesus, and Jesus is an asexual circumcised revolutionary. What future is there to be had in that scenario?
author: Matthew Vines, God and the Gay Christian: The Biblical Case in Support of Same-Sex Relationships

quote: God has taken you from something in order to get you to something.
author: Jordone Branch

quote: The greatest gift we have ever received, and ever will or could receive, is the Spirit of God Himself. He enters the essence of our human form and changes us from within. He fills us with joy, love and peace. He subdues our passions and transforms our very being into the likeness of Christ.
author: Peggy Haymes, Strugglers, Stragglers and Seekers: daily devotions for the rest of us

quote: Being right is massively overrated, especially when it comes at the expense of being compassionate and kind.
author: Scott Stabile

quote: It is impossible to experience a person’s life, or to be compassionate, if you do not listen to the person or if you do not ask questions.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche, Thus Spoke Zarathustra

quote: empathy is more powerful than sympathy
author: Cecil Day-Lewis, The Complete Poems of C. Day Lewis

quote: Compassion has been advocated by all the great faiths because it has been found to be the safest and surest means of attaining enlightenment.
author: Christopher Kennedy Lawford, When Your Partner Has an Addiction: How Compassion Can Transform Your Relationship

quote: The rich never have a chance of being neighborly to their equals. The best they can do is feel mawkish about the sufferings of their inferiors, which they can never begin to understand, and to be patronizingly kind.
author: Robin Sacredfire

quote: Look every creature from the window of compassion with the eyes of love!
author: Farshad Asl, The "No Excuses" Mindset: A Life of Purpose, Passion, and Clarity

quote: Always remember to give yourself the kindness, compassion and consideration you give to others.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: A person’s attitude creates the tone of his or her life. The highest expression of human dignity is to live a purposeful life devoted to principles and exhibiting compassion for other people.
author: John Bruna

quote: When you show compassion instead of being judgemental. You will not undergo your own judgement, but you will receive your own love
author: David Gatata

quote: She had stars in her eyes and galaxies in her veins
author: Henri J.M. Nouwen

quote: We are nothing without compassion for others and for all other beings!
author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, Morning and Evening, Based on the English Standard Version

quote: Even suffering when wrapped in love, seems tolerable.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: He was no stranger to compassion: his heart was open to many good impulses, though his rank often prevented their manifestation.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Humanity is not only ‘great acts’ spending thousands, putting your name on headlines. Humanity is to be kind to every living being, to be compassionate towards all, even to the tiniest animal, seen and unseen. Some people consider killing ants or pest normal, but I find it is an act of extreme cruelty. By killing them you violate their rights to live. We must remember that the earth and the universe belongs to all of us. We are just another species out of millions of species, and we share the universe with them and most importantly, remember that we belong to each other.
author: Matthew Quick

quote: You must love and respect yourself enough to never be a victim under any circumstance.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: You must rely on reason and science,” she said, “and be guided by a likewise rational ethic of human concern. You must do your utmost as individuals to improve your understanding, ability and compassion.
author: Gudjon Bergmann, Yes! You Can Manage Stress

quote: Compassion stands on the pillars of trust, love, awareness and detachment.
author: Vironika Tugaleva

quote: Attain complete emptiness,Hold fast to stillness.Understanding the ordinary: Mind opens.Mind opening leads to compassion,Compassion to nobility,Nobility to heavenliness,Heavenliness to TAO. TAO endures. Your body dies.There is no danger.
author: Orhan Pamuk

quote: Sadly, we live in a world where if you do good things, there are no financial rewards. If you poison the earth, there is a fortune to be made.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: The greatest gift you can give is your time.  Not money, not items, not food, not pretty cards with handwritten sentiment, but time.  People need your presence.  The way you can help a soul the most is to simply be there.
author: Pablo

quote: Love, gratitude, compassion, and kindness are the sources of all enduring, pure happiness.
author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

quote: Use the talents you’ve developed to create goodwill, to ease the burdens of those who are not as fortunate and to seek truth humbly, without insisting that you hold the only keys to it.
author: Rachel Hamilton

quote: New converts displayed a most un-Roman concern for the sick man.
author: Psalm 145 9

quote: If a person shows anger to you, and you show anger in return, the result is disaster. If you nurse hatred, you will never be happy, even in the lap of luxury. By contrast, if you control your anger and show its opposite - love, compassion, tolerance, and patience - then not only do you remain in peace, but gradually the anger of others also will diminish.
author: Joseph Goldstein, A Heart Full of Peace

quote: People walk in the door because they need you to take care of them -- to feed them or fix them.
author: Widad Akreyi

quote: A tearless heart is a callous heart.
author: #NAME?

quote: The world is focused on success, which is defined as riches and fame. Define your success as a person of values. Make love, compassion, and kindness your only success and everything else will be available to you.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: That is the most godlike feeling a human can experience
author: dark man becomes good man only when the compassion appears!

quote: Nothing is wrong with her that is dangerous or harmful. She just feels deeper than others
author: Ellen Bass, The Human Line

quote: Our primary health care should begin on the farm and in our hearts, and not in some laboratory of the biotech and pharmaceutical companies.
author: Vironika Tugaleva, The Love Mindset: An Unconventional Guide to Healing and Happiness

quote: I was in awe of the mystery of human compassion and the inability of love to make the distance between us any more bearable.
author: Hope Bradford, Oracle of Compassion: The Living Word of Kuan Yin

quote: There is no force in the world better able to alter anything from its course than love.
author: G.I. Gurdjieff

quote: Three of the ten principles governing the City of Joy are (a) tell the truth, (b) stop waiting to be rescued, and (c) give away what you want the most.
author: J.M. Coetzee, The Lives of Animals

quote: Much less than a man, a little bit more than a jackal! This is the person without compassion!
author: Dan Pearce, Single Dad Laughing

quote: If you have nothing but compassion, you are still very wealthy; if you have everything but compassion, you are still very poor!
author: Dan Pearce

quote: Your pain is not prescribed by your creator, He is the healer thus not giver of misery.We are victims of others; lay the blame where it belongs.Mankind is responsible for its environment and culture, the earth was in its purest form when Adam arrived (blessing on our first prophet) Culture created by man for power. The day we take responsibility for our actions, will be the day God walks through the door smiling
author: Molly Friedenfeld, The Book of Simple Human Truths

quote: The key to cultivating confidence in ourselves is understanding our right to make the truth our own.
author: Sharon Salzberg, A Heart as Wide as the World: Stories on the Path of Lovingkindness

quote: Etymologically, "compassion" means to suffer together. "Together," however, is different from "identically." Compassion is not the same as selflessness, and not really the opposite of selfishness. Rather, it provides a basis for helping other people that is materially disinterested but emotionally self-regarding. As Rousseau wrote in Emile, "When the strength of an expansive soul makes me identify myself with my fellow, and I feel that I am, so to speak, in him, it is in order not to suffer that I do not want him to suffer. I am interested in him for love of myself..." Or, as Jean Bethke Elshtain has said, "Pity is about how deeply I can feel. And in order to feel this way, to experience the rush of my own pious reaction, I need victims the way an addict needs drugs.
author: Storm Constantine

quote: I feel the capacity to care is the thing which gives life its deepest significance.
author: John Irving, A Son of the Circus

quote: Am I ever angry or frustrated? I only feel angry sometimes when I see waste, when things that we waste are what people need, things that would save them from dying. Frustrated? No, never.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru, Soul Trader: Putting the Heart Back into Your Business

quote: In matters of love, spread kindness like a flower.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The beauty of a face is transient, but the beauty of a heart is everlasting and magnificent.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Jealousy is the art of burning yourself inside out.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Never fear to make mistakes
author: I am just kind.

quote: A smile is the best compliment of love for a friend and for a stranger.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To be is to belong.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To make it a perfect season, let us feel joy and love everyone without a reason.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The best defense is to change and adapt without losing values and morals.
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: If you have a definite purpose with a plan, you will definitely reach it.
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: An intelligent person is eager to speak, but a wise person is eager to listen.
author: simplicity has intrinsic power.

quote: The beauty of a thought is true science fiction.
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: A wise person does not fear failure but gains experience and wisdom.
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: Never lose the power to love.
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: To be happy, be yourself.
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: Very few people think
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: Before we can change our condition, we have to change our thoughts.
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: It’s easy to be kind to friends who return your smiles and happily lend a helping hand. But the true test of good character is finding the will and desire to be kind and charitable to those who give us absolutely no motivation to do so.
author: Drishti Bablani, Wordions

quote: Do not wait until Christmas to spread a little cheer,people appreciate kindness, all through of the year.
author: Saif Ullah

quote: Though Julian could be marvelously kind in difficult circumstances of all sorts, I sometimes got the feeling that he was less pleased by kindness itself than by the elegance of the gesture.
author: Claudia Gray, Star Wars - Bloodline

quote: Kindness is love in action, not feeling emotions or thoughts of empathy only. Kindness is doing!
author: Moosa Rahat

quote: When you love someone, you don’t care that she ate your sandwich. You only hope she found it delicious.
author: R.J. Palacio

quote: Rare is the man who seeks not only to heal himself but to heal his fellow man.
author: Liza M. Wiemer, Hello?

quote: But there are times," said Charlotte, "when it is necessary and an act of friendship to write nothing rather than not to write.
author: Maggie Stiefvater, The Dream Thieves

quote: Sometimes "No" is the kindest word.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Wealth without virtue is no harmless neighbor.
author: Kishore Bansal

quote: I have nothing to do with him,” L said. “To be completely accurate, I do not even know B. He is simply someone I am aware of. But none of this affects my judgment. Certainly, I was interested in this case, and began to investigate it because I knew who the killer was. But that did not alter the way I investigated it, or the manner in which my investigation proceeded. Naomi Misora, I cannot overlook evil. I cannot forgive it. It does not matter if I know the person who commits evil or not. I am only interested in justice.”“Only... in justice…” Misora gasped. “Then... nothing else matters?” “I wouldn’t say that, but it is not a priority.”“You won’t forgive any evil, no matter what the evil is?” “I wouldn’t say that, but it is not a priority.”“But...”Like a thirteen-year-old victim. “There are people who justice cannot save.” Like a thirteen-year old criminal. “And there are people who evil can save.”“There are. But even so,” L said, his tone not changing at all, as if gently admonishing Naomi Misora. “Justice has more power than anything else.”“Power? By power... you mean strength?”“No. I mean kindness.” He said it so easily.
author: Pushkar Saraf

quote: Rx for life: see through the heart and live with kindness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The more you are kind, the more kindness you will find.
author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

quote: Manifest kindness to embrace greatness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Respond with love and kindness when someone trying to hate you and hurt you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Life is a gift, so appreciate it. Love is abundant, so share it.Enthusiasm is infectious, so spread it.Kindness is divine, so embody it.Peace is the only way, so embrace it.The earth is your home, so take care of it. Life is for happiness, so enjoy it.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Be kind to every body and every body will be kind to you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Kindness is the greatest gift for the humanity. Nothing is more important than to be kind to each other.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Kindness is the magical beauty of a person.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Kindness is not an option, it is an absolute necessity of life.
author: Natsuki Takaya, Fruits Basket: The Complete Collection

quote: Listen to me. Forget all you saw. Leave it. Take your mind from it. It has nothing to do with you. But use it for experience. Now you know what hurt it brings to women when men come into the world. Remember, and make it up to your Mama and to all women...And another thing let it do. There is no room for pride in any man. There is no room for unkindness. There is not room for wit at the expense of others. All men are born the same, and equal. As you saw today, so come Captains and the Kings and the Tinkers and the Tailors. Let the memory direct your dealings with men and women. And be sure to take good care of Mama. Is it?
author: Kate Mullane Robertson

quote: Every man on earth is sick with the fever of sin, with the blindness of sin and is overcome with its fury. As sins consist mostly of malice and pride, it is necessary to treat everyone who suffers from the malady of sin with kindness and love. This is an important truth, which we often forget. Very often we act in the opposite manner: we add malice to malice by our anger, we oppose pride with pride. Thus, evil grows within us and does not decrease; it is not cured – rather it spreads
author: Margaret Cardillo, Just Being Audrey

quote: There is great power in our words, because theyare thoughts to which we have given additional energy by speaking them aloud so another person can know them.
author: Molly Friedenfeld, The Book of Simple Human Truths

quote: It is not only me devoted to your kindness and beauty; walk in the gardens, you will find birds singing your name.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: How would your life be different if your religion was love, and your spirituality was governed by kindness? How would the world be different if everyone did this?
author: Bryant McGill, Voice of Reason

quote: ...that you should be nice to everyone until a person gives you reason not to be, and sometimes even then.
author: Usama Ejaz

quote: Remorse is a terrible thing to bear, Pam, one of the worst of all punishments in this life. To wish undone something you have done, to wish you could look back on kindness to someone you love, instead of on unkindness - that is a very terrible thing.
author: the perennial infusion of springtime into the winter of bleakness.

quote: Travel, for me, is a breathtaking experience. A humbling for the soul and the realization that we are all in this together.
author: Monique Roffey, Archipelago

quote: For of this world one never sees enough and to dine in harmony with nature is one of the gentlest and loveliest things we can do.
author: rules tend to reduce their grip when you cross borders.

quote: I felt that first awareness that there’s a whole set of species whose sounds and calls you’ve never heard—the wonder of realizing that people are growing up with an entirely different sensory experience from yours. This whole country seemed so shiny to me.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Oh, well, it might look like a patterned world, laid out in prim design, but to those living there it could never be so simple. They were as alive as she: that old peasant contriving to outwit the cold; that woman anxiously counting her comical flock lest one goose escape her vigilance; all those who slept, or toiled, or loved under the low-hung roofs or the sharp turrets. Those people out there, if they caught sight of her own face pressed close to the window pane, might be speculating about her. To them she was part of the pattern of the lumbering train with its trail of smoke and little boxlike carriages. Perhaps they envied her, riding at ease to distant Paris. How little they knew of that! How little she herself know what awaited her at the end of the journey!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: We saw beautiful landscapes on the journey.
author: Ashley Warlick, The Arrangement

quote: God will make straight my path.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: I want to board a train, and leave my books behind. I want to be so caught up in writing about the journey, that I forget that fiction & fact are not the same. The destination does not signify.
author: S.A. Tawks, Mule

quote: I travel to know where I fit into the world, and where I don’t.
author: Rolf Potts

quote: I’m not a foreigner because I haven’t been praying to return safely home, I haven’t wasted my time imagining my house, my desk, my side of the bed. I am not a foreigner because we are all travelling, we are all full of the same questions, the same tiredness, the same fears, the same selfishness and the same generosity. I am not a foreigner because, when I asked, I received. When I knocked, the door opened. When I looked, I found.
author: Erin Kouvas

quote: That we leave our homes, that we step through our doors to the world, that we travel our whole lives not because we want to collect exotic T-shirts, not because we want to consume foreign adventure the same Western way we consume plastic and Styrofoam and LCD TVs and iPads, but because it has the power to renew us—not the guarantee, not the promise, just the possibility. Because there are places our imaginations can never construct for us, and there are people who we will never meet but we could and we might. It reminds us that there is always reason to begin again.
author: Alain de Botton, The Art of Travel

quote: I was becoming addicted to Bombay. There was squalor and poverty, but I had begun to realise my good fortune and would never again forget it.
author: because all travels are towards the future and the future is unknown!

quote: It’s daunting to find the language so foreign, so distant, but also so thrilling. One is absolved of responsibility when the language is incomprehensible.
author: Henry James

quote: When our thoughts are unsettled and our inner world is in a muddle, we may sharpen our wits and try to recognize the invisible edges of our fractured stance. If we seek to figure out, what our life story is all about, we may be able to put the missing pieces in place and identify what is driving us, what we are actually up to and why we are running like mad dogs, sometimes. (“On a doggy day”)
author: Robin Benway, Emmy & Oliver

quote: The world around you know only that reflects on you, that is the success of a joker too.
author: Saga Valsalan

quote: Cultivate your thoughts in to positive seeds and see your life change for the better!
author: Aditya Kandari

quote: As the waves relentlessly seek the shore, so my thoughts continually return to you.
author: Stephen King, I Am the Doorway

quote: The Biblical stories are sacred inspiration.
author: Ridhdhesh Jivawala

quote: I can only run as fast as the rate of my breath.
author: Ellen Hopkins, Crank

quote: I savored every yes, every more, every oh, every there, every please. I wanted every one of her words. I knew what it was not to have them— I’d never take them for granted.
author: Asmaa Ed-dahri, Chasing Happiness

quote: Changing your attitude, your outlook, your mindset, perspective, disposition, or mood—they all mean controlling where you allow your thoughts to linger.
author: Xinran, The Good Women of China: Hidden Voices

quote: Ideas and opinions are not spontaneously "born" in each individual brain: they have had a centre of formation, or irradiation, of dissemination, of persuasion-a group of men, or a single individual even, which has developed them and presented them in the political form of current reality.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I have to get out of this room as soon as possible, or my own thoughts will wage war against me.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Everything is temporary; Emotions, thoughts, people and scenery. Do not become attached, just flow with it.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I happen to know this, and I happen to know that, and maybe I know that;and I work everything out from there. Tomorrow I may forgot that this is true, but remember that something else is true, so I can reconstruct it all again. I am never quite sure of where I am supposed to begin or where I am supposed to end. I just remember enough all the time so that as the memory fades and some of the pieces fall out I can put the thing back together again every day
author: Kishore Bansal

quote: Happiness depends on our perceptions and thoughts.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To be happy, the only thing you need is to have happy thoughts.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Happiness comes from your thoughts; it resides inside you. To be happy, have happy thoughts, whatever you do.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To be happy, follow the heart not the thoughts.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: One positive thought will shift the entire world under your feet.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: One not only wants to be understood when one writes, but also quite as certainly not to be understood. It is by no means an objection to a book when someone finds it unintelligible: perhaps this might just have been the intention of its author, perhaps he did not want to be understood by "anyone”. A distinguished intellect and taste, when it wants to communicate its thoughts, always selects its hearers; by selecting them, it at the same time closes its barriers against "the others". It is there that all the more refined laws of style have their origin: they at the same time keep off, they create distance, they prevent "access" (intelligibility, as we have said,) while they open the ears of those who are acoustically related to them.
author: Uzoma Nnadi

quote: Syllogism ―Major premise: I can control my thoughts.Minor premise: My feelings come from my thoughts.Conclusion: I can control my feelings.
author: Melyssa Winchester, Count on Me

quote: Poetry?"..."No, just thoughts, glimpses, things running through my head.
author: Laura Lam, Shadowplay

quote: If someone asked you what color the sky is, what would you say?
author: R.J. Palacio, Wonder

quote: The greatest wealth a man can have is the richness of soul... Smile
author: Robert Kodingo

quote: Some live in poverty but with their honor; some live in wealth but with no honor! Some lives are respectable, some are disgraceful!
author: Sandeep Sethi

quote: Giving is the only thing that creates wealth.
author: Juliet Schor, Plenitude: The New Economics of True Wealth

quote: Human identity is no longer defined by what one does, but by what one owns. We worship self-indulgence & consumption.
author: Ron Barrow

quote: True happiness cannot not be achieved through wealth, fame or action, But through love, modesty and self satisfaction.
author: Felix Wantang, Face to Face Meetings with Jesus Christ: Biblical Mysteries Revealed in His Own Words Like Never Before in Human History

quote: We cannot buy it. We are too poor. Then men who have made the law have taken our own drink from us, and have not left us wherewith to buy it. Yet they can buy it, because they are rich. I have a feeling that that is not just. I do not grudge them their riches and all it can buy for them.
author: Steve Bivans, Be a Hobbit, Save the Earth: the Guide to Sustainable Shire Living

quote: Health is a priceless wealth. Invest while you can.
author: Raphael Zernoff, All That Is

quote: The blessings and grace of God is my greatest wealth.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: The rich feel much less need than their predecessors to account for their wealth, whether to society, to governments or to God. Their attitudes and values are not seriously challenged by anyone. The respect now shown for wealth and money-making has been the most fundamental change in Britain over four decades.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson, Classic Quotations From The Otherworlds

quote: I know what it is to be in need and what it is to have more than enough. I have learnt this secret, so that anywhere, at any time, I am content, whether I am full or hungry, whether I have too much or too little. I have the strength to face all conditions by the power that Christ gives me.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: Poor is what people become, not what they are born to be.
author: Dương Thu Hương, Paradise of the Blind

quote: A poor man knows the true value of money and will not dare waste it, but a rich man is extravagant and always looking for an opportunity to empty his pockets.
author: Gautama Buddha

quote: Wealth is good when it brings joy to others.
author: Og Mandino, The Greatest Salesman in the World

quote: Better poverty without a care than wealth with its many obligations.
author: Murray N. Rothbard

quote: In progressive societies the concentration[of wealth] may reach a point where the strength of number in the many poor rivals the strength of ability in the few rich; then the unstable equilibrium generates a critical situation, which history has diversely met by legislation redistributing wealth or by revolution distributing poverty.
author: Seneca, Letters from a Stoic

quote: The greatest victory in life is to rise above the material things that we once valued most.
author: Marianne Williamson, The Law of Divine Compensation: On Work, Money, and Miracles

quote: Success in life depends upon happiness, and happiness is found in no other way than through SERVICE that is rendered in a spirit of love." Napoleon Hill
author: Livy, The Early History of Rome:

quote: I am too rich already, for my eyes mint
author: Alain de Botton

quote: Loneliness was a full-body sensation, an anti-exhilaration, from his core outward.
author: Tahereh Mafi, Unravel Me

quote: An echo from the past when, innocentWe looked upon the present with delightAnd doubted not the future would be kinderAnd never knew the loneliness of night.
author: Jodi Lynn Anderson, May Bird, Warrior Princess

quote: She had said that she preferred to be alone for so many years that it was now one of those things that equally well might or might not be true.
author: Katherine McIntyre, Rising for Autumn

quote: I have a hundred million fans, Angela, but I have very few friends.
author: Stephen King, It

quote: Two fears alternate in marriage, of loneliness and of bondage. The dread of loneliness being keener than the fear of bondage, we get married. For one person who fears being thus tied there are four who dread being set free. Yet the love of liberty is a noble passion and one to which most married people secretly aspire, -- in moments when they are not neurotically dependent -- but by then it is too late; the ox does not become a bull, not the hen a falcon.The fear of loneliness can be overcome, for it springs from weakness; human beings are intended to be free, and to be free is to be lonely, but the fear of bondage is the apprehension of a real danger, and so I find it all the more pathetic to watch young men and beautiful girls taking refuge in marriage from an imaginary danger, a sad loss to their friends ad a sore trial to each other. First love is the one most worth having, yet the best marriage is often the second, for we should marry only when the desire for freedom be spent; not till then does a man know whether he is the kind who can settle down. The most tragic breakings-up are of those couples who have married young and who have enjoyed seven years of happiness, after which the banked fires of passion and independence explode -- and without knowing why, for they still love each other, they set about accomplishing their common destruction.
author: Kelli Russell Agodon, Hourglass Museum

quote: The return of solitude was not quite as Dina expected it to be. These many years I made a virtue of inescapable reality, she thought, calling it peace and quiet.
author: Guillermo Maldonado

quote: She deserved at least one person who saw her and knew how good she was.
author: Kate Atkinson, Life After Life

quote: He stopped, feeling lonely in his long speech.
author: William T. Vollmann, The Ice-Shirt

quote: God is spirit
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Be strong in spirit, you can conquer every circumstance.
author: Theodore Volgoff, The Backpack

quote: You can either be a person who is a coward, afraid, ready to submit, surrender, a person who has himself no dignity, no respect for his own being—or you can be fearless. But then you are going to be a rebel, you cannot avoid that. Either you can be a man of faith or you are going to be a rebellious spirit.
author: Hermann Hesse, Narcissus and Goldmund

quote: The spirit of a man can survive a sick body.
author: Katherine Catmull, The Radiant Road

quote: When I thought everything was impossible to achieve, my spirit defied my thoughts and did the impossible. My ego sees limitations, but my spirit sees opportunities.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The purpose of Karate is to guide you out of trouble by any means necessary, both in actual combat and in life
author: Friedrich Heinrich Karl de la Motte Fouqué, Undine, The Water Sprite: Spring

quote: Spirit? Who is that fellow? And where do you know him from? Is he perhaps not merely an arbitrary and convenient hypostasis that you have not even defined, let alone deduced or proved? Do you think you have an audience of old women in front of you?
author: Cass van Krah

quote: Love is sacred.
author: Russell Eric Dobda

quote: Choose criticism wisely, it might help you improve some elements of what you do.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: If you want to find a way, you have to go
author: Celeste Cooper, WINTER DEVOTIONS (Broken Body, Wounded Spirit: Balancing the See-Saw of Chronic Pain

quote: I heard death had a name, but I forgot what it was.
author: Swami Mukerji

quote: The power of such a mountain is so great and yet so subtle that, without compulsion, people are drawn to it from near and far, as if by the force of some invisible magnet…this worshipful or religious attitude is not impressed by scientific facts, like figures of altitude, which are foremost in the mind of modern man. Nor is it motivated by the urge to ‘conquer’ the mountain.
author: Elizabeth George

quote: Some people when they have taken too much and have been driven beyond the point of endurance, simply crumble and give up. There are others, though they are not many, who will for some reason always be unconquerable. You meet them in time of war and also in time of peace. They have an indomitable spirit and nothing, neither pain nor torture nor threat of death, will cause them to give up.
author: Vironika Tugaleva, The Love Mindset: An Unconventional Guide to Healing and Happiness

quote: We all dream of being exactly what we are – powerful, beautiful, and worthy.
author: Vironika Tugaleva, The Love Mindset: An Unconventional Guide to Healing and Happiness

quote: Our bodies are simply our shells, the package for the spirit and the soul.
author: Katerina Kostaki, Cosmic Light

quote: Global transformation can occur only when each individual has the courage to awaken from this amnesia to our true self and then make conscious choices true to our spirit. The human race is the only species on earth evolved enough to be capable of this privilege.
author: Jaeda DeWalt

quote: Some journeys lead nowhere, but they set the spirit free
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Friendship is ageless. It is the spirit we should like and care for, not the shell that encases it.
author: Paul Hoffman, The Left Hand of God

quote: Let me tell you something, honey. When your boobs fall south and that pretty skin of yours looks like you’ve been tanning in a nuclear war zone, you’ll see what I mean about independence. When the looks are gone, all you’ve got left is your spirit, and ya gotta use it until you lose it. That and the occasional sponge bath from Francisco, but soon his ass will be just as wrinkly as mine. Beauty fades, but a strong will keeps ya young and springy.-Miss Velma
author: Mark  Lawrence

quote: Knowing another is endless...The thing to be known grows with the knowing.
author: S.R. Crawford, From My Suffering: 25 Ways to Break the Chains of Anxiety, Depression & Stress

quote: I synonymously felt my heart beat rapaciously, the heart which was once void of anything alive and well. Now the heart was rasping and knocking on my ribcage as if it was demanding to come out, take its root and grow.
author: Heather Nova

quote: Only ever doing what feels comfortable is a form of suicide.
author: Brandi L. Bates, Moonshine For The Soul: A Path to Strength, Wisdom, Growth, Health & Happiness

quote: Setbacks are just stepping stones to great things.
author: Thomas L. Friedman, The World Is Flat: A Brief History of the Twenty-first Century

quote: Our churches are full of people during work hours, morning, noon, evening, praying instead of being in the factories, libraries, laboratories, facilitating economic growth
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough, An Intimate Collision: Encounters with Life and Jesus

quote: Were you always such a snake," the child asked, "or did you grow into what you are?
author: Robert Tew

quote: Like a wild flower; she spent her days, allowing herself to grow, not many knew of her struggle, but eventually all; knew of her light.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: Thousands of hopeful days came to naught before this one. This was a golden day. Never give up.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: Seed Leaves Homage to R. F. Here something stubborn comes,Dislodging the earth crumbsAnd making crusty rubble.it comes up bending double,And looks like a green staple.It could be seedling maple,Or artichoke, or bean.That remains to be seen.Forced to make choice of ends,The stalk in time unbends,Shakes off the seed-case, heavesAloft, and spreads two leavesWhich still display no sureAnd special signature.Toothless and fat, they keepThe oval form of sleep.This plant would like to growAnd yet be embryo;In crease, and yet escapeThe doom of taking shape;Be vaguely vast, and climbTo the tip end of timeWith all of space to fill,Like boundless IgdrasilThat has the stars for fruit.But something at the rootMore urgent that the urgeBids two true leaves emerge;And now the plant, resignedTo being self-definedBefore it can commerceWith the great universe,Takes aim at all the skyAnd starts to ramify.
author: Karen   Clark

quote: we all get waves of regret sometimesbut instead of dwelling on what you can’t change,start focusing on what you can.
author: Choa Kok Sui, Creative Transformation - The Golden Lotus Sutras on Spiritual Practice

quote: When we are in touch with our creativity, through passion and excitement, we always put ourselves in the most expansive state of consciousness. Fear slows down our development, while love supports a rapid growth.
author: Bella Bloom

quote: Be selfish and take good care of you first. When you are your best, you can best help others.
author: Erich Fromm, The Sane Society

quote: Do not be limited by the judgements of others.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Limitless material growth is not sustainable or moral.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: One of the fastest ways you can profoundly change your life is to rid yourself of toxic people.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Develop new stories from new positive experiences and relationships — the experiences of your emerging new self!
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: You have to make the decision to let go of the past if you want to move forward.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: People who have had little self-reflection live life in a huge reality blind-spot.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: If you don’t want your past to own you, try owning your past.
author: Carl-Gustaf Rossby

quote: What others are doing or accomplishing is irrelevant to your growth.
author: Mark Sanborn, Fred 2.0: New Ideas on How to Keep Delivering Extraordinary Results

quote: People are never able to outperform their self-image.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: There is no such thing as the perfect relationship. You can however, create a relationship which is perfect. Perfection comes from your commitment to being a teacher and a student. Being as curious and playful as children. Having the maturity of an adult, and being a friend, partner, and lover. Perfection often comes from imperfection. So, embrace the challenges and learn to grow together, not apart….
author: James A. Murphy, The Waves of Life Quotes and Daily Meditations

quote: A Truthful Evaluation Of Yourself Gives Feedback For Growth and Success
author: Yvonne Pierre, The Day My Soul Cried:  A Memoir

quote: Death is a departure.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Our mistakes would not wish for anything more, if we could just stop giving birth to them.
author: Yohann Dafeu

quote: Grandma Harken was sharpening her garden shears. Her hands slowed on the file and she said finally, “He’ll get in trouble and he’ll figure it out. Best to do it without us standing over him. It’s the only way anybody ever learns to clean up after themselves.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah, Religion, Philosophy and life

quote: All endeavors, heroic or monstrous, scientific or philosophical, rise from the electrochemical functioning of the mind, that takes place relentlessly in the little specks of protoplasm inside the head. These specks of jelly inside the brain, known as the neurons, determine our identity, personality and everything that we are.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: No Scripture comes from any Supreme Creator.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Act like you have a lot of venom inside you, but never inject them into anyone.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Innocent? Tell me human, who among you is innocent? Who among you has not destroyed without need or hurt without pity? Should a lion ponder his role in thinning the herds? Does he question whether or not he is doing the right thing as he tears into a zebra’s flesh?” he snarled. His next words were slow and measured, and more to himself than to Natalya. “No….he knows only that he has teeth and claws….and an insatiable lust for blood.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The mind never sleeps. Though the body can be idle, there shall always be something for the mind to do! Do something with your mind then!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The secret of success is the strength to overcome any obstacle.
author: L.A. Casey, Ryder

quote: Do not be too quick to get angry.

quote: Priceless virtues are love, peace, joy, kindness, gentleness, goodness, long-suffering, patience faithfulness and self-control.

quote: Love deep is inexhaustible like a vast ocean.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: An hour is indeed a long time when you count every second

quote: Hating creates a hole in the heart.

quote: I respect the decision of others. But I retain my own deductions.

quote: Pure is honourable.Honourable is right.Right is lovely.Lovely is admirable.Admirable is excellent.Excellent is prasie worthy.Praise worthy is peace.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Do not take negative criticisms to heart.

quote: You can face fear, or feel it, her dad used to say. … Feel it, and it eats you alive. Face it, and you get to kick some ugly alien butt. Okay, he never said that. I wonder if they even have butts.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: One opinion can make a fool out of a once wise person

quote: Falling in love is some kind of madness.

quote: Sacred souls experience sleepless nights. It is enormous strength for specific sacred work.

quote: The Creator determines entrance and exit of every soul.

quote: A small tree with large roots will last longer than a large tree with small roots.

quote: Eternity exist in every sacred time.

quote: Little with love is better than much without love.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Life is immeasurable breath.

quote: Why do you compare yourself to others? Can you carry weight of others on your shoulders?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Don’t make your life complicated. Adapt to every circumstance.

quote: You can’t just run away from uncomfortable situation. You have to develop new strategy to graciously handle the situation.

quote: We will do the good work. It is our holy duty.

quote: All the stories give unique inspiration.

quote: In the wilderness, be not afraid. Trust God to deliver you.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: If you know how it’s to be treated unfairly, you will be gentle with others.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Faith gives strength to my bones.Grace gives power to my spirit.Hopes give anchor to my soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Water is water. Water is life sustenance.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The power of waiting is gracious.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Life is a journey. Choose your journey.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Good health is a holy blessing.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Freedom is the choice to be free than to be a slave.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The Lord will lead us through the mighty waters.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Divine self is rooted in love.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: To win the heart of men, always be yourself.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: You can have, what wish for.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The love for God is the love for nature.
author: Then it is being said when you cannot say

quote: Before your awake, all you do is seeWhen your awake, all you do is feel.
author: Munia Khan

quote: Adversity helps a man to know his inherent great abilities.
author: Lilli Thal, Mimus

quote: When I, awoke, they called me crazy; But only those, whom were still asleep.
author: Myself From The Inside Out & My God I WishIHadDoneItSooner.

quote: The Lord will never forsake you. His presence is always with you everywhere you may go.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: King of Kings; my rock, my refuge!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Grateful moments, blessed time.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, On Eagles Wings:Rise

quote: Mediation on the scriptures transforms our lives.
author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quote: Time is priceless gift.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: If you feel that favors can be returned then you are wrong, no matter how ever big or small it is, it can never be returned. Favor is always for lifetime...
author: itsnaini

quote: The calm within the storm is where peace lives and breathes. It is not within perfect circumstances or a charmed life... it is not conditional. Peace is a sacred space within, it is the temple of our internal landscape. We are free to visit it, whenever we seek sanctuary. Underneath the chaos of everyday living, peace is patiently awaiting our discovery... go within.
author: Jaeda DeWalt

quote: A wise man once said the fact that everyone lies is a universal truth, the only variable is about what.
author: Jaeda DeWalt

quote: Resentment is the act of stabbing yourself repeatedly in the heart with a knife, hoping the other person dies.
author: shaikh mustafa

quote: Sometimes, the most healing thing we can do for another human being, is to listen to them, just ... LISTEN.
author: John Geddes, A Familiar Rain

quote: It is not enough that your designs, nay that your actions, are intrinsically good, you must take care they shall appear so.
author: Brian Jacques, Lord Brocktree

quote: Wise are my ways witty my actions
author: Chet Williamson, Murder in Cormyr

quote: If i believe my truth is true and you believe your truth is true,what if my truth says yours is a lie.is it still true?
author: shaikh mustafa

quote: Writing journal is for those people who find no interest in living a life of victimhood and limited personal freedom.
author: Leadership works on the system

quote: The busier you are, the more intentional you must be.
author: Michael Hyatt, Living Forward: A Proven Plan to Stop Drifting and Get the Life You Want

quote: Do not allow your thoughts of what was to steal what can be.
author: John Patrick Hickey, All You Have Is Now: How Your Approach to the World Determines Your Destiny

quote: Imagine who you could be, what you could accomplish-if only you could get out of your own way.
author: Rob Liano

quote: If you don’t know exactly where you are going (and why),that is exactly where you will end up.
author: Liliane Mavridara

quote: The barrier to our future is often the very plans that we’ve created to get there.
author: Tony Curl, Seriously Simple Stuff to Get You Unstuck

quote: Do not envy the success of any person. But set your goal on a successful guy. Then this will make you succeed.
author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

quote: To get it doneand see it thru,find less to sayand more to do.
author: William F. Scolavino

quote: A great attitude toward your approach to an interview—demonstrated by your good posture—is everything.
author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

quote: Our preoccupation with goals, results, and the quick fix has separated us from our own experiences.
author: Philip Wang

quote: Working conditions at the computer and long seated sessions can lead to weakness and pronounced posture problems.
author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

quote: Posture and Social Status...During the 18th century in European and American society, aspects including station in life, status and dress could easily identify those of financial means. In fact, the garments of this era would hold the wearer in a position that would support and require proper posture. Women, and sometimes men, wore stays in order to shape the torso. Among the more privileged, even children wore stays since people believed these improved their posture and enhanced straight spinal growth. Certain movements were constrained by the cut and design of many garments, including details of the sleeve and back that would hold the person in proper posture.
author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

quote: It is still relevant today to project a confident image through good body posture.
author: Andrzej Sapkowski, Wieża Jaskółki

quote: Good posture is important for health reasons, as well as for your appearance, because it reflects your personal attitude.
author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

quote: God determines the goals of the prosperity before giving prosperity to His children.
author: Richard Foth, A Trip Around the Sun: Turning Your Everyday Life Into the Adventure of a Lifetime

quote: To avoid the cost incurred in pursuing great things we opt for ease and blithely abandon great things. The sheer recklessness of such a pathetically apathetic trade-off will eventually cost us a life squandered, which in the end is the greatest cost of all.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: the only realistic choice is to follow your dreams
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Stop using, "easier said than done", as an excuse to not change! Bringing your life to a higher level is challenging; get over it and rise to the challenge!
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: The denial of assistance is sometimes the greatest assistance. The trick is recognizing when this is the case.
author: Windston Churchill

quote: Imagine what your life would be like if you were completely uninhibited by fear, pride, or procrastination. What would you be capable of? Anything.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway

quote: Better to write for yourself and have no public, than to write for the public and have no self." - "Meglio scrivere per se stessi e non avere un pubblico piuttosto che scrivere per gli altri e non essere se stessi".
author: Sarah Kay, The Type

quote: One who knows the Self, knows God.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: When you fall in love, do not fall out of yourself.
author: Mouloud Benzadi

quote: Who am I, when all I’ve ever believed myself to be, is fading before my very eyes?Am I still me, or just a shadow of what I used to be?Was I just an illusion that lived only in my head?Did I paint myself as something more than I really am?And with all these changes in my life… What will be left of the woman who dreamed her dreams?When all the colors that she wrapped herself with… are slowly being stripped away…Copyright © Eeva Lancaster
author: Larry McMurtry, Lonesome Dove

quote: Great faith, Great spirit.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: The more you die to self on daily basis, the more you enjoy life.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: I see myself through others eyes and I am made anew.
author: Avital Ronell

quote: one bothers oneself for nothing.
author: Joy Manne, Was the Buddha a Shaman?

quote: Realize you have awesome people around you who want to love you. Let them. Show them you love them back. (Actions trump words.) Do the forgiveness thing. If necessary-and it almost always is- do the forgiveness thing on yourself.
author: Rebecca Solnit, The Faraway Nearby

quote: Secrets are revealed as you are ready to understand them. It seems capricious and mean-spirited of the Grimmerie to hold back, to yield and then to tease with a single page – but then the world is the same way, isn’t it. The world rarely shrieks its meaning at you. It whispers, in private language and obscure modalities, in arcane and quixotic imagery, through symbol systems in which every element has multiple meanings determined by juxtaposition.
author: Gregory Maguire, Out of Oz

quote: That old woman taught me my catechism!" said the young man; and there was a world of meaning in this simple comment.
author: Will Advise, Nothing is here...

quote: One knew nothing. One lived and walked about on the earth or rode through the forests, and so many things looked at one with such challenge and promise, rousing such longing: an evening star, a bluebell, a lake green with reeds, the eye of a human being or of a cow, and at times it seemed as if the very next moment something never seen but long yearned for must happen, as if a veil must drop from everything. But then it passed, and nothing happened, and the riddle was not solved, nor was the secret spell lifted, and finally one became old... and perhaps one still knew nothing, would still be waiting and listening.
author: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: You were almost like a haiku: said so little, but meant so much.
author: David Cronenberg, Consumed

quote: God is the inevitability of humanity’s search for true meaning.
author: Richard House, The Kills

quote: Crossing the Rubicon of absolute pain is the only journey of purpose and meaning in life.
author: Daniel Waterman, Entheogens, Society and Law: The Politics of Consciousness, Autonomy and Responsibility

quote: The bond that attaches us to the life outside ourselves is the same bond that holds us to our own life.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

quote: There is something stunningly narrow about how the Anthropic Principle is phrased. Yes, only certain laws and constants of nature are consistent with our kind of life. But essentially the same laws and constants are required to make a rock. So why not talk about a Universe designed so rocks could one day come to be, and strong and weak Lithic Principles? If stones could philosophize, I imagine Lithic Principles would be at the intellectual frontiers.
author: but one actually puts one shoulder to the plough

quote: Love, Hope, and Reverence are realities of a different order from the senses, but they are positive and constant facts, always active, always working out mighty changes in human life.
author: Avakruth

quote: Just as the soul animates the body, so, in a way, meaning breathes life into a word.
author: Cory Basil, Skinny Dipping in Daylight

quote: My self-esteem is not tied to the approval of others.
author: Katrina Denise

quote: If the pursuit of perfection is a way to prove our worth, in the end the pursuit will only prove our imperfections.
author: Inio Asano, Goodnight Punpun Omnibus (2-in-1 Edition), Vol. 1

quote: It’s when you feel low about yourself, others actions and opinions will affect you. When you look at yourself as a confident person, it’s then; you’ll find the most peace and understanding, that it’s your world you have to live with not theirs.
author: Eric Christopher Jackson

quote: Sacredness is spirituality.
author: Kate Lattey, Triple Bar

quote: Nobody can help you as much as you can help yourself.
author: Josephine Myles, How to Train Your Dom in Five Easy Steps

quote: Self-hatred is the best vehicle for making people do as they’re told because they are hungry to get approval.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: Sacred-soul, sacred life.
author: R. Price

quote: Hold yourself in great esteem.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Be confident, be bold!
author: Ikechukwu Joseph, Knowledge, Understanding, Wisdom: The Tripartite Force in the Pursuit of Divine Access

quote: The strangest thing was, as beautiful as I found her to be, she admitted that she wasn’t always comfortable in her own skin. I found that hard to believe until she explained herself. All of the sudden I was not so much in awe of her but found myself empathizing with her.
author: Michele Jennae, CHARGE! The Patchwork Rhino

quote: The best way to reach your destination is to just keep going until you get there.
author: Hannah Brencher, If You Find This Letter: My Journey to Find Purpose Through Hundreds of Letters to Strangers

quote: How do you get rid of unhappiness? You must release yourself from the prison you have unknowingly placed yourself in. Come to terms with the fact that there are things that you cannot control. But, just because you don’t ‘control’ something, doesn’t mean it’s going to fall to pieces. That may be the hardest part. We get bent out of shape when something happens that is out of our control, because we don’t understand why it’s happening or where it’s coming from. It’s unsettling. You put your fighting arms up and prepare to battle the world. But, stop for a moment. Think. Where are all of these things coming from?The world is not a wild, untamed place, where things are a free for all. Understand that there is a higher power running the world.
author: Claire Cook, Must Love Dogs

quote: The most stable, and therefore, the most healthy self-esteem is based on deserved respect from others rather than on external fame or celebrity and unwarranted adulation.
author: Karen E. Quinones Miller

quote: I realize that I don’t know where to start. Not because I’m unsure of my story, but because I’m not sure why I feel compelled to tell it in the first place. What can be achieved by unearthing the past?
author: Colleen Hoover, Never Never: Part Three

quote: There are some things in the past that… that just aren’t meant to be viewed.
author: Melita Tessy, Battle of the Spheres: Crust, Mantle and Core

quote: I like you, Mallory. And God knows you deserve a hell of a lot better than me.” He dipped his chin, laughing as he thrust his hand through his hair. “God. I suck at this. Can we just forget—”I snapped out of it. “You like me?”His gaze flew to mine. “Yeah, I do. And I know I’ve been with Paige and I’m not going to pretend that meant nothing, but it’s not how I feel for you. Not remotely like how I feel for you. And it’s not because of our past—because of you and I knowing each other for so long,” he said, and the words kept coming out in a rush. “At first, I thought that was why—this attraction I have to you. I thought it was because of everything we’d shared. And then the night I came to your place and you fixed me up, I thought it was just this physical thing.” Pink raced across his cheeks. “And it is most definitely a physical thing, but it wasn’t just that. I think part of me knew that from the very first time you said my name.”Now my pulse was pounding. He liked-liked me. Oh my God, this was unexpected. This was totally unplanned. It was an infinite, vast sea of un
author: Kayla Krantz, Survive at Midnight

quote: Sometimes the only way to move forward is to revisit the things in your past that were holding you back. You have to deal with them head on, no matter how scary they may be. Because once we do, you will see that you can go further than you ever imagined.
author: Mansi Laus Deo

quote: There were so many wrongs piling up on both sides, so much of the past being dragged into the present, that living there was like carving the story of your life on to a sepulchral monument.
author: Robert Hellenga, Philosophy Made Simple

quote: There have been times, lately, when I dearly wished that I could change the past. Well, I can’t, but I can change the present, so that when it becomes the past it will turn out to be a past worth having.
author: ideaswar

quote: Suffering is the common lot of man.
author: V.E. Schwab, A Conjuring of Light

quote: On the ward there was hurt and pain so big and so deep that speech could not express it. I had been interested in philosophy, and suddenly philosophy came alive for me, for here the basic questions of human existence were not abstractions: they were embodied in human suffering
author: Lisa Cypers Kamen, Are We Happy Yet?: Eight Keys to Unlocking a Joyful Life

quote: One of the primary purposes of suffering is not to weaken the heart of the feeble, but to strengthen the spirit of the brave.
author: Rick Yancey, The Last Star

quote: I often wonder if I am entitled to be as happy as I am, given the amount of suffering in the world.
author: Matthew Prior

quote: Till thou hast learned to suffer from a saint a well as from the wicked, and to be abused by the godly as well as the ungodly, never look to live a contented or comfortable life, nor ever think thou has truly learned the art of suffering (383).
author: Griselda Gambaro, Information for Foreigners: Three Plays

quote: Even creative nonviolence can go unnoticed unless participants are attacked.
author: Abraham Low

quote: As night goes round the Earth always there are hundreds of thousands of people who should be sleeping, lying awake, fearing a bully, fearing a cruel competition, dreading lest they cannot make good, ill of some illness they cannot comprehend, distressed by some irrational quarrel, maddened by some thwarted instinct or some suppressed perverted desire.
author: Ayn Rand, The Fountainhead

quote: But she was so happy in her gilded cage, wasn’t she? She ate well, slept well, enjoyed herself She lacked nothing. And then, look, a bunch of mental cases turn her away from her happiness and send her to -- how did you put it? -- to ‘blow herself away’?. The good doctor lives next door to a war but he doesn’t want to hear a word about it. And he thinks his wife shouldn’t worry about it, either. … We’re at war. Some people take up arms; others twiddle their thumbs. And still others make a killing in the name of the Cause. That’s life. … Your wife chose her side. The happiness you offered her smelled of decay. It repulsed her, you get it? She didn’t want your happiness. She couldn’t work on her suntan while her people were bent under the Zionist yoke. Do I have to draw you a picture to make you understand, or do you refuse to look reality in the face?
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Bad is so bad, that we cannot but think good an accident; good is so good, that we feel certain that evil could be explained.
author: Jennifer Starzec

quote: Jesus says we are blessed when we are hated, ostracized, insulted, and ridiculed on earth, because of Him.
author: Lily Koppel, The Red Leather Diary: Reclaiming a Life Through the Pages of a Lost Journal

quote: All your troubles, struggles, pains and suffering is worth one good thing.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Your pain is reminding you that the gift of life is tender and precious. Suffering cuts to the quick of aliveness.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: The soul that loves and suffers is in the sublime state.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway

quote: Light fell, and so did my confidence.
author: Brittany Williams

quote: True self confidence happens when you stop blaming others for not seeing what you love about yourself. Not everyone has the same list of needs.
author: Maria Flynn

quote: When it comes to your looks, the only option in this world that matters is yours.
author: Miya Yamanouchi, Embrace Your Sexual Self: A Practical Guide for Women

quote: Quality brings security and confidence
author: Lorna Jackie Wilson, Black Butterfly: The Journey - The Victory

quote: Often, our relationships become an unrealized quest for what is perfect, unfettered, and free of flaws. We expect our partners, spouses, and our friends to avoid missteps and to be magical mind readers. These secret expectations play a sinister part in many of the great tragedies of our lives: failed marriages, dissipated dreams, abandoned careers, outcast family, deserted children, and discarded friendships.We readily forget what we once knew as children: our flaws are not only natural but integral to our beings. They are interwoven into our soul’s DNA and yet we continually reject the crooked, wrinkled, mushy parts of our life rather than embrace them as the very essence of our beings.I once believed that aiming for perfection would land me in the realm of excellence. This, however, may not be the trajectory of how things happen. In fact, the pursuit of perfection may be the biggest obstacle to becoming whole.It seems essential to value hard work and determination and yet recognize that the road to excellence is littered with mistakes and subsequent lessons. Imperfection and excellence are intertwined. There is joy in our pain, strength in weakness, courage in compassion, and power in forgiveness.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Those who are weak, never suck the blood of the enemy, as it is to be done with strength.
author: Humanity needs more moments of confidence.

quote: Probe deeply enough, under the slickest façade of confidence, and you tapped a vein of self-doubt or a hidden fear. Irrational fears and baseless doubts, many of them, but that was precisely why constant reassurance was necessary to the human animal.
author: Somya Kedia

quote: The ability for a person to operate satisfactorily in a thing is dependent on how much he knows about that thing. Ignorance is a major cause of inability.
author: David     Pratt, Looking After Joey

quote: Embracing your true self radiates a natural beauty that cannot be diluted or ignored. Confident, powerful, untamable, badass you!
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: Step forward out of your own lingering residual sense of smallness, take up every inch of life that is your blessed inheritance, and DO YOUR THING.
author: Dan Florence, Zombies Love Pizza

quote: A boy has other people do the talking for him
author: Katie McGarry, Dare You To

quote: In its essence, faith is a confidence in the person of Jesus Christ and in His power, so that even when His power does not serve my end, my confidence in Him remains because of who He is.
author: Bryant McGill, Voice of Reason

quote: Invest in yourself. Invest in self-discipline. Invest in self-satisfaction. Have complete control over your own thoughts and convictions, and never stop aiming to outdo yourself.
author: Lionel Suggs

quote: No one is a failure until that is the only definition of themselves that they are willing to see within.
author: Kevin Leman, The Firstborn Advantage: Making Your Birth Order Work for You

quote: Today’s experience prepares you for a better tomorrow.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough, An Intimate Collision: Encounters with Life and Jesus

quote: There is no faster way to harden my determination than to assume I will fail at it.
author: Abhishek Ratna, No Parking. No Halt. Success Non Stop!

quote: Don’t stop when you fail. Instead, use your failures to measure your level of success.
author: Garth Risk Hallberg, City on Fire

quote: If you fail, never give up. Keep trying, you will succeed.
author: E.M. Forster, A Passage to India

quote: Failure is a bruise. Not a tattoo.
author: Sivaprakash Sidhu

quote: As a leader, I am there to make the best decisions possible with the evidence at hand and to be able to justify that decision. If it goes wrong, we add to the evidence for making the next decision, but there is no reason for regretting failure, as failure is just the production of evidence.
author: Cameron C. Taylor, Does Your Bag Have Holes? 24 Truths That Lead to Financial and Spiritual Freedom

quote: When we go to the fair in disguise, we never win at archery or at singlestick. We do get some nice compliments on our disguises, but no more than that.
Within a month he knew that his marriage was a failure
author: Victor L. Wooten, The Music Lesson: A Spiritual Search for Growth Through Music

quote: Trying is fine. Failing is inevitable. Don’t let it devour you.
author: Donna Lynn Hope

quote: Overcast does not always forecast rain neither does difficulty always forecast failure.
author: always move forward.

quote: There are times in our lives when we labor so hard, for so long, that it may feel that we have nothing to show for it. That we have failed. We get discouraged, because we don’t achieve what we yearned for or anticipated.But a lack of desired results doesn’t mean we failed…it means we have locked our sights on the end result, instead of focusing on the process itself.No one can guarantee your success.What you can do, however, is consistently act—progressing towards your goals, so that your chances of success grows exponentially with each step you take.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Ignore failure. Try anew until you succeed.
author: Tim Fargo

quote: If you are afraid to fail, then you are afraid to succeed.
author: Anita Diamant, Good Harbor

quote: The road of life is paved with daily successes, a great number of them penny and nickle triumphs. Sadly, these little feats are often seen as worthless―even failures―because we dream of greater gain. Our greed keeps us focused on a gleaming pot of gold waiting at the end of some elusive rainbow. And, despairing a big loss, we fail to see the value in small achievements.
author: Lorii Myers, No Excuses, The Fit Mind-Fit Body Strategy Book

quote: For your heart to be filled with God’s love is to forgive easily
author: Virginia Alison

quote: God has unlimited resources. Ask him for what you desire.
author: Julie Miller, Kansas City Secrets

quote: If you desire to be rich with joy, you have to be truly dedicated to God and His work.
author: Anne Carson

quote: You know what?” he whispered, out of breath, “You’re about to be in a whole lot of trouble. We probably better go.
author: Rainbow Rowell, Landline

quote: Happiness is there where wants and needs are small, but the desire to give is big.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To be a poet is a love affair, not a desire to dare.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The intelligent desire self-control
author: Dannika Dark, Impulse

quote: I’m a reporter,” Rachel said. “I write about the arts, festivals, new projects in the city. What I’m not is some kind of psychic astral traveler! How did I get here? Planning a trip to another dimension?
author: Karen Katchur, The Secrets of Lake Road

quote: You can make a text mean anything, especially if it’s old and full of ambiguities.
author: Jim Butcher, Proven Guilty

quote: It was the freedom to experiment that made this experiment called Freedom possible.
author: Beth Yarnall, Wake Up Maggie

quote: I was beginning to agree with the thesis that some truths were better off dead.And buried.
author: Simona Panova, Nightmarish Sacrifice

quote: Personal development is an ever-evolving process of making more and better distinctions about who you are and what you want.
author: Brandon Nankivell

quote: All levels of ascension involve letting go of things that hold you back.
author: Marianne Williamson, A Return to Love: Reflections on the Principles of "A Course in Miracles"

quote: Working consciously with the Divine Map of Transformation aligns you to the Earth and the Heavens, to your soul purpose and your personal individuation, to your inner growth and external manifestation.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Self-development is a way of Life. Our Self-Development never ends. We are never too young or too old for personal growth.We have an amazing potential to reach our highest potential, to have truly inspiring careers and loving relationships.Unfortunately, often we walk through our lives asleep, we let our habits rule us, and find it difficult to change our beliefs. Recognizing the power of our Mind and the power of our Soul, learning the art of Concentration and Love, we are learning to Live with the Flow, not against it. It is in our nature to learn and grow. For happiness we need to learn to Love, we need to learn to Concentrate and we should keep the flow and energy of inspiration within our lives.
author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana, Sweet Destiny
