quote: A book, for the Sufis, is an instrument as much as it is something to give information.
author: Idries Shah, Learning How to Learn: Psychology and Spirituality in the Sufi Way

quote: The spirit is the mirror
author: Idries Shah, The Dermis Probe

quote: Have the nature of a dervish: then wear a stylish cap.
author: Idries Shah, Caravan of Dreams

quote: As Ibn Arabi says: ‘Absolute existence is the source of all existence’.
author: Idries Shah, Caravan of Dreams

quote: Each flies with its own kind: pigeon with pigeon, hawk with hawk.
author: Idries Shah, The Way of the Sufi

quote: A stolen kiss is not easily returned.
author: Idries Shah, Caravan of Dreams

quote: You make me a sinner if you stop me giving you hospitality.
author: Idries Shah, Caravan of Dreams

quote: The power of Allah: no sound, no shape, no form. But when it manifests, none can resist it.
author: Idries Shah, The Way of the Sufi

quote: Sufism is experience, and hence not to be defined – imprisoned – in perennial, static categories.
author: Idries Shah

quote: THE BIRD AND THE WATERA bird which has not heard of fresh waterDips his beak in salt-water year after year.(Anwar-i-Suhaili)
author: Idries Shah, The Dermis Probe

quote: When there is a true or useful thing, there is sure to be a counterfeit.
author: Idries Shah, Sufi Thought and Action

quote: If you cannot sit on a throne like a king, seize, like a tent-pitcher, the rope of the Royal tent.
author: Idries Shah, The Commanding Self

quote: None meets harm who knows his capacity.
author: Idries Shah

quote: If you are covetous, you are a prisoner: If you are greedy, you will never be filled.
author: Idries Shah

quote: The Apparent is the Bridge to the Real
author: Idries Shah, The Dermis Probe

quote: Better to quarrel with a friend than to support enemies.
author: Idries Shah

quote: The means through which people may perceive Truth have forms
author: Idries Shah, A Perfumed Scorpion

quote: A book, for the Sufis, is an instrument as much as it is something to give information....The key is the teacher.
author: Idries Shah, The Commanding Self

quote: One lie will keep out forty truths.
author: Idries Shah

quote: Generosity is also marked by doing what one says one will do.
author: Idries Shah

quote: Counsels of BahaudinYou want to be filled. But something which is full has first to be emptied. Empty yourself so that you will fill properly, by observing these counsels, which you can do as duties to yourself:FirstNever follow any impulse to teach, however strong it might be. The command to teach is not felt as an impulsion.
author: Idries Shah, Reflections

quote: Sufism, the "secret tradition," is not available on the basis of assumptions which belong to another world, the world of intellect.
author: Idries Shah, The Pleasantries of the Incredible Mulla Nasrudin

quote: The would-be students wish to transcend books.But, ask yourselves: if someone says that books do not contain wisdom, and yet he writes books; books do not contain Sufism, and yet he continues to publish books on Sufism, what is really happening? It really is your duty, and not mine, to ask and to find the answer to that question, if you are interested enough.
author: Idries Shah, Reflections

quote: Some day you will be old enough to start reading fairy tales again.
author: J.D. Salinger, The Catcher in the Rye

quote: Maturing is realizing how many things don’t require your comment.
author: Cassandra Parkin, The Beach Hut

quote: I knew that I did not want to go to that juvenile diversion program because I had an intuitive sense that it would turn me irrevocably into the kind of character that I was now only rehearsing to be.
author: David Bennun, Tick Bite Fever

quote: The only thing that keeps me going, is the desire to get away as far as possible.
author: Maggie Stiefvater, The Scorpio Races

quote: Our parents thought we might be corrupted by one another into becoming whatever it was they most feared: an incorrigible masturbator, a winsome homosexual, a recklessly impregnatory libertine. On our behalf they dreaded the closeness of adolescent friendship, the predatory behaviour of strangers on trains, the lure of the wrong kind of girl. How far their anxieties outran our experience.
author: Shweta Ganesh Kumar, A Newlywed’s Adventures in Married Land

quote: He knew, but it was not enough. The sorrow was so large it threatened to tear through my skin. When he died, all things swift and beautiful and bright would be buried with him.
author: Sarah J. Maas, A Court of Thorns and Roses

quote: Christ is with you. Do not abandon Him and He will not abandon you. You will see great sorrow, and in that sorrow you will be happy. This is my last message to you: in sorrow seek happiness. Work, work unceasingly.
author: Michael Tianias

quote: Anybody who predicts the death of cities has already met his spouse.
author: Elizabeth Jane Howard, Mr. Wrong

quote: It was only when I started to be myself that the music started to flow and people started to listen.
author: Mani S. Sivasubramanian, The Icedrop

quote: In the aftermath of destruction, a silence settles – the stillness of fresh loss. People’s cheerful chatter is fainter, the blue color of sky dimmer; now that horror is undeniable and feels inescapable, the value of life seems lessened.
author: Magda Szubanski, Reckoning: A Memoir

quote: I needed only to allow myself to know what I already knew.
author: Aspen Matis, Girl in the Woods: A Memoir

quote: These tools were my parents’ way of saying: What you’re doing is important. We support it. We want to help you find your way.
author: Aspen Matis, Girl in the Woods: A Memoir

quote: It was my first lesson in the fragility of attraction.
author: Aspen Matis, Girl in the Woods: A Memoir

quote: I was beginning to feel compassion for myself.
author: Aspen Matis, Girl in the Woods: A Memoir

quote: I realized that no, no one would actually come to save or even stop me, I had absolutely no choice. The scale tipped: the moment not doing it became more difficult and unbearable than just doing it.
author: Aspen Matis, Girl in the Woods: A Memoir

quote: Popeye the Sailor Man has more cultural longevity. Only women and poofs read or write now. Otherwise, these days, no sooner has someone been sodomised by a close relative than they think they can write a memoir. The game’s up.
author: Aspen Matis, Girl in the Woods: A Memoir

quote: Poetry": What kind of art assumes the dislike of its audience and what kind of artist aligns herself with that dislike, even encourages it? An art hated from without and within.
author: China Cancio, THE SOUL: Poems of Life

quote: Every criminal would be an artist if he had the talent, and every artist would become a criminal if he had the guts.
author: Cameron Conaway, Caged: Memoirs of a Cage-Fighting Poet

quote: I climbed into my car and started to head home, my visor down against the glare of the sun. But at the last minute, I turned left, because I never had before, and because I had time to go down different road.
author: Paul Bamikole

quote: Rights and empowerment are interconnected: unless a substantial number of women in a community come to believe that they have rights and demand to exercise them, right remains an abstraction.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: To say that an idea is fashionable is to say, I think, that it has been adulterated to a point where it is hardly an idea at all.
author: Antonin Sertillanges

quote: Ideas tyrannize the man who has but few.
author: George Orwell, 1984

quote: Many a time, we let go of some really good ideas just because we feel they are too controversial.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: It is in the combination of words and visuals that the magic of understanding often happens.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: I noticed that religion gave some people a way to escape dealing with the world: “Things will be better when you die,” the people of my grandma’s generation said as they worked themselves to death. “God wants you to forgive and love those who do you wrong,” some people said to shake off the shame of being unable to respond to the abuse they endured. The holier-than-thou faction found comfort in believing, “The rest of y’all are lost because you don’t have a personal relationship with God—our God.” But art engages you in the world, not just the world around you but the big world, and not just the big world of Tokyo and Sydney and Johannesburg, but the bigger world of ideas and concepts and feelings of history and humanity.
author: John Maynard Keynes

quote: Public opinion is to an unconventional idea … what abortion is to sperm.
author: Anirudh Arun, The Steadfast Tin Soldier?

quote: There is no battle or engagement with any institution, company or government; it is always an engagement of ideas.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Reality, at first glance, is a simple thing: the television speaking to you now is real. Your body sunk into that chair in the approach to midnight, a clock ticking at the threshold of awareness. All the endless detail of a solid and material world surrounding you. These things exist. They can be measured with a yardstick, a voltammeter, a weighing scale. These things are real. Then there’s the mind, half-focused on the TV, the settee, the clock. This ghostly knot of memory, idea and feeling that we call ourself also exists, though not within the measurable world our science may describe.Consciousness is unquantifiable, a ghost in the machine, barely considered real at all, though in a sense this flickering mosaic of awareness is the only true reality that we can ever know. The Here-and-Now demands attention, is more present to us. We dismiss the inner world of our ideas as less important, although most of our immediate physical reality originated only in the mind. The TV, sofa, clock and room, the whole civilisation that contains them once were nothing save ideas.Material existence is entirely founded on a phantom realm of mind, whose nature and geography are unexplored. Before the Age of Reason was announced, humanity had polished strategies for interacting with the world of the imaginary and invisible: complicated magic-systems; sprawling pantheons of gods and spirits, images and names with which we labelled powerful inner forces so that we might better understand them. Intellect, Emotion and Unconscious Thought were made divinities or demons so that we, like Faust, might better know them; deal with them; become them.Ancient cultures did not worship idols. Their god-statues represented ideal states which, when meditated constantly upon, one might aspire to. Science proves there never was a mermaid, blue-skinned Krishna or a virgin birth in physical reality. Yet thought is real, and the domain of thought is the one place where gods inarguably ezdst, wielding tremendous power. If Aphrodite were a myth and Love only a concept, then would that negate the crimes and kindnesses and songs done in Love’s name? If Christ were only ever fiction, a divine Idea, would this invalidate the social change inspired by that idea, make holy wars less terrible, or human betterment less real, less sacred?The world of ideas is in certain senses deeper, truer than reality; this solid television less significant than the Idea of television. Ideas, unlike solid structures, do not perish. They remain immortal, immaterial and everywhere, like all Divine things. Ideas are a golden, savage landscape that we wander unaware, without a map.Be careful: in the last analysis, reality may be exactly what we think it is.
author: Richard Paul Evans, Lost December

quote: An ethical idealist, a person whom embraces the honorable philosophy of ethical idealism, performs acts that are honest, pure, and righteous regardless of their fearfulness.
author: Lao Tzu, Tao Te Ching

quote: Now to exert oneself and work for the sake of amusement seems silly and utterly childish. But to amuse oneself in order that one may exert oneself, as Anacharsis puts it, seems right; for amusement is a sort of relaxation, and we need relaxation because we cannot work continuously. Relaxation, then, is not an end; for it is taken for the sake of activity.
author: John Irving, In One Person

quote: When people get into their 30s plus "boyfriend" sounds weird...if you really think about it. Instead, I think we should universally start using the term "manfriend" or "snookie bookie cuddles pie".
author: Lola Salt, The Extraordinary Life of Lara Craft

quote: He who grows not in the knowledge of Jesus, refuses to be blessed.
author: Eugene H. Peterson, Tell It Slant: A Conversation on the Language of Jesus in His Stories and Prayers

quote: There is nothing Christ dislikes more than for His people to make a showpiece of Him and not to use Him.
author: Thurston Clarke, The Last Campaign: Robert F. Kennedy and 82 Days That Inspired America

quote: The farther you get from the actual historical person of Jesus and His time, the more the church knows about Jesus and understand more deeply the truth of the Scriptures. We know more of the truth of Jesus the Risen Lord and His Word because we have been the recipients of more than 2000 years of faith, of life lived in the power of the Spirit and the Word in our midst. The power of of the presence of the Risen Lord is not static, but dynamic, and growing ever stronger as the kingdom of the earth comes more into its fullness in time and place. It is an awesome thought that calls us to responsibility and gratefulness for having been given the gift from those who have gone before us in faith. It is our privilege and inheritance, which we must be sure to pass on to those who come after us, in forms that are ever richer, more expressive and inclusive of others.
author: Megan McKenna, And Morning Came: Scriptures of the Resurrection

quote: Self Mastery is the ability to maneuver through life without the mind or emotional attachment. It is being a mindfully present observer instead of the mind identified perceiver.
author: Robert Greene, Mastery

quote: The master in us all lives behind the masks and roles and wounds and beliefs. It calls us to live deep, full, radical lives. It asks us not to wait until we are told by anyone that we have arrived. It invites us forward, across the line of fear and unworthiness, to experience mastery in this moment--as much as we can right now. To learn from stumbling. To rise again and keep walking until we no longer notice our feet in their effortless dance. But mostly not to wait until some distant, perfect someday. Mastery is now.
author: Batuhan Ibal

quote: Commoditization is the enemy of meaning. In ages dominated by the forces of commoditization, individuals pay the price with devalued lives. by contrast, unique skills requiring mastery and expertise, like the skills of a brain surgeon, are safe from the threat of commoditization.
author: Robert Farrar Capon, The Supper of the Lamb: A Culinary Reflection

quote: It is education that grows flowers in innocent minds to reveal beauty.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: All I want to do is to find the joy of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Every moment in our lives brings the opportunity to love and appreciate this beautiful magical life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You will not be rewarded for your good nature. Your good nature is your reward.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Face the fear with face up,and fear will melt away.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Wisdom to accept change creates life, but conformity creates stagnation and leads to death.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If you cannot find beauty in the midst of ugliness to find heaven on earth, you will not be able to find heaven in space.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Wisdom reveals the beauty of the mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Problems are not roadblocks, but exercise tools.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Love the world as the mother loves her little child.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Your mission on earth is to transform, transcend and transpire.

quote: By taking systematic actions and by focusing on beauty, for sure we can change our society.
author: by hoarding we feel poor.

quote: In an age of complexity, it is not easy to live a simple life or to practice simplicity.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Shine as if you are the sun.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When you have true love in your heart,You will never be depressed or fall apart.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: O fire, O soulGive us the spark of God-eternal,That friend to friend and friend to foe,One shall we stand before HIM.And the flame of Jatin,And the fire of Bhagath,And the love of the Mahatma in all,O, lift the flag high,Lift the flag high,This is the flag of the Revolution.
author: Raja Rao, Kanthapura: Indian Novel

quote: Your path will shine when you shine on your path!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: The moment you think that there is no path before you, path disappears! The moment you think the opposite, path appears! All paths need people who see them!
author: Buddhist proverb

quote: Your habits guide and sculpt your path. The same process that builds habits can break habits.
author: you just return back and walk!

quote: Make it your mission to encourage everyone who crosses your path.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: For pilgrims walking...every footfall is doubled, landing at once on the actual road and also on the path of faith.
author: Inio Asano, Solanin

quote: A lost road will remember your footsteps because someday you may want to return, tracing the way.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: The path to tranquility gets through the storms!
author: Tanmaya Guru

quote: The rogue has suffered much. He needs someone to remind him of why he once believed in a good path...

quote: I know where I come from, where I am now and where the wish to go.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The nicest thing about being lost is that you get rid of the fear of losing your path!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: However, Heaven can only show you the way. You must walk the path yourself.
author: Sten Nadolny, Die Entdeckung der Langsamkeit

quote: I hope you remember that if you encounter an obstacle on the road, don’t think of it as an obstacle at all… think of it as a challenge to find a new path on the road less traveled.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Not by refraining from action does man attain freedom from action. Not by mere renunciation does he attain supreme perfection.
author: Fakeer Ishavardas

quote: Truth in, untruth out. Seek thus, within-without
author: Fakeer Ishavardas

quote: He was just about to turn the light off, when there was a heavy, “Tappety, tap, tappety, tap,” on the door. It was the kind of loud sound that could only be made with a hoof. A moose’s hoof, that is." - Snugs The Snow Bear
author: M.Rehan Behleem

quote: ...Everything that’s not asexual has two sexes, male and female. Most of the time it takes one of each to reproduce. Then there’s the whiptail lizard. This is a lizard that lives way the fuck out there in the middle of the desert, and sometimes it’s hard to find another lizard to mate with out there. Therefore, what the female whiptail can do is sort of make her eggs start dividing on their own. She makes daughters, clones of herself. It’s called parthenogenesis.
author: Amy  Miller, Beyond Companionship: Connecting with Kindred Souls of Animal Companions.

quote: God gave man the authority to rule and protect all the animals in the aquatic ecosystems.
author: Irvine Welsh

quote: Humans and animals regard each other across a gulf of mutual incomprehension. With aliens, that has to go double.
author: Linda Bender

quote: Animals remind us that all beings who walk, stand, swim, crawl, or fly are radiant, mysterious, and unique expressions of the Source. Every species, every culture, has it’s own genius.
author: Wanda Buckner, Choosing Energy Therapy: A Practical Guide to Healing Options for People and Animals

quote: It is better to be still than to speak when you are angry.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If we knew all the answers, we won’t ask questions.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: It is better to experience than to be told. But it is wiser to learn from the great sacred-souls.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Whatever you sow, you shall reap. It is better to sow good deeds; love, goodness and kindness.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Money cannot buy love.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Search the truth for yourself.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: It is better to pray about everything than worry about nothing.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: We encountered many hardships. With hope, we find the strength to endure.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: No one who has hope will ever be cut off.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Fall in love with life. We are here on earth for a while.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Love me for who I am.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: We give thanks to Lord God Almighty.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The bond of love is divine.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Be patient and wait for due harvest.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Great spirit, Great soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: When intelligence shuts a door, wisdom opens a window.
author: Angelo Tsanatelis, Scarred

quote: For God has not given us the spirit of fear;but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind. -2 Timothy 1: 7 (NKJV)
author: Shelley Lubben, Truth Behind the Fantasy of Porn: The Greatest Illusion on Earth

quote: Because I first trusted God, I no longer worried if Garrett would leave me. Because the foundation of my trust was in the God of creation and not in a human, I was free to love, enjoy and even make mistakes in my relationships. Whether I made the mistake or Garrett did, together we knew it was all covered under the Cross of Jesus Christ. God had already forgiven us for past, current and even future sins. Because we accepted by faith the sacrifice of His Son Jesus, we were allowed the freedom to grow in every area of our life, especially our marriage!
author: Bunny Naidu

quote: A Christian sits in his or her well and thinks that the whole world is his or her well. The Jew sits in his or her little well and thinks that it is the whole world. A Muslim sits cooped up in his or her tiny well and believes it to be the whole universe. The same goes for a Hindu and all others.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: You can reach the roof of your house by stone stairs, by wooden stairs, by bamboo steps or by a rope. Likewise, there are diverse ways of experiencing the Absolute Divinity – the Ultimate Oneness. In fact, in that blissful state of oneness, you and God are one and the same thing.
author: Abhijit Naskar, In Search of Divinity: Journey to The Kingdom of Conscience

quote: The second, first thought.
author: Paula Pinto

quote: The sooner growing older is stripped of reflexive dread, the better equipped we are to benefit from the countless ways in which it can enrich us.
author: Danielle Rocco, Labeled Love

quote: The poorest people sometimes have the richest minds.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: It must be tempered with discipline. Ferocity is useless unless employed in the proper place . . .
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: Humans without humanity, A world of dread and fear for eternity.
author: Matt Haig, The Humans

quote: What do you do with humans? You eat from them just a little, if they are delicious. You delight in their flesh sometimes, if they are not tedious.
author: J.B.Alves

quote: Work while you can. But avoid overwork
author: Dan Groat, Monarchs and Mendicants

quote: Every child knows its mother, Dany thought. When the seas go dry and the mountains blow in the wind like leaves.
author: Joseph G. Peterson, Wanted: Elevator Man

quote: It is easier to fall off of a ladder than to climb one.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Dont lower your standards for anyone or anything. Self respect is everything.
author: L.J. Vanier

quote: For, occupied incessantly with the consideration of the limits prescribed to their power by nature, they [philosophers of former times] became so entirely convinced that nothing was at their disposal except their own thoughts, that this conviction was of itself sufficient to prevent their entertaining any desire of other objects; and over their thoughts they acquired a sway so absolute, that they had some ground on this account for esteeming themselves more rich and more powerful, more free and more happy, than other men who, whatever be the favors heaped on them by nature and fortune, if destitute of this philosophy, can never command the realization of all their desires.
author: Steven Magee, Curing Electromagnetic Hypersensitivity

quote: People that do not have a vision or dream for their life will be the ones that will try to talk you out of yours.
author: Sravani Saha Nakhro

quote: Because anyone who thinks there is something wrong with being gay is like those people you read about in History who believed it segregation.
author: Mark Crutchfield, The Last Best Gift: Eye Witnesses to the Celebrity Sabbath Massacre

quote: It was the year Frankie thought about the world. And she did not see it as a round school globe, with the countries neat and different-colored. She thought of the world as huge and cracked and looseand turning a thousand miles an hour.
author: Jon Krakauer, Into the Wild

quote: Work is part of school.
author: Ryan Quinn, The Fall

quote: Our purpose is to find out whether innocence, the moment it becomes involved in an action, can avoid committing murder.
author: Chris Womersley, Bereft

quote: ... Play the age as comedy if you want to get away with murder.
author: A.Z.Green

quote: Time was the greatest murderer in history.
author: Agatha Christie, Third Girl

quote: Calm is good, passivity not to much. Calm is always a basic inner attitude that makes it possible to concentrate and act purposefully. But passivity suggest an element of denial. Passive people refuse to take initiatives and to exploit stimuli. They sit and wait - without strength, defiant or rigid from shock - in whatever their situation is and prefer to suffer considerably from their plight rather than trying to change something. This includes boredom and even bad relationships.
author: J. Devau, Theory of the Atheist: Record One of the Alias Wars

quote: We feel that if someone is bad, he should be burdened with the knowledge that he is bad. It seems to us the ultimate injustice that a person could be evil, by our assessment , and still feel fine about himself.
author: Harold Bloom

quote: Christian Fiction is like a parable. The story is made up, but the truth is brought to life. Enjoy the story, but savor the truth.
author: Ikechukwu Joseph, Discovering Yourself

quote: Loving God is laying down your life in service to the Creator so that He can give it back to you.
author: Maria Gregory

quote: In all your course, walk with God and follow Christ as a little, poor, helpless child, taking hold of Christ’s hand, keeping your eye on the mark of the wounds on his hands and side, whence came the blood that cleanses you from sin and hiding your nakedness under the skirt of the white shining robe of his righteousness.
author: Henry Cloud

quote: Because I’ve gotten older, I worry that there will be a steep decline in my talent, but I promise not to let the same thing happen to my passion for writing.
author: Tanya Masse, Stairway to Awesomeness!: 30 Fundamental Steps to Living a Life of Awesomeness!

quote: As long as your life is a succession of love stories, you can never grow old.
author: Dan Groat, Monarchs and Mendicants

quote: As his boots walked towards the old station, he felt as though he were hallucinating. Scary apprehension increased the beat of his heart and the sweat upon his forehead was cold. The reality of where he stood created a sinking feeling inside of him.  An old man everyone called Uncle Tucker once owned this place. His sole existence behind the counter all of the time, day and night. He could have been a creature out of a fairy tale, with his long white beard and equally long white hair. Merlin. The overalls and the ball cap perched upon his head, along with the half-smoked cigar with an endless burning orb positioned in his mouth. It made him a fixture in time. He wondered if Tucker would still be alive. Tucker with his endless stories of the 1960s, the Vietnam War, and flower children. A man that never left a country thousands of miles away where bicycles filled the capital. A man who never left those fields where killing occurred.
author: Glen Cook, The Black Company

quote: I went closer this time and touched him. He let out a deafening shriek, as if something had pierced into his heart. I held his hand and sat there, admiring the intricate network of life on them. The creases and folds in his body were testament to the cruelty that he had been subjected to in this world. The watery eyes screamed of the pain, the agonising wait to leave this godforsaken place forever, that had given him nothing but pleadings for mercy.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: If youth was sold in a bottle of hair dye, we would all get in line.
author: Giorge Leedy, Uninhibited From Lust To Love

quote: [A]lthough wisdom is built on life experience, the mere accumulation of years guarantees nothing.
author: Jeanne Moreau

quote: I am old now, or at least, I am no longer young, and everything I see reminds me of something else I’ve seen, such that I see nothing for the first time. A bonny girl, her hair fiery red, reminds me only of another hundred such lasses, and their mothers, and what they were as they grew, and what they looked like when they died. It is the curse of age, that all things are reflections of other things.
author: Chris Rock

quote: Every age fraught with discord and danger seems to spawn a leader meant only for that age, a political giant whose absence, in retrospect, seems inconceivable when the history of that age is written.
author: Mohsin Hamid, The Reluctant Fundamentalist

quote: When she looked in the glass and saw her hair grey her cheek sunk, at fifty, she thought, possibly she might have managed things better--her husband; money; his books. But for her own part she would never for a single second regret her decision, evade difficulties, or slur over duties
author: Mervyn Peake, Titus Groan

quote: Spring is a season of fruitfulness.
author: Vivek Naik, Get More Done Easily: Time Management Mindsets and Simple Exercise to Organize Your Day and be More Productive in 5 Days

quote: Jeremias, my soul mate, I will forever love you.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Homo economicus was surreptitiously taken as the emblem and analogue for all living beings. A mechanistic anthropomorphism has gained currency. Bacteria are imagined to mimic "economic" behavior and to engage in internecine competition for the scarce oxygen available in their environment. A cosmic struggle among ever more complex forms of life has become the anthropic foundational myth of the scientific age.
author: John Maynard Keynes

quote: Even if we could grow our way out of the crisis and delay the inevitable and painful reconciliation of virtual and real wealth, there is the question of whether this would be a wise thing to do. Marginal costs of additional growth in rich countries, such as global warming, biodiversity loss and roadways choked with cars, now likely exceed marginal benefits of a little extra consumption. The end result is that promoting further economic growth makes us poorer, not richer.
author: Friedrich A. Hayek, Individualism and Economic Order

quote: Who needs theory when you have so much information? But this is categorically the wrong attitude to take toward forecasting, especially in a field like economics where the data is so noisy.
author: Anwar Shaikh, Globalization and the Myths of Free Trade: History, Theory, and Empirical Evidence

quote: Prejudices, mysticism, bigotry these things only distort religion, like they have actually done to the most religions of the world.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Illusion of Religion: A Treatise on Religious Fundamentalism

quote: Consistently failing is nothing more than an indication that you are progressing. The more we fail the farther we will see. Failure is not an option
author: Frank Sonnenberg, BookSmart: Hundreds of real-world lessons for success and happiness

quote: Rights are not easy to obtain, and once we understand this, we must work attentively and persistently - and never become careless or lazy.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: The comment section of the internet is like gang graffiti, it makes no sense and is ugly to look at.
author: James A. Chu

quote: People with power do not regulate their behavior as much. They become egocentric and preoccupied with their own self-interest, which eclipses their awareness of the interests of others.
author: Al Ritter

quote: If you’re a serious minded leader, you will read. You will read all you can. You will read when you feel like it, and you will read when you don’t. You will do whatever you have to do to increase your leadership input, because you know as well as I do that it will make you better.
author: Terry Goodkind, Blood of the Fold

quote: The only way to get what you want is to make them more afraid of you than they are of each other.
author: Laura Wright LaRoche

quote: Barbara wanted to go to tea at Dorchester as much as she wanted to give birth to octuplets.
author: Abhijit Naskar, 7 Billion Gods: Humans Above All

quote: How well it was said," answered the fisherman, "that swords can be kept off with shields but the Eye of Wisdom pierces through every defense!
author: Grace Penuel

quote: Sometimes the answer is in the question.
author: Abhijit Naskar, The Film Testament

quote: A Film has the potential to kindle such a spark of inspiration in an individual that it can alter the course of human progress.
author: Abhijit Naskar, The Film Testament

quote: Healthy entertainment is a beautiful blend of stimuli that can connect with the viewer at a sentimental level, then sow the seeds of a certain idea or feed the mind with inspiration and courage. In short, healthy entertainment does not evoke raw emotions in the mind of a viewer only to make them wreak havoc, rather it guides those emotions in a healthy direction. This leads to not only an entertained viewer, but also an inspired soul. And that should be the purpose of film-making, and indeed the entire entertainment industry, rather than feeding the general population with garbage.
author: Bhavik Sarkhedi

quote: O, the sheer magnificence of words that come together like waves upon a beach, each telling its own story is a life worthy to be read
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Contentment is the greatest wealth.
author: Abhijit Naskar, What is Mind?

quote: Beauty lies in simplicity.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: From the errors of others, a wise man corrects his own.
author: Alexis  Hall, For Real

quote: Every word that I utter matters and this makes me speechless.
author: Amit Abraham

quote: Go! Yes, You! Go! I will not force you to like me; I will not force you to love me. Unconditional love has a condition inside it but there is no you in me. If I know my real me, then I know your real you. I know your value in me and I also know my value in you. If your value is not in me and my value is not in you, then I will not force you to like me; I will not force you to love me, so go!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: A person’s voice can have such a powerful experience on the listener, very different from looking at the words on the page.
author: Elizabeth Scott

quote: No one should let yesterday use up too much of today. Easy to say, hard to live.
author: Darynda Jones

quote: Everything in balance, everything in moderation – try not to go over the top in any direction but be free to explore & enjoy. Live heart-fully.I’m a writer & philosopher, of course I have the right to invent words! I try not to do it carelessly, I only write what sounds and feels right.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: if we lose our human values by having everything mechanied, then machines will dictate our lives.
author: Cassandra Clare, City of Bones

quote: The case of a patient with dissociative identity disorder follows:Cindy, a 24-year-old woman, was transferred to the psychiatry service to facilitate community placement. Over the years, she had received many different diagnoses, including schizophrenia, borderline personality disorder, schizoaffective disorder, and bipolar disorder. Dissociative identity disorder was her current diagnosis.Cindy had been well until 3 years before admission, when she developed depression, "voices," multiple somatic complaints, periods of amnesia, and wrist cutting. Her family and friends considered her a pathological liar because she would do or say things that she would later deny. Chronic depression and recurrent suicidal behavior led to frequent hospitalizations. Cindy had trials of antipsychotics, antidepressants, mood stabilizers, and anxiolytics, all without benefit. Her condition continued to worsen.Cindy was a petite, neatly groomed woman who cooperated well with the treatment team. She reported having nine distinct alters that ranged in age from 2 to 48 years; two were masculine. Cindy’s main concern was her inability to control the switches among her alters, which made her feel out of control. She reported having been sexually abused by her father as a child and described visual hallucinations of him threatening her with a knife. We were unable to confirm the history of sexual abuse but thought it likely, based on what we knew of her chaotic early home life.Nursing staff observed several episodes in which Cindy switched to a troublesome alter. Her voice would change in inflection and tone, becoming childlike as ]oy, an 8-year-old alter, took control. Arrangements were made for individual psychotherapy and Cindy was discharged.At a follow-up 3 years later, Cindy still had many alters but was functioning better, had fewer switches, and lived independently. She continued to see a therapist weekly and hoped to one day integrate her many alters.
author: J.P. Delaney, The Girl Before

quote: Being lost without grasping the rather obvious fact that we are lost is by far the best guarantee we have that we’re going to stay lost.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: When it comes to salvation, we are all fugitives. Psalm 119:176
author: Jane Smiley, The Greenlanders

quote: Blaire, This teardrop represents many things. The tears I know you’ve shed over holding your mother’s piece of satin. The tears you’ve shed over each loss you’ve experienced. But it also represents the tears we’ve both shed as we’ve felt the little life inside you begin to move. The tears I’ve shed over the fact I’ve been given someone like you to love. I never imagined anyone like you Blaire. But every time I think about forever with you I’m humbled that you chose me.This is your something blue.I love you,Rush
author: Ray Bradbury, The Martian Chronicles

quote: Rain is Love, Love is Bliss, Bliss is Blessing.
author: Ron Baratono, The Writings of Ron Baratono

quote: May We Love Ourselves. May We Love Each Other.May We Believe that Our Dreams Can Come True.We Are Strong.We Are Wise.We Are the Heroines of our Own Lives -The Heroine’s Club benediction
author: Annie Morecambe, Isle of Tana

quote: The sixth gift is Joy. May it keep your heart open and filled with light.
author: Charlene Costanzo, The Twelve Gifts of Birth

quote: If you can accomplish any great task being absorbed in it and that too without any expectations, believe me, that one act of yours will make you a "historical person".
author: Deep Trivedi

quote: If and when the world does not meet your expectations, pick up a pen and paper and create your own.
author: Carlos Salinas, The Little Book of Big Quotes

quote: I’d rather be surround by people who make mistakes and have no problem admitting to them and learning from them than be surrounded by people who think they make none.
author: Avery Williams, The Impossibility of Tomorrow

quote: I challenge you to make your life a masterpiece. I challenge you to join the ranks of those people who live what they teach, who walk their talk.
author: Bruce Lee, Tao of Jeet Kune Do

quote: The cats were relaxing in a patch of sunlight on the rug without a thought in their sleek brown heads. What matter to them that it was Sunday-or even Thursday? Every day was Today in their scheme of things, and there was no such thing as Yesterday or Tomorrow.
author: Richard Hell, Go Now

quote: The sun shines, snow falls, mountains rise and valleys sink, night deepens and pales into day, but it is only very seldom that we attend to such things. . . . When we are grasping the inexpressible meaning of these things, this is life, this is living. To do this twenty-four hours a day is the Way of Haiku. It is having life more abundantly.
author: Eugen Herrigel

quote: This, then, is what counts: a lightning reaction which has no further need of conscious observation. In this respect at least the pupil makes himself independent of all conscious purpose.
author: R.H. Blyth

quote: I had loved Kitty -I would always love Kitty. But I had lived with her a kind of queer half-life, hiding from my own true self. Since then I had refused to love at all, had become - or so I thought - a creature beyond passion, driving others to their secret, humiliating confessions of lust; but never offering my own.
author: Kiki Archer, But She Is My Student

quote: No matter how grave the secret, how imperative absolute silence, someone would always feel the urge to confess, and an unleashed secret is a terrible force.
author: Sue Monk Kidd, The Secret Life of Bees

quote: ...our monsters walk the dark pathways of secret motives...
author: Hannah Harrington, Speechless

quote: If I had not try and taken chances, I would have miss many great opportunities in life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Sometimes, we try to run so fast that we can’t see the dangers until we have them before us. We don’t see the tiger hiding in the trees until it is about to eat us. Or we run pass the next opportunity without paying attention.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I can see the caravanserai, like a mirage in the distance. The heat hums. I thought I saw water. What would you have on these trade winds for your comfort?
author: Nicole Eglinger, Falling

quote: Jersey Shore has killed more brain cells than alcohol, cocaine, and meth combined.
author: Michelle Templet

quote: The things that scare you also always provoke you to challenge your fears!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Not how well you see in a clear weather but how well you see in a foggy weather determines how better you are than others!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Umbrella is comfort, rain is life! You must often leave comfort to touch the life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: He was like an autumn without leaves, he was unreal!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Whenever we see a deserted rose, we immediately think about a broken relationship and we imagine the sadness they went through without thinking the poor dead rose ever!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: When everything looks unusual around you, your eyes and your mind mostly need anything usual! Unfamiliar disturbs us; familiar comforts us! But for the wise man, unusual is more precious than the usual because it offers us a new way, a new vision, a new idea, a new world!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Nobody is exempt from the surprises of life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Unhappiest is the person who feels happy when seeing an unhappy person!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Simple is pretty because it is plain
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: We have one thing in common with umbrellas: We both exist because the rain exists!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: You want to get lost? Then get lost amongst a marvellous beauty!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Be a provocateur! Provoke people to think! Provoke sleepers to awake! Provoke slaves to revolt against their masters! Provoke everyone to gain control over their fates unchecked! Provoke the lonely to participate the crowds and provoke the crowds to visit the loneliness! Be a provocateur! Provoke people to cross the bridges so that they can see the other side!
author: it will eventually be caught by the light!

quote: A good photograph never belongs to the past; every time you look at it, it is with you, it is alive and it is in the present moment!
author: but the good guys have two enemies: The universe and the bad guys!

quote: Instead of hiding behind the curtain, be the curtain itself; you will never be found!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Postman’s bag is always heavy because it carries the life itself: It carries all the sorrows and all the joys, all the worries and all the hopes!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Many lives are wasted by just waiting for something good to come from the horizon instead of going to the horizon and finding something good over there!
author: it is a mysterious illusionist who sets off fireworks in the depths of our soul!

quote: If you want to win a great victory on any matter, make your move unexpectedly!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: When hopeful and hopeless come together, both will learn great things from each other: Hopeful will learn the horror of being hopeless and the hopeless will learn the beauty of being hopeful!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Sometimes it is good to throw some of your problems into the future and the good news is that there is a good possibility that you may never meet them again!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: To reach a target, you must never see it as unreachable!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Rich just needs a more expensive shoe, but poor just needs a shoe!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Whenever we look at a photograph, the memories in the photograph become our memories as well!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: The most important thing about the ‘next time’ is that there may not be a next time!
author: they involve clowning and arbitrariness! In the twenty-first century only the silly and larky nations give permission to such third-class contemptible regimes!

quote: No one is ordinary because every person carries the wisdom of his own unique path!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: If a nation wants to be deceived, let it be deceived! Through this way, they will learn the truth after many deceptions and pains! Truth and time are the greatest teachers, they are the greatest instructors!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: In a petty theft you steal money, gold etc.; in an electoral theft you steal the future of a country! The second crime can be committed only by the meanest people! Such a heavy crime results in a heavy price!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: In matters of love: When giving, be generous! When taking, be thankful!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: If you are obliged to do something inevitable, don’t lose time to think about it, do it right away!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: If we keep telling that life is unfair but do nothing serious about it, then life will forever continue to remain unfair!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: People seem to be doing different things, but in reality they do the same thing: They just rush about without having any outstanding universal goal!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: If you do not have a cause, then you have nothing at all! Get a cause and march with that cause!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: To wish a life without stairs, without hills and mountains is to wish a dim life without the joy of rising with our own efforts!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: It is always easy to create an ordinary city; what is difficult is to create an extraordinary one, peaceful and restful one, smart and tidy, artful and cultivated one, in short, a livable one! And Zurich is such a city!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: You walk like others? You talk like others? You think like others? Then the world doesn’t need you because others are already abundant in the world! Be original!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: When you are in trouble, you are the nearest first person who can help you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: To reach your target quicker, don’t lose your time by looking back!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: If your country is governed by the most stupid people, it is vital for you to continue going up personally while your nation and your country is going down because your country will inevitably collapse and it will be in need of people like you, people who managed to improve themselves while everything else was falling and deteriorating!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: When you leave the light behind you, shadows and darkness become your guide!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Moments fly and if you don’t fly with the moments, you remain on the ground apart from the moments while the moments are flying!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: A hammer with flowers is still a hammer for the nail!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Ants are successful creatures
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: To live the extraordinary ecstasy of a good rest, all you have to do is to get very tired!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Not only persons lose their way, but nations lose their way as well!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Environmental pollution is not only humanity’s treason to humanity but also a treason to all other living creatures on earth!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Visit your life, because you are spending too much time in others life! Visit yourself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: The New Year is a painting not yet painted; a path not yet stepped on; a wing not yet taken off! Things haven’t happened as yet! Before the clock strikes twelve, remember that you are blessed with the ability to reshape your life!
author: darkness can shine!

quote: Throughout the human history millions have died because of the kings and the queens, because of the presidents and the prime ministers, because of the Caesars and the duces, because of all these little charlatans with big ego!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Every time a stupid politician says something stupid, you don’t have to reply to him, because it is nonsense to shoo every barking dog away!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Hard long roads create tough men
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: You may not be happy with your life. All you have to do is to refuse to be unhappy! Because the worst thing is to get used to be unhappy!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: People ask what will happen if Mars One fails. There will be Mars Two, Mars Three, there will be Gliese 581 One, Proxima Centauri b One etc. If a project opens the path for other projects, it means that it has already triumphed!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Reaching the top requires taking a good break every time you need it! On the way up, you must never hesitate to stop for a while!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: No king has a throne more beautiful than a bench covered with the autumn leaves!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: The little lake you love is the biggest ocean for you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: A man who is deprived of criticisms is a miserable and a poor man
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: The greatest hero for a country is the person who gave a progressive vision, a peaceful soul, a modern mind and an unshakable belief in science to his nation. And for the Turks, this honorable name is Atatürk, an immortal revolutionist!
author: the last dance is the best dance! All the roads of persistent practice lead to the Land of Perfection!

quote: Unless you accept anyone to be your boss, no man can be your boss!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Always refuse to be like the others! The more you become similar to the others the more you will be useless because there are already plenty of the others!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: When we are under a tree, we are under a temple, a temple of countless goodnesses!
author: you become rich also by helping the rich! Helping makes you rich!

quote: In any country where there is a dishonorable government, there is certainly a dishonorable nation!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Without seeing the whole picture and without knowing the whole story of a man’s life, our judgements about him will most probably be wrong and unfair!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Watch yourself from different angles so that you can understand better who you really are!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Similar souls wander in the similar places! They may not know each other, but often they touch the same winds, they step on the same leaves, their looks are lost in the same horizons!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Every fashion is temporary but the concept of fashion is permanent!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: For a clever man, different cultures, different lives, different attitudes, different dreams, different of everything are a good teacher! You only take the things you already know from somebody or something like you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: One of the most distinct features of this whole human history is god flattery! People never get tired of buttering every kind of gods in the hope of getting earthly benefit or obtaining heavenly plunder! Man is no doubt a tireless flunkey!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Not every lost soul wants to be found, because not every lost is lost, some of them found something or many thing or even everything in their lostness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: For an incurious person, an open door will be no different than a wall!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: You can always challenge a big storm with a little boat and this will only prove how unserious person you are!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: The holy eye is the one who is able to see the extraordinary beauties of the ordinary days!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Here is a good message from the ocean: You will be an ocean too if you let every river, every rain, every flood and every stream flow to you freely!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: For a weak person, every little hill is a giant mountain; for a strong person, every giant mountain is a little hill!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Right path will not always look like a right path
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: No man can be immortal by dying! There is only one way to be immortal: Not to die!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Unusual doors often take you to the unusual worlds!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Cats speak the language of comfort and coolness and therefore we feel comfortable and cool whenever we see a cat!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Countries which are governed by the dabblers will undoubtedly turn into the miserable countries!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Problems come few and far between in the life of a proactive person.
author: Herman Wouk

quote: Sometimes you have a little problem and you dont fix it and then all of a sudden it aint a littleproblem anymore.
author: Peter Rock, My Abandonment

quote: Sometimes the most complex problems can be solved with the simplest solutions.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: Give life long enough and it will solve all your problems, including the one of being alive.
author: Dennis E. Adonis

quote: He had always imagined that some sort of emotional mental equipment was meant to arrive, when he was forty-five, say, or fifty, a kind of kit that would enable him to deal with the impending loss of a parent. If he were only in possession of this equipment, he would be just fine. He would be noble and selfless, wise and philosophical. Perhaps he would even have kids of his own, and would presumably possess the kind of maturity that comes with fatherhood, the understanding of life as a process.
author: Alexandra Stoddard, Grace Notes

quote: If you can see only what light reveals and hear only what sound announces, then in truth you do not see nor do you hear.
author: Jen Klein

quote: The people who strive for failure are encouraged by those that failed before them. To do the same
author: Erin Morgenstern, The Night Circus

quote: I must have missed the fine print disclaimer in my school textbooks while learning about the Declaration of Independence and U.S. Constitution. It must have read: Warning – by learning this material it will make you a future enemy of the state.
author: LibertasIntel

quote: When you reach the middle of your career ladder, turn it the other way around and slide down to the top
author: Roxana Shirazi

quote: Better to have too much time to manage, than too much money that manages all your time
author: Gaurav Dashputra, The Blood On My Hands..

quote: Thinking is no more or no less than asking questions. To improve your thinking, improve the quality of the questions you ask.
author: rassool jibraeel snyman

quote: When your diary is full and your life is empty, get a date
author: George R.R. Martin, A Storm of Swords

quote: A lifetime had to be crafted, just like anything else, she thought, it had to be moulded and beaten and burnished in order to get the most out of it.
author: Orhan Pamuk, The Museum of Innocence

quote: My philosophical heart will not judge thee
author: is you

quote: Peace becomes a fantasy when egos are promoted and facts distorted.
author: Sarah McCarry, All Our Pretty Songs

quote: When the Devil goeth about like a roaring lion, he goeth about in a shape by which few but savages and hunters are attracted. But, when he is trimmed, smoothed, and varnished, according to the mode: when he is aweary of vice, and aweary of virtue, used up as to brimstone, and used up as to bliss; then, whether he take to the serving out of red tape, or to the kindling of red fire, he is the very Devil.
author: N. Lombardi Jr.

quote: We are all only men, defined by our choices.
author: G.E.GRAVES

quote: Death is nothing to us, because a body that has been dispersed into elements experiences no sensations, and the absence of sensation is nothing to us.
author: C.G. Jung

quote: I do not want to be the leader. I refuse to be the leader. I want to live darkly and richly in my femaleness. I want a man lying over me, always over me. His will, his pleasure, his desire, his life, his work, his sexuality the touchstone, the command, my pivot. I don’t mind working, holding my ground intellectually, artistically; but as a woman, oh, God, as a woman I want to be dominated. I don’t mind being told to stand on my own feet, not to cling, be all that I am capable of doing, but I am going to be pursued, fucked, possessed by the will of a male at his time, his bidding.
author: Ella Frank, Blind Obsession

quote: I say awkward things at awkward times, without feeling awkward.
author: Amit Abraham

quote: A library is never -- for lovers of the written word -- simply a place for conserving or storing books but rather a sort of living creature with a personality and even moods which we should understand and learn to live with.
author: Jen Turano, A Most Peculiar Circumstance

quote: Every cult of personality that emphasizes the distinguished qualities, virtues, and talents of another person, even though these be of an altogether spiritual nature, is worldly and has no place in the Christian community; indeed, it poisons the Christianity community.
author: M.F. Moonzajer, LOVE, HATRED AND MADNESS

quote: The truth is not what I look for. It is what I look at!
author: Sereda Aleta Dailey, The Oracle of Poetic Wisdom

quote: Seek knowledge.Learning has no end.Learning makes you forever young.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: It is quite normal to fear what one most desires. We desire to transcend the Story of the World that has come to enslave us, that indeed is killing the planet. We fear what the end of that story will bring: the demise of much that is familiar.Fear it or not, it is happening already.
author: Charles Eisenstein, The More Beautiful World Our Hearts Know Is Possible

quote: [Q微信956290760]办理澳洲麦考瑞大学MQ毕业证成绩单学历认证留学回国证明Macquarie University
author: Lin

quote: Everything sacred begins with a circle of motion.
author: Charles Eisenstein, The More Beautiful World Our Hearts Know Is Possible

quote: Addiction, self-sabotage, procrastination, laziness, rage, chronic fatigue, and depression are all ways that we withhold our full participation in the program of life we are offered. When the conscious mind cannot find a reason to say no, the unconscious says no in its own way.
author: Michael Ben Zehabe, The Meaning of Hebrew Letters: A Hebrew Language Program for Christians

quote: We are not just a skin-encapsulated ego, a soul encased in flesh. We are each other and we are the world.
author: Charles Eisenstein, The More Beautiful World Our Hearts Know Is Possible

quote: Each experience of love nudges us toward the Story of Interbeing, because it only fits into that story and defies the logic of Separation.
author: they buy why you do it. And what you do simply proves what you believe

quote: Instead of living only for ourselves, we have a higher goal: to live for Jesus.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: No matter how much youcare about someone,you can’t take responsibilityfor their happiness.
author: Domonique Bertolucci, The Happiness Code: Ten Keys to Being the Best You Can Be

quote: It no longer matters who consider themselves the masters of events. Events no longer obey their masters.
author: Marion Zimmer Bradley, The Mists of Avalon

quote: The prince of darkness is a gentleman!
author: Robert Orben

quote: Though sluggards deem it but a foolish chase,And marvel men should quit their easy chair,The toilsome way, and long, long leagues to trace,Oh! there is sweetness in the mountain air,And life that bloated Ease can never hope to share.
author: Lee Bice-Matheson

quote: The is no master in love, WE are all learners.
author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quote: A widespread meticulous consistency causes a bigger suspicion than the most obvious inconsistency does!
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: What is the best thing about people doubting your potential? The pleasure of proving them wrong.
author: Beth Morey, Night Cycles: Poetry for a Dark Night of the Soul

quote: We’re all photojournalists now. It’s no longer enough just to write.
author: Thomas Lopinski

quote: Write like a motherfucker.
author: George Orwell, Why I Write

quote: As you raise your personal chi level, the rising tide of high energy may correct underlying deficiencies.
author: Svetlana Alexievich, Voices from Chernobyl: The Oral History of a Nuclear Disaster

quote: On his misfit globe he has outlasted the mammoth and the pterodactyl, but he has never got the upper hand of bacteria and the insects.
author: E.B. White

quote: Judged against eternity, how little of what agitates us makes any difference.
author: Karel Čapek

quote: If you praise others you are considered a nice person, but if you praise yourself you are arrogant or nonreligious! What a society, eh? No wonder your self-esteem is low.
author: Dr. Maya Angleou

quote: The body is given to us by God for the fulfillment of His plan.
author: Anonymous

quote: Just because something is ubiquitous does not mean that it is innocuous.
author: Carrie Jones, Captivate

quote: Even Damocles developed a routine.
author: Zhuangzi, The Complete Works of Chuang Tzu

quote: Very few problems cannot be solved by either coffee, wine or chocolate.
author: Christopher Shevlin, The Perpetual Astonishment of Jonathon Fairfax

quote: If I told you your bare ass looks fantastic in the moonlight, would you hold that against me?
author: Pamela Clare, Skin Deep

quote: Dennis was present, still present, and this, she thought as she stayed landed against him, was no small talent.
author: Heraclitus

quote: If we live with possibilities we are exiles from the present which is given us by God to be our own, homeless and displaced in a future or a past which are not ours because they are always beyond our reach. The present is our right place, and we can lay hands on whatever it offers us.
author: Kaza Kingsley, The Three Furies

quote: The curiosity of lazy men is gossip
author: Keith  Miller, The Book of Flying

quote: Nature answers every question.
author: David Halberstam, The Powers That Be

quote: Those of us who are blamed when old for reading childish books were blamed when children for reading books too old for us. No reader worth his salt trots along in obedience to a time-table.
author: Jasper Fforde, Shades of Grey

quote: I watched the surrounding landscape with great curiosity, and I wanted to discover the words that could describe all its unspoiled beauty.
author: Edward O. Wilson

quote: Curiosity is a terrible thing, he was thinking. How is it possible to stop oneself from needing to know?
author: Jon Meacham, Thomas Jefferson: The Art of Power

quote: Is there no easy way to taking this dress off you? Am I going to have to rip it off?
author: Susan  Cartwright, Wolf Dawn

quote: A leader cannot avoid being hated. This hatred is directly proportional to his influence and power. A person who does not wish to be hated should avoid leadership roles.
author: Santosh Adbhut Kumar

quote: Again came that ringing crow, and Peter dropped in front of them. "Greeting, boys," he cried, and mechanically they saluted, and then again was silence.He frowned."I am back," he said hotly, "why do you not cheer?
author: Lionel Suggs

quote: The decisions you make today, could affect the rest of your life, be wise.
author: Annie Proulx, The Shipping News

quote: Out of the decisions that we make in life, our Self emerges. What we choose in life is not the thing chosen out there, but oneself.
author: Michael  Grant, Hunger

quote: Sometimes smallest decisions are bliss that can change our life forever
author: Molly Friedenfeld

quote: Simple works, complex fails.
author: Chris Prentiss, Zen and the Art of Happiness

quote: Only when you decide to truly live can you be free of your fears, and only when you are free of your fears can you truly live.
author: Jojo Moyes, The Girl You Left Behind

quote: Life is a learning process.Learn from your mistakes.The lessons should motivates you to make better decisions.
author: j.villodas

quote: The worst part of writing is meeting all these great new characters and having no one to talk about (the adventures you share with) them.
author: Eliza Green

quote: Conscious positive wording assists us in maintaining our joy and a positive outlook on life. It allows us to make the choice to be consciously joyful and consciously grateful for all life experiences.
author: Molly Friedenfeld, The Book of Simple Human Truths

quote: The timing of events is a splendor of wonder.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Footsteps are the wonders of staying alive to move forward
author: Aristotle, Metaphysics

quote: It is the final person we see reflected in our eyes that really matters; we wonder who is she and why is she here? To find ourselves truly, it is the goal we have all set for ourselves.
author: Sayo Masuda, Autobiography of a Geisha

quote: The Cross is the eternal expression of the length to which God will go to in order to restore broken community.
author: Rollo May

quote: In our modern religion there is a reticence in speaking of our personal relationship to Jesus which often causes great loss. We forget that the majority of men are guided more by emotions than by intellect: the heart is the great power by which they are meant to be influenced and molded.
author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, Lectures to My Students

quote: The curtains of his bed were drawn aside; and Scrooge, starting up into a half-recumbent attitude, found himself face to face with the unearthly visitor who drew them: as close to it as I am now to you, and I am standing in the spirit at your elbow.
author: Anne Perry, A Christmas Hope

quote: There are more important things in life than chasing after this myth of perfection.
author: Ray Bradbury, The Martian Chronicles

quote: Sometimes to return is a vulgarity.
author: Anonymous

quote: Perfection is something everyone strives for, but it’s elusive and may be an illusion.
author: Émile Zola

quote: Some politicians are much noisier than the dogs! Just like teaching a dog how to hush, public must likewise teach those politicians to shush!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: The day was ill-omened from the beginning; one of those unlucky days when every little detail seems to go wrong and one finds oneself engaged in a perpetual and infuriating strife with inanimate objects. How truly fiendish the sub-human world can be on these occasions! How every atom, every cell, every molecule, seems to be leagued in a maddening conspiracy against the unfortunate being who has incurred its obscure displeasure!
author: Roman Payne

quote: Here I want to stress that perception of losing one’s mind is based on culturally derived and socially ingrained stereotypes as to the significance of symptoms such as hearing voices, losing temporal and spatial orientation, and sensing that one is being followed, and that many of the most spectacular and convincing of these symptoms in some instances psychiatrically signify merely a temporary emotional upset in a stressful situation, however terrifying to the person at the time. Similarly, the anxiety consequent upon this perception of oneself, and the strategies devised to reduce this anxiety, are not a product of abnormal psychology, but would be exhibited by any person socialized into our culture who came to conceive of himself as someone losing his mind.

What you don’t even realize now—what you will only come to understand in time, but lucky for you, I’m here to tell you—is you’re not going to give two shits about this band in a few years. In fact, I guarantee that this group that you admire so much and that you are putting all of your love and dedication and devotion into will be nothing more than an obsession you will be immensely embarrassed of having had. One day you’ll be in college, maybe you’ll be at a party, and someone will say, ‘Hey, do you remember The Ruperts? How shitty was their music?’ and you will have a moment of crisis: Do you admit your former love for them, or do you concede, because you know in your heart that this person is right? And guess what you’ll say? You’ll say, ‘Yeah, their music was utter. Putrid.Garbage.
author: Thomas Pynchon, V.

quote: Inside of every good person there is also something very wild.
author: François de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Edmund felt despair eating away at his victory. "Why is the world like this?" He shivered. "Why does it feel so cold, so hard?"A smile flickered on John’s face, one that was neither happy nor sad. "What would be the worth of goodness, in a world that always rewarded it?
author: Trenton Lee Stewart, The Mysterious Benedict Society and the Perilous Journey

quote: Never wish the death of anyone or you will lose your goodness inside you!
author: John Dufresne, Love Warps the Mind a Little

quote: She learns a valuable lesson: if you think you are good, just try doing good. You’ll soon find out how inadequate your little drop of goodness is.
author: Julie Saffrin, BlessBack: Thank Those Who Shaped Your Life

quote: See not the face..but only the eyes, of the poker face.
author: Damien Rice

quote: She flew across the turbulent gust.Her eyes fixed, her wings strongShe flies and flies and flies along.To reach high, to open her wings to the breathing sun rise.
author: Josh Malerman

quote: Eye reads what is unwritten.
author: P

quote: Sometimes people did this, closed their eyes for a few seconds and imagined it gave them insights into what it was like to be her. Only, at the end, they could still open their eyes and see.
author: Richelle Mead, Spirit Bound

quote: It’s better, really, to go out in a blaze. That’s why we love Marilyn, and James Dean. We love the ones who walk right into the fire.
author: Becca Fitzpatrick, Hush, Hush

quote: You can’t keep doing the same thing and expect a new result.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: God gave us His authority, He gave us His wisdom, He is waiting for our actions
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Errors were not only meant to be committed by fools.
author: Pankaj Mishra (#iampm)

quote: The duel may go on for long, but the self-defense often wins over the self-reproach.
author: Rajesh Nanoo

quote: Even the wisest and the best of us can be foolish occasionally.
author: Eugenio III R. Letada

quote: The most difficult thing in the world is to know how to do a thing and to watch someone else do it wrong without comment
author: Ashish Patel

quote: Schooling gives you knowledge, but education makes you wise.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Life would be simpler if only we were all unicorns.
author: M.F. Moonzajer, A moment with God ; Poetry

quote: A man feared that he might find an assassin
author: Aswin Devarajan

quote: Who in the universe halts when the enemy tells them to?
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: There are few people whom I really love, and still fewer of whom I think well.The more I see of the world, the more am I dissatisfied with it; and every day confirms my belief of the inconsistency of all human characters, and the little dependence that can be placed on the appearance of merit sense
author: Rex Stout, The Rubber Band

quote: The problem is that we always look for the missing piece of the puzzle instead of finding a place for the one in our hand...
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: There is a time to speak up, and a time to be silent. A time to read and a time to write. A time to learn and a time to teach. A time to listen and time to be heard. A time to lose and a time to gain. And for all of these things the time in now
author: Idries Shah, Reflections

quote: History. Language. Passion. Custom. All these things determine what men say, think, and do. These are the hidden puppet-strings from which all men hang.
author: I am a free man.

quote: When we write down our dreams we transform what we imagine into reality.
author: Gina Greenlee, Postcards and Pearls: Life Lessons from Solo Moments on the Road

quote: Happiness is the goal of all goals and ultimate purpose of our life.
author: Ogwo David Emenike

quote: The problem is that without an understanding for their meaning and purpose, most relationships quickly become little more than vehicles for the pursuit of selfish and individual goals. Disagreements then become a battle between conflicting interests, rather than a search for a mutually satisfying resolution.
author: Andrija Maurović

quote: The pursuit of truth is not important. The pursuit of that truth is important which helps you in reaching your goal that is provided you have one.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: You are more powerful than your government, and your government are worried the day you discover it!!!
author: Anon1467

quote: Brand-new truths are probably not Truths.
author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar

quote: Guilt was a fascinating thing: it seemed not to weaken over time. If anything it grew stronger as the circumstances faded from memory, as the fear and the necessity became abstract. And only her own actions stood out with crystal clarity.
author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer, God Is in the Manger: Reflections on Advent and Christmas

quote: The most liberating moment, is the moment you finally let go.
author: Robert Tew

quote: How do you think your body and mind would respond if you were surrounded by psychologists, psychiatrists, or drug and alcohol counselors who subscribed to the belief that "once an alcoholic or addict, always an alcoholic or addict" and who believed that your current stay in rehab would be one of many?
author: Super Star

quote: I’m the muhfucka that did this to you! If y’all don’t know me, you better get to know me, or fuck around and wind up wit’ a hole in your forehead.
author: Samantha and john

quote: Stop validating your victim mentality. Shake off your self-defeating drama and embrace your innate ability to recover and achieve.
author: Courtney Giardina, Tear Stained Beaches

quote: These wrinkles are the hands of time,The journeys I’ve been onThey’ve seen me through a thousand days,And ev’ry victory wonThese fragile hands, With exposed bones,Are not a fearful sightBut rather, they, my faithful partners,Rocked babies through the nightThese eyes are weak, They see much less,Than yours they’ve seen much moreThey’ve guided me through birth, through death,Through grief, through hurt, through warThese ears can hear so very little,Yet they’ve learned to listen muchThey perk up not for gossip now,But for a heart to touchThose younger often look my way,With pity looks to giveYet this old body doesn’t mean I am dying,But rather, that I have lived
author: Janet Turpin Myers, the last year of confusion

quote: In biblical times, they used to stone a few thirteen-year-olds with some regularity, which helped keep the others quiet and at home. The mothers were usually in the first row of stone throwers, and had to be restrained.
author: Barbara Bradley Hagerty, Life Reimagined: The Science, Art, and Opportunity of Midlife

quote: In the old pieces of furniture almost as in the old paintings, dwells the charm of the past, of the faded which becomes stronger in a man when he reaches an advanced age.
author: Céline

quote: Many people define beauty as skin deep, but I’ve found the beauty in physical and superficial changes that continue throughout the life of a woman.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: And like most middle-aged people who hear the clock ticking in their lives, I had come to resent a waste or theft of my time that was greater than any theft of my goods or money.
author: Donna Lynn Hope

quote: Nothing was more nauseating than people who constantly complained about their life, but did nothing about it.
author: Imam Ali Ibn Abi Talib

quote: It’s not so much about the cards you’re dealt; it’s a whole lot more about whether you play them well, or play them at all.
author: Sivaprakash Sidhu

quote: If you let all the bad thing in life stop you
author: L. M. Fields

quote: How you live does not depend so much on what life brings you as on the attitude that you approach your life with.
author: Greg Bear, City at the End of Time

quote: Normal...is relative.
author: Pablo Neruda

quote: I have never been a violent man. Just a little creepy, it seems.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: I tried to get away from him, to get to that door, but instead I backed up against the wall and was stuck there in that white, white room.
author: Roxane Gay, Bad Feminist

quote: In the race of life I would rather to be around the best and sink than to be around mediocrity and swim.
author: Ashok Kallarakkal

quote: Cheating was a concept both foreign and integral to the fighting of wars.
author: Robert B. Parker

quote: If we want to grow, the way to break a pattern of negativity is to face anything negative with love.
author: Luis Carlos Montalván, Until Tuesday: A Wounded Warrior and the Golden Retriever Who Saved Him

quote: lies are allow in business ..love is not my business,maybe yours!!
author: Nora Ephron, Heartburn
